Hunt sharks, whales and exotic fish to never run out of supplies.
Furnish your fish collection with marvelous sea trophies, from small fry to massive sharks.
Live the epic pirate life, raise the black flag and loot a merchant ship loaded with gold or set sail on quest to battle a slave ship.
Beware of the English empire and the Spanish crown and their powerful master ship, as a pirate you are always on the run.
Compete with your friends for the highest bounty.

DISCOVER GROUNDBREAKING 3D VISUALS ON MOBILE AND TABLETS
Bask in the West-Indies sunshine, admire beautiful sea sunsets, navigate ice mazes and sail through the night along breathtaking coastlines.
Changing weather conditions directly impact the way you run your ship and redefine every landscape.
Beware of storms and of the treacherous fog that will conceal your enemies until the last moment!
Master the sea to become the most skillful pirate of the Caribbean Sea and be victorious in battles.

EMBARK ON AN EPIC QUEST FOR A LEGENDARY TREASURE
Live a naval adventure that will reveal the truth about the mysterious lost treasure of the famous French pirate and assassin La Buse.
Cross paths with Assassins and Templars and take part in their age-old struggle.
Meet the most notorious and colorful pirates of the era, including Sam Bellamy, Ben Hornigold, Charles Vane and Blackbeard!

name: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission: Las Vegum
summary: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission: Las Vegum is the sequel of Astérix & Obélix XXL, it was released exclusively in Europe due to the lower popularity of the franchise in the United States and Japan. The game stars the French comic book characters Asterix & Obelix and features spoofs to many classic games, in the same fashion that the comics spoof historical characters and make many cultural references.

name: AstroCore Mining
summary: Welcome to the harsh reality of space capitalism. Profit is everything, and you’re expendable. Extract resources, meet quotas, and survive; whatever it takes. But beware: failure isn’t just a setback, it’s a death sentence. How far will you go in this brutal frontier?

name: AstroScaper
summary: A minimalist puzzle city-builder where every placement counts. Build colonies on asteroids using strategic proximity-based mechanics and minimal resource management. Relax in freebuild mode or chase high scores in challenge mode – all against a serene cosmic backdrop.

name: AshBall
summary: Outrun the lava. Trust your teammate. One ball, one chance — pass or perish in AshBall's minimalist, deadly arenas. Climb the leaderboard together and prove you're the ultimate duo.

name: Astray: Zero
summary: A 2D side-scrolling action-adventure game. You constantly defeat monsters and advance to the next level. In the hand-drawn game world, you will fight alongside a girl named Zero, uncovering the truth of this game world during a fantastical journey!

name: Ashforge: Whispers of the Deep
summary: A gritty first-person fantasy survival adventure, you are trapped in an underground realm long forgotten and abandoned. Survive first— fighting, foraging and crafting. Next, repair the legendary subterranean steam train Ashforge and explore deeper. Finally, clear your name and return to the surface!

name: A Sky Full of Stars Interstellar Focus
summary: The FD to the events of the original Miagete Goran, Yozora Hoshi wo.

name: Astor: Blade of the Monolith
summary:
Journey across Gliese, a mystical world under threat by dark forces in this vibrant, action RPG. Aided by a mysterious presence, embark on a dangerous adventure with the power of the Runic Swarm in your hands. Crush the minions of evil on your path to fulfill your destiny and become the planet’s savior.

Aided by a mysterious presence, embark on a dangerous adventure with the power of the Runic Swarm in your hands. Crush the minions of evil on your path to fulfill your destiny and become the planet’s savior.

Play as Astor—a young Diokek engaged in a fight for his world’s survival as he attempts to unearth the secrets of the past. Learn new abilities, gain magical powers, and collect legendary weapons on your quest to stop an unholy ritual.

name: Astro Defender
summary: Defend Zytherion in frantic battles against alien hordes! In Astro Defender, pilot the legendary Zenith-01 and face a galactic threat in a fast-paced action-platformer. Will you be the galaxy's last hope?

name: A Snail's Pace
summary: It was all a normal day in the garden, Jerry the snail was relaxing. Then he heard the screams of the locals being terrorized by the Beetle. It was on this day that he made it his mission to take down the Beetle and restore order to the garden as it was meant to be.

name: Astrostrike
summary: You are the captain of the Galactic battleship, building hundreds of gun turrets, raising dozens of space fighters, establishing aircraft carrier groups, space stations, and conquering the entire Milky Way

name: Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD
summary:
"Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD" was announced on September 10, 2013 and would be re-released as for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows via the PlayStation Network, Xbox Live Arcade and Steam, respectively, in 2014. The new version features visuals closer to Assassin's Creed III as well as updated audio, AI and facial animations. Additional missions have been added while some of the Vita-specific touch screen missions and the multiplayer mode have been removed.

On July 11, 2022, Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD was removed from purchase on Steam. Furthermore, it was announced that all DLC and online features would subsequently be inaccessible to players after September 1, 2022.

name: Assassin's Creed III
summary:
The American Colonies, 1775. A brave young warrior fights to save his homeland. But what begins as a struggle over territory turns into an extraordinary journey that will transform him into a Master Assassin—and will forever change the destiny of a nation.

You are Connor, warrior son of a Native American mother and British father. As the colonies draw closer to revolution, you will dedicate your life to the freedom of your clan –becoming the spark that ignites the revolution into full blaze. Your crusade will take you through blood-soaked battlefields to crowded city streets, to perilous wilderness and beyond. You will not only witness history—you will make it.
Welcome to an entirely new chapter in the Assassin’s Creed saga.

name: Assassin's Creed: Ezio Trilogy
summary:
Assassin's Creed: Ezio Trilogy is a collection of the three main series Assassin's Creed games that feature Ezio Auditore da Firenze: Assassin's Creed II, Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood, and Assassin's Creed: Revelations. The Bonfire of the Vanities, the Battle of Forlì, and the exclusive black 'Bonus Skin'. DLC for Assassin's Creed II is only available with the PS3 version; The xbox 360 version only includes the original games.

The Ezio Trilogy was released for PC in German language only.

name: Assimilate! (A Party Game)
summary: Play with 5-10 players online or locally in this 50s-themed, social deduction party game about a cleverly-disguised robot infiltrating a local, "humans only" sockhop!

name: As We Unite
summary: As We Unite is a political strategy simulation game where you play as a high-ranking Consul of a secretive cult aiming to unite the world before an impending global calamity. Instead of controlling a country, you manage agents across different nations, each run has a crisis you have to resolve!

name: Assault Suits Valken 2
summary: The sequel to the SNES title in the series released on the Sony PlayStation. It differed from the rest of the series, as it was a Strategy/RPG, unlike the rest, all being Action/Shooter/Platform titles. After the release in 1999, the same game would be reprinted by the company Four Winds on August 30, 2001. This game was never released outside Japan either.

name: Ash Survival
summary: An open-world survival game set on a remote island—survive dynamic weather, ride vehicles, fight wildlife, build your base, and trade with others in a player-driven world.

name: Assetto Corsa: Dream Pack 3
summary: Welcome to DREAM PACK 3, the newest add-on content pack ASSETTO CORSA. This package adds to Assetto Corsa the legendary circuit of Brands Hatch (UK) and eight new awesome cars in nine total versions. The circuit has been reproduced using the Laserscan Technology, that guarantees the maximum level of precision in reproducing each detail...

name: Astérix & Obélix
summary: Game Boy port of Asterix & Obelix.

name: Assault CorpsII
summary: "Assault Corps 2" (AssaultCorps, referred to as AC) is a full 3D multiplayer real-time strategy game.The game is a MOBA style Game and was developed by independent game studio(5 members). You can experience 18 kinds of distinctive combat units in the game，such as: combat robot、infantry fighting vehicle、tank、 self-propelled gun、helicopter、plane、gunship etc and 30+ distinctive ammo. You can develop more than 10 kinds of technology to enhance your combat units' s ability. This game include 9 maps and 12 game modes to play. We're working hard to add more units, more maps, more game modes. We hope you like this game, support us, for better game !

name: Astronaut: The Moon Eclipse
summary:
Need your help! We must urgently send you into outer space so that you can stop the flow.
Asteroids are getting closer to our planet!

name: Astonishing
summary: This game features a retro cartoon style with bright and magical elements, creating a strong fairy tale atmosphere at first glance.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Underground Armory Pack
summary:
'Always be better prepared than your enemies with these new additions to your armory.
Arm and protect your assassin with:
- 2 complete outfits and 2 pieces of gear for additional customization options.
- 3 pistols and 2 swords to show off your combat skills.

name: A Second Chance
summary: With great power comes great responsibility. Take control of all the crazy NASA Ground Control buttons on a mission to save the world.

name: A Street Cat's Tale 2: Out side is Dangerous
summary: A Street Cat's Tale 2 follows Cinnamon, who wanders out the window in pursuit of a butterfly. It is a Sokoban-based, narrative-led puzzle adventure game about the struggles of stray cats.

name: Assault on Everest
summary: A seemingly cancelled game from Take Two Interactive, with cinematic sequences. It was previewed in some magazines and had a very small presence at Summer CES 1994. Aside from the few information that has come to light, the title was patented in 1994.

name: Assassin's Creed: Bloodlines
summary: Assassin’s Creed: Bloodlines on PSP is the first Assassin’s Creed game on the PSP system. It follows the story of Altair right after the events of Assassin’s Creed as Altair tracks down the last Templars who fled the Holy Land and retreated to the Island of Cyprus.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Legacy of the First Blade
summary: The expansion introduces players to the first person to ever use the Hidden Blade and will reveal more about the history that ultimately led to the formation of the Assassins.

name: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Ultimate Edition
summary: Write your epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in a world shaped by your choices. Get powerful gear, two new stories across six episodes in the season pass, and Assassin's Creed III Remastered for 4K and HDR upon its release.

name: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Gold Edition
summary:
Write your own epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in Assassin's Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny and define your own path in a world on the brink of tearing itself apart. Influence how history unfolds as you experience a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.

The Gold Edition includes the Season Pass.

name: Assassin's Creed Origins + Odyssey Double Pack
summary:
Take part in epic adventures and explore gigantic countries thanks to this Assassin's Creed Odyssey + Assassin's Creed Origins double Pack. Discover the secrets behind the Great Pyramids and explore ancient Greece where you will experience a completely new way to fight while tackling memorable quests.

Write your own epic Odyssey and become a legendary Greek hero in Assassin's Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny in a world where every choice matters. Influence how history unfolds as you discover a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.

Assassin's Creed Origins is a new beginning. Experience a new way to fight while exploring the Great Pyramids and hidden tombs across the country of Ancient Egypt. Live emotional and memorable adventures along your journey, and discover the origin story of the Assassin's Brotherhood.

name: Assassin of Goblin
summary: Play as warrior and try to beat green goblin in 9 different levels and find captured skulls in this medieval rpg adventure

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: The Lost Tales of Greece
summary: The Lost Tales of Greece is a downloadable content for Assassin's Creed: Odyssey. It consists of 12 episodes, providing new quests featuring new and familiar characters.

name: Assassin's Creed Mythology Pack
summary: A bundle including three Assassin's Creed titles: Assassin's Creed Valhalla, Assassin's Creed Odyssey, and Assassin's Creed Origins.

name: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Deluxe Edition includes:

The Kronos Pack (Including 5 epic pieces of armour, 1 epic weapon, 1 epic mount).
The Herald of Dusk Pack (Including 5 rare pieces of armour, 1 rare weapon).
The Capricornus Naval Pack (Including 1 ship design, 1 crew theme).
1 Temporary XP Boost.
1 Temporary Drachm.

name: Assassin's Creed Bundle: Assassin's Creed Valhalla, Assassin's Creed Odyssey, and Assassin's Creed Origins
summary: A bundle including three Assassin's Creed titles: Assassin's Creed Valhalla, Assassin's Creed Odyssey, and Assassin's Creed Origins.

name: Astrodition
summary: In this space adventure game set on Ceres, you'll find yourself using the resources from your crashed ship to stay alive and solve the mystery of why it failed, can you get off of the surface alive?

name: Astromine
summary: Astromine is a co-op survival game about scavenging fully destructible voxel planets. Land on planets and gather enough materials to fight off alien creatures, build structures and spaceships, and conquer the solar system

name: Ash Warden
summary: Ash Warden is a fast-paced tower defense where you click to shoot enemies, teleport between three towers, and upgrade skills to survive relentless Redgaze waves.

name: Astro Fighters 2
summary: Astro Fighters 2 is a vertical scrolling bullet hell shooter designed to test your skills with non-stop arcade style action. Use a variety of special items, power up your chosen ship and compete for the high score across 4 difficulty modes to be the best fighter pilot in the game.

name: Asteroid Invaders
summary: Asteroid Invaders is fast-paced, neo-classic space shooter game. Remastered with compelling, graphics, music,enemies, bosses and weapons.

name: Astral Ascent: Yamat - The Breach Traveler
summary: Play as Yamat, a powerful dark mage that summons wild creatures and can fight with her magic fists, a bow and a two-handed greatsword!

name: Assassin's Creed Origins: The Curse of the Pharaohs
summary:
The Curse of the Pharaohs is a downloadable content expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Origins, set to be released in March 2018. It is the second out of two expansion packs for the game, alongside The Hidden Ones.

The Curse of the Pharaohs sees Bayek travel to Thebes and the Valley of the Kings, where he will uncover a mystery that will develop into a "living nightmare" for Bayek. Further exploring Egyptian mythology, the expansion pits Bayek against mythical beasts and dead pharaohs.

name: Aston
summary: The aim of the game is to find the passwords of the encrypted doors in the rooms and finish the game.

name: Astroplanet
summary: You have damaged the ship and ended up on a mysterious planet where the air is unsuitable for breathing. You have to save yourself by creating an atmosphere suitable for life. Build a base, master resource management, terraform the planet, and grow food so you don't starve to death.

name: Astral Survivor
summary: Astral Survivor is a horde survival game starring characters from Firedog's mobile game Astral Stairways.

name: A Song of Sunlight
summary: An RPG set in a distant, lonely future. Follow Arem, a young man lured from his small island community to explore the desolate megastructure beneath it: “The Well.” With the simple goal of finding the exit, Arem will burden himself with something more terrible than he ever thought possible.

name: Assassin's Creed
summary: Assassin's Creed is a non-linear action-adventure video game, during which the player controls a 12th-century Levantine Assassin named Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad during the Third Crusade, whose life is experienced through the Animus by his 21st century descendant, Desmond Miles.

name: Astalon: Tears of the Earth
summary: Three explorers wander through a post-apocalyptic desert to find a way to save the people in their village. A dark, twisted tower has been pushed up from the depths of the Earth... but does it hold the answers they seek?

name: Astra: Knights of Veda
summary:
Astra: Knights of Veda is a visually stunning, story-rich, 2D RPG. A dark plague besets the world of Planis, perptrated through a dark ritual performed by the Mad King. You, and the other Knights of Veda, are the only ones who can bring normality back to the world.

Journey through this dark medieval fantasy world. Fatal challenges await in all corners of the world. Endless undead and beasts charge at you in the Nightmare, and difficult bosses wait in their Sealed Prisons. Stand alone and fight these monstrosities, and get rewards to make your Knights of Veda stronger.

As the Master of the Book, it is up to you to utilize the Knights of Veda in the best way possible to confront challenging but well designed bosses and monsters. Each Knight of Veda wields various skills and weapons, so make use of them as best as possible.
You'll be able to journey with up to 4 Knights of Veda in your party, or play co-op mode and explore the challenges ahead together.

name: Astellia Royal
summary: Astellia Royal is an online MMORPG focusing on strategic battles with Astels(summoned creatures) where CCG factors are added. Various PvP and PvE contents spreading out in vast fields are offered, such as the breathtaking battle between three factions, dungeons, life contents(crafting, gathering).

name: AshGuine Story III: Fukushuu no Honoo
summary: Seven years ago, the father and mother of the Reptile-Human ASHGUINE were killed by the Ghouls. But now, changing his appearance with the help of an old machine, Ashguine is the only one to launch a counter-attack on the enemy armies. It's time for revenge.

name: Astrosmash
summary: Astrosmash was originally a Shoot´em up game for the Intellivision console in 1981. This reimagined version is based on the game’s original theme and gameplay but much more exciting and challenging. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music adds a lot of excitement.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2: Remaster - Limited Edition
A Storied Life: Tabitha
summary: A wholesome narrative puzzle game about the objects we leave behind and the stories they tell. Complete a loved one's damaged memoirs by exploring their home and packing away their things.

name: ASMR Journey: Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: The journey starts with a girl opening the door to her bookstore in the corner of living room. It was the little witch who sell magic books. At hand was his new volume, with a peculiar name. But what journey would that be? Maybe we all need to know. The secrete for a creative and serene mind is the magic for an eternal life Features: - Zoom the scene; - Highlight border pieces; - Shuffle the remaining pieces; - Preview the image complete;

name: Astoria: Fate's Kiss
summary: Just one kiss will change the fate of Olympus forever.

name: Astra Bestiary
summary: Raise Beasts from eggs into powerful Champions in this 2D monster-raising/taming RPG. Feed, train and evolve your partners to explore a perilous, non-linear world. Master fast-paced, tactical battles, uncover the secrets of a fading world and pass on the Beasts' legacy across generations.

name: Asuka 120% Burning Fest. Exallent
summary: The original anime fighter finally returns! Working with the series’ original designer, Masatoshi Imaizumi, Asuka 120% BURNING Fest. EXALLENT brings back the whole cast from every title in the series. Each character has all of their special moves from past games and also newly added animated special moves as well as the devastating new super moves called EXALLENT NOVA. Background characters are now animated and each stage is accompanied by a new soundtrack by returning series composer, Keishi Yonao. 5 soundtracks are included so you can choose your favorite arrangement before each match. Series vocalist, Reika, is also back singing the new theme song, Do Not. Renowned illustrator and animator from the Urusei Yatsura and Ranma 1/2 reboots, Yo-co brings her stylish 90’s style to the classic Asuka 120% character designs. The story mode is also now fully translated into English for the first time ever! Based upon the fan favorites, utilize clashes and evades to gain an advantage. Move through the air using various types of jumps and cancels to surprise your opponent. Cancel a wide variety of movements like your guard stun, jumps and even specials to keep the pressure up. All of the advanced movement mechanics expected in a modern fighter are all here. Take advantage of the Training Mode to practice real battle situations and optimize your combos.

name: Astroball
summary: Astroball is a physics based platformer set in space. Explore 31 levels full of different obstacles and paths, unlocking unique skins that alter the physics of your ball, on your way to collect all the gold medals!

name: Astral Shipwright
summary: Build and upgrade your personal ship to travel around a strange new planet.

name: A Short Hike
summary: Hike, climb, and soar through the peaceful mountainside landscapes of Hawk Peak Provincial Park as you make your way to the summit.

name: A Short Death
summary: A short 3D Platformer and Collectathon situated in Hell. Play as a humble cat (with wings!) and get to the top of the mysterious tower!

name: Assault Heroes
summary:
Assault Heroes is an arcade-style scrolling dual-joystick shooter where the player drives 4x4s or speedboats, sometimes moving around on-foot.

Like most dual-joystick shooters, one stick controls the movement of the player while the right stick directs your gunfire. The objective of the game is to progress through each level, defeating enemies and huge bosses. Vehicle and player health slowly regenerate, while vehicles can be instantly repaired with a special pick-up item. Once your vehicle is destroyed, you run around on foot. You're limited to a weak machine gun, but get double points for destroyed enemies. Once you lose all your health, you lose a life. After about 10 seconds of being on foot, your vehicle respawns.

name: Astonishing Basketball Manager
summary: The ultimate basketball manager game. Become the best coach of the league and build your own basketball dynasty!

name: Ashentia Hauntings
summary: Ashentia Hauntings is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a paranormal enthusiast called Noah, who decided to investigate the various haunted locations of Ashentia, a place that is surrounded by hills and forests.

name: A Street Cat's Tale
summary: A Tale of a street cat left alone. It's up to you to help this poor, lost kitten survive until it's old enough to take care of itself.

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Ultimate Edition
Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection
summary:
Make history as the legendary Master Assassin, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, in Assassin’s Creed The Ezio Collection, which includes the acclaimed single-player campaigns and single-player add-on content (no multiplayer content) from Assassin’s Creed II, Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood, and Assassin’s Creed Revelations with enhanced
graphics.

Live the life of Ezio and learn the ways of the Assassin as he seeks vengeance for the betrayal of his family. Travel through 15th-century Renaissance Italy, including the capital Rome and finally onto 16th-century Constantinople.

name: A Sad Journey
summary: A wonderful third-person adventure game about a rabbit looking for his missing parents. In this journey you will search for Paws that will take you to special places where you will get your memories back.

name: Assassin's Creed Origins: Secrets of the First Pyramids
summary: Bayek meets a scholar named Merkes, who reveals that he is on a quest to uncover a vault that once belonged to the Pharaoh Sneferu, credited with building three revolutionary pyramids. Bayek agrees to help Merkes bring closure to his findings.

name: A Small Favor
summary:
In a distant alien galaxy, where currency has been replaced with trade and favors, guide an assassin on a small favor to eliminate a prominent Senator.

Some game notes:
-Your decisions matter, your rank is dependent on the choices you make throughout the game.
-Favor collection is completely optional
-If you complete favors without being asked, you're a really good Samaritan. Unfortunately you won't get credit for them.

A Kickstarter for a PC/Mac version was launched, but unsuccessful in 2013.

name: Astyanax
summary:
It is a 2D action platform game focused on hack and slash and spell casting. The game consists of six linear levels of which each has two sub-levels meaning the game consists of 12 level in total. After every level there is a cut-scene pushing the story forward.

There are three weapons - an axe, a spear and a big sword. An axe is a basic weapon the hero holds at the beginning of the game. The player can upgrade the axe using a power-up which has the shape of a small axe. The spear is the second stage of the weapon upgrade system and the big sword is the final stage. The big sword is the most powerful melee weapon in the game.

The player can cast three magic spells which using is limited by the magic meter. The first is "Bind", which stops the time altogether with the enemies in the level. The second is "Blast", which casts fire balls destroying all enemies visible on the screen at the time of the casting. The third is "Bolt", which has the form of a lightning strike and acts similarly to "Blast".

name: Asura's Wrath Episode 11.5
summary: Forging Ahead is the special lost 11.5th episode of Asura's Wrath from the DLC featuring unseen events after Episode 11: The Final Lesson.

name: Ash & Rust
summary: The next generation of ARPG is finally here! Fight your way through mysterious places, face mighty foes, and construct the perfect build. Enemies are strong and smart, but you'll have a massive arsenal of tools and abilities to master in order to vanquish them. Dive in!

name: Ash & Adam's Existential Treads
summary: A mini action city-builder in a post-post-apocalyptic world. Grow your settlement. Fend off waves of enemies. Restore nature.

name: Astroneer: Glitchwalkers Edition
summary: This bundle includes the ASTRONEER base game and the Glitchwalkers DLC.

name: Astra Strike
summary: Astra Strike is a team-based first-person tactical shooter set in the near future. Players play as one agent In the main game mode, players are assigned to either the attacking or defending team with each team having five players on it. Players have abilities.

name: Asteroid Odyssey
summary: Gather and refine resources, shoot your way through countless asteroids and other celestial bodies to gather and refine useful resources from them to build the biggest and the most powerful spaceship-base.

name: Astro Surge
summary: Dive into retro twin-stick chaos in Astro Surge! Shoot through endless waves, level up fast, and unleash pixel-powered mayhem in space.

name: AshGuine Story II: Kokuu no Gajou
summary: The time had come to put an end to the long and unproductive battle. This was brought about by the Azumural, the third race that came from the heavens. While both countries were fighting, the Azumural steadily developed their scientific capabilities and in the end even acquired aviation technology. They got to know about the world beyond the Ring. Because of their brutal nature they made a temporary alliance with the Ghouls and invaded Eletria. The balance of fight largely deteriorated and the Eletrians barricaded themselves in the last remaining fortress Nesha Castle

name: ASMR Pressure Wash VR
summary: Get ready to clean and shine like never before! Wash cars and other objects using powerful tools in a fun, immersive VR experience. Enjoy realistic washing mechanics and vibrant graphics as you transform dirty items into spotless masterpieces.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Epic Map Pack
summary: Play with half a dozen new maps and a new scenario in this first content pack for Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation.

name: Asteroid Miner
summary: An idle space mining simulator that lets you scan, extract, and refine asteroids while upgrading ships and managing resources.

name: Assetto Corsa: Ready to Race Pack
summary: "Ready To Race" includes 10 new cars from AUDI, Lotus, McLaren, Maserati and Toyota, providing the "most wanted" models ready to race! Our all new RTR DLC provides a great variety of models that mix technology, power, history and design from Italy, Germany, Great Britain and Japan, resulting in a package designed to...

name: Asleep: Act 1
summary: Immersed in her nightmares, in a chaotic reality, confused and all alone. The only safe place is her room, but not forever... She wanders through an empty city and strange places while fleeing from creatures lurking in the darkness to find out what's going on. You are in the skin of Ana Lúcia.

name: Astral Fantasy
summary: Astral Fantasy is an indie RPG created by EpsilonEagle. It's a space fantasy adventure that would fit right along side games like the Phantasy Star series.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
summary: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir is an action platformer and the only game in the XXL series which offers cooperative gameplay. Platforming is very different to the previous games in the series: the player can no longer jump vertically and should be more careful when moving around. The Crystal Menhir is used to clear obstacles from paths and interact with mechanisms.

name: Astérix and the Power of the Gods
summary: Emperor Caesar's forces have stolen the legendary shield of Vercingetorix and it is Asterix and Obelix's mission to return it to the Gaulish village. Play as either character as your adventure takes you through over 20 levels, through Lutetia, Egypt, Alexandria and Mesopotamia on your way to Rome itself!

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Time Saver - Collectibles Pack
summary: This pack will save you time by revealing all of the collectibles locations on your map. Note that you will still need to travel to these locations and beat the game play in order to get the rewards.

name: Astral Space
summary: Have you ever controlled a game without using a keyboard or a mouse? Yes, This is possible. We have developed a Artificial Intelligence-based game that gives you the ability to control the ball's movement and directions via hand movements, the challenge is to gain as many points as possible.

name: A Shlong Adventure
summary: Embark on an action based shooting adventure as a penis fighting waves of enemies and solving puzzles/challenges while you help a new found friend in his fight to avenge his fallen comrades!

name: Assia: Returning to Dreams
summary: Assia:Returning to Dreams "is a 3D jumping parkour game. Is the lonely temple in the snow-white world, strange sculptures that resemble oneself, magnified objects, escaping or returning to a dream? In order to return to her village, Assia embarked on her own journey.

name: Astropark
summary: Astropark is a single-player VR game where you explore the Solar System through interactive, science-based missions. Adjust gravity, launch rockets, and discover real planets in a fun, educational, and non-violent space adventure.

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Deluxe Edition
summary: Asterigos Deluxe Edition includes the base game and Call of the Paragons DLC.

name: Asphyxiation
summary: Asphyxiation is an atmospheric horror game where you need to escape the facility before you go insane and run out of air.

name: Astrog
summary: ASTROG is a top-down action game with exploration, crafting, survival, role-playing and roguelike elements. Explore dynamically generated space, collect relics and artefacts, mine resources, upgrade your ship, experiment with skill combinations and fight hordes of enemies.

name: Asteria
summary: Asteria is a fast paced indie platformer, wrapped up in a sandbox sci-fi world where everything is destructible, mineable, collectable, craftable and creatable. You play Ryker: the only surviving human colonist after your people were wiped out by local aliens. Now you’re stranded on Asteria, with no means of escape. This isn’t just about survival, it’s about revenge. Build your safe haven and go track down the aliens who destroyed your colony.

name: Ase Online
summary: This is a private server of ( Silkroad Online ) game.

name: Assassin's Creed: Anthology
summary:
Assassin's Creed Anthology is a compilation of all the games in the Assassin's Creed series that were previously released on home consoles:

- Assassin's Creed
- Assassin's Creed II (Game of the Year Edition)
- Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations
- Assassin's Creed III

They come bundled with a steelbook, five lithographs (one for each game), all the DLC available as redeemable codes (apart from Assassin's Creed II, which bonus content is on disc) and a season pass for the Assassin's Creed III DLC. The Anthology was exclusive to Europe, Middle East, Africa and Australia territories.

name: AstraX
summary: AstraX is a relaxing 2D single player space simulation game inspired by the likes of Freelancer or StarCitizen. Dive into a vast, procedurally generated galaxy. Explore the universe in spacecraft you created. Trade and collect valuable resources.

name: Assenizator
summary: Become a sewage disposal worker and help Petrovich cope with all the difficulties of this difficult profession!

name: Asphalt: Urban GT
summary:
Asphalt Urban GT is a racing video game for the Nintendo DS and the Nokia N-Gage handheld video game consoles. It was developed by Gameloft and published by Ubisoft, and released on November 21, 2004, making it one of the DS launch titles. It has support for wireless multiplayer with up to four opponents, and takes advantage of the DS's support for 3D graphics (while showing unaccelerated N-Gage's power to match DS's graphics), showing the action from three camera angles. Replays are also available. The bottom screen of the DS is utilized to provide strategic tips and player information.

The game sports nine tracks modelled after real-world locations such as Paris and New York City. The game's 23 cars are licensed from real manufacturers such as Lamborghini, Hummer, Volkswagen, and others, and can be enhanced with over 30 addons

name: Asteroid Commando
summary: A vector graphics arcade game for iOS and Apple Watch. Pilot your ship as you blast asteroids in search of priceless gems. Battle alien pirates and avoid deadly space mines.

name: Ashes of the Singularity II
summary: In this massive RTS game, command vast armies fighting for control of entire worlds. Control the forces of Earth, the mechanical AI Substrate, or the enigmatic Post-Human Coalition as you battle across the solar system in single player, cooperative multiplayer, or competitive multiplayer.

name: ASH: Archaic Sealed Heat
summary: Newly crowned Queen Aisya has to find the bracelet of her kingdom of Millinear in order to restore it after the fiend named Salamander put it to ruin. ASH: Archaic Sealed Heat is a game of mixed RPG genres with movement being done as a turn based tactical RPG and the combat itself being carried out in a traditional turn based RPG style. Players can only control up to three characters when in turn based battle. The game also features permadeath so taking care of characters is of utmost importance.

name: Asterix
summary: Asterix is a horizontal-scrolling beat'em up arcade game released in 1992 by Konami. It is based on the French comic series Asterix and Obelix. The player fights as either Asterix the Gaul or his best friend, Obelix, as they take on the 'might' of the oppressive Roman Empire. Asterix includes a variety of humorous fighting moves, which are demonstrated in the game's attract mode. The artwork and feel of Asterix remains true to its French source material, and the game's many humorous touches (such as the way defeated Legionnaires crawl away) will be instantly familiar to fans of the comic-book and cartoon series. Bonus levels - such as the chariot race that awaits at the end of the first level - introduce different gameplay elements to provide a break from the fighting.

name: Astérix: These Romans Are Crazy!
summary: Astérix: These Romans are Crazy! is a board game that can be played against CPU or a live player, taking turns on the same device. The game is played using only a stylus. The first player to cross the finish line wins.

name: Aspire: Ina's Tale
summary: Aspire: Ina's Tale is a 2D, adventure puzzle game. Set out on a fantastical adventure as Ina and take a journey of self-discovery against the backdrop of dazzling, mystical landscapes of The Tower. Experience her fear turn to conviction as she unravels her purpose in this world and embarks on a one-way path to freedom.

name: Astro VR
summary: Freely travel among the stars and planets in this VR only astronomy simulation. Experience space from some of the smallest solar system bodies to the largest stars. See planets, moons, asteroids, trans-Neptunian objects and, of course, thousands of stars and their exoplanets.

name: Ashen Falls
summary: Ashen Falls is a psychological survival horror game set in the deserted industrial town of Ashen Falls. A group of urban explorers descend to explore the area, only to find it is not as abandoned as they once thought.

name: ASMR Slicing
summary:
Choose your favorite cutting tool no matter if it's a playing card, flosser or just a simple kitchen knife. Just cut, cut, cut and experience those satisfying ASMR
sounds! Slice a variety of colorful objects made of kinetic sand in the shapes of food, toys, buildings, everyday objects and ordinary cubes or blocks!

Need to raise the difficulty level a bit? Turn on the challenge mode! Cut off the right weight, divide an object into a given number of parts, cut an item perfectly in half, or find things hidden inside!

name: Astérix: Search for Dogmatix
summary:
If you have trouble choosing between an adventure game with a suspenseful, in-depth investigation and a game of skill made for joystick fanatics, "Asterix: search for Dogmatix" is just for you!

If you play in "adventure" mode, you set out to search for Dogmatix in six worlds and 30 levels (taking you on journeys throughout Gaul, Egypt, Rome, etc.). And the dozen or so mini-games in "instant fun" mode are sure to keep your fingers busy between two stations on the underground.

There's a catch, though: to access the whole set of mini-games, you have to win Bonus Tokens by playing in "adventure" mode. By Belenos, this is a game for the truly indomitable!

name: Astronomics
summary: Command a customizable star ship, assemble a faithful crew of bots and automate your asteroid mining operation as you save up for that ticket to Earth so you can finally come home... for the very first time.

name: As Expected of the Demon Lord
summary: Become a Demon Lord, who rules over and manages his dungeon. Listen to what creatures have to say to you, then make a yes or no decision. Will you succeed in growing your dungeon, or will you make it fall?

name: A-Spec: First Assault
summary: Engaging space combat simulator, using a realistic flight system with Newtonian physics, sophisticated and diverse gameplay featuring detailed ship systems, including ship weaponry and module customization.

name: Ashen Wilds
summary: Ashen Wilds is a challenging survival experience set in a ruthless open world. Gather valuable resources, build and expand your base, and face deadly creatures lurking in the shadows. In this world, trust is a luxury – other survivors might be your allies… or your downfall. Every day brings new dangers, every night new horrors. Only those who plan wisely and fight fiercely will survive the Ashen Wilds.

name: Astropulse: Reincarnation
summary: Set on a war-torn future Earth where the planet's biological evolution was drastically altered by a meteorite strike

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: GT4 Pack DLC
summary: The GT4 PACK DLC for Assetto Corsa Competizione brings the new GT4 Season Championship mode and 11 new cars, meticulously reproduced from the official GT4 European Series by SRO Motorsports Group.

name: Astrobit
summary: A free PvP space shooter with epic RPG mechanics. Upgrade your ship and explore new builds every match by combining different weapons, skills and abilities. Be a swift assassin, a tanky heavy-hitter, or go deep into magic to destroy your opponent and climb the ranks. The choice is yours!

name: Astra Noctis
summary: Astra Noctis is a Metroidvania more focused on combat than exploration. It contains some RPG touches, such as the inventory and equipment system. These systems encourage experimentation and the creation of different builds and playstyles.

name: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission: Wifix
summary: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission Wifix is a redesigned port of Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission Las Vegum as a side-scrolling game employing 3D graphics. The game includes four mini-games that are played using the DS stylus and can also be accessed from the main menu outside the game. Two more mini-games are available in wireless multiplayer mode.

name: Astrovity
summary: Help find Astra's parents on a mission throughout the galaxy! Traverse hundreds of handcrafted levels to save your family somewhere in the vast expanse of space!

name: Ashen Arrows
summary: Ashen Arrows is a Nordic mythology-themed VR archery game featuring roguelike gameplay, tower defense elements, and puzzles.

name: Assault Suit Leynos
summary: A classic reawakens – Assault Suit Leynos is back and in high definition! Get ready for all-out robotic war as the fan-favourite Mega Drive classic is reworked with all new HD visuals for the ultimate alien-blasting experience!

name: A Summer's End: Hong Kong 1986
summary:
A Summer’s End - Hong Kong 1986 is a visual novel game. Follow the story of Michelle and Sam, and how their chance meeting evolves into a deeper romantic relationship. A Summer’s End is a romance story between two women. Set in vibrant Hong Kong in the year 1986, it is an original story about love, family, and culture.

Inspired by Hong Kong cinema, 80s anime, and city pop, A Summer’s End - Hong Kong 1986 is a visual delight for fans of retro art and fashion.

name: Asteroidea
summary: Asteroidea is a 2D action-exploration game where you play as a starfish in a vibrant alien sea. Meet many interesting ocean-dwellers and collect shiny items. The game features Twitch integration in the form of guest fish who interact with the world and earn things, too.

name: Astrododge
summary:
Astrododge is an unlicensed SG-1000/SC-3000 game developed and published by Revival Studios. It was released in early 2013 - two and a half decades after the last officially licensed SG-1000 game, The Black Onyx in 1987. The game is relatively simple - all the user must do is dodge asteroids while travelling upwards. The game is available in both cartridge and cassette form. 
 
The SG-1000 is one of many platforms to receive this game. The basic concept was created by Revival Studios in 2008 for CHIP-8 compatible systems of the late 1970s before being retooled for the Magnavox/Philips Odyssey² in 2011. Near identical copies to this SG-1000 version are available for the ColecoVision and MSX.

name: Assault on Hartblood Hotel
summary:
Three assassins from an underground syndicate raise hell inside the Hartblood Hotel. Their mission: To huntdown the owner. Follow orders as given. Do not question authority.

A timer has been set for you to die over and over. Every 10 seconds, a new curse to bear. Don’t get sloppy now; it’s bad for the skin.

Kill everyone as fast as you can and avoid the burden of The Seal.

And may God have mercy on their souls.

name: Astro Dash
summary: A colourful retro physics game for causal and pro gamers alike. Whizzing round the cosmos in your flying saucer dodging asteroids, black holes, cannon fire & assorted obstacles picking up crystals. Thrusting, dodging & speeding through the 30 obstacle filled levels.

name: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood Mobile
summary: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood is a mobile platform game developed by Gameloft and released alongside the main console game of the same name in 2010.

name: Assemble!: Classic and Future Vehicles
summary:
Car enthusiasts and fans of future mobility will get their hands on a total of 5 vehicles with different levels of difficulty and details.
Vehicles overview:
Sportscar a fast vehicle for the road and the track
The Jeep, inspired by the classic
The Concept Car 002, a more futuristic concept car for the road
The Concept Car 006, a modern electric SUV
The Muscle Car based on the 1960 classic everyone loves.

name: Asteroids
summary: In 1992, Accolade published a port of the 1979 classic "Asteroids" to the original Game Boy in Europe. It was later released in 1995 worldwide in a bundle with Missile Command.

name: AstralAir no Shiroki Towa Finale: Shiroki Hoshi no Yume
summary:
The town of Tsukigasaki has entered its third year of winter.

Showing the seasons no mind, the snow only continues to fall.
Gently, swaying in the air, as it descends downwards.
That snow, which never had reached the ground, now does.
The cityscape, once bleak, is now a blanket of glistening white.

Just as no single snowflake is identical to another,
each and every set of footprints on this snow-laden path are different from one another.

No path can ever be retraced, for by the time you've looked to your back, those footprints will but all have melted away.
As though a beckoning light, signalling that the road we know of as time is one that goes only forward.

Yet, even from the base of Yggdrasil each branch is visible,
so maybe too, it might be possible to pave new roads, new realities.
Countless snow-laden paths lay stretched out before both human and faerie alike, and among those many happy endings they must choose one which they truly desire.

Now, let us journey forth, in search of those white crystals that bear testament to eternity––––

name: Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory
summary:
A free major update introducing the new region of AlUla and featuring a new story arc for Basim. Players can explore the landscapes of deserts and oases as they uncover family secrets and face a ruthless gang threatening the valley’s peace.

The update also includes many gameplay improvements and changes for the whole game, including smoother parkour and mobility improvements, replayable missions and challenges, customizable experience with new difficulty levels, skills and tools customization and expanded features and fixes.

name: Assault
summary: A mothership drops aliens, up to three on screen at a time. There are ten per level. You must shoot them but avoid the items they fire at you. You fire by pushing up on the joystick. Pushing left or right makes you go left or right. If you hold down the button, pushing left or right makes you fire left or right. Later enemies will drop fireballs that chase you along the ground or split in two smaller enemies when shot. If you fire non-stop, you will build up heat as indicated by the green bar at the bottom right. If you overheat or are hit by an enemy, you loser a life. The game is over when you lose all lives or reach a score of 999,999. You get a new man (4 max) every 10,000 points.

name: Asteroid Bounty Hunter
summary: Asteroid Bounty Hunter is a space shooter mixed with interesting boss fights and breathtaking visuals, with a reward system to take your skill to another level.

name: Astro Pig
summary: A 90-s inspired lo-fi adventure puzzle platformer about a piglet astronaut and his intelligent ship.

name: Asterika: Phantom Rose Refrain
summary: Asterika is a grid-based rhythm game about movement and flow. Move with the beat, weave through obstacles, and adapt to shifting tempos and patterns. Features optional narrative story and a custom beatmap editor.

name: Ashes of the Ark
summary: Built exclusively for VR, Ashes of the Ark puts you into a survival situation where zombies have taken over the failing space station. Handle the most realistic weapons with real-life movements, freely explore the Ark, and solve puzzles in VR. Can you stop the Flood before they reach the cryo-sector?

name: Asteroid Run: No Questions Asked
summary: Captain! You have limited resources, desperate crew, strange cargo and a Company Man spying on you. Good luck crossing the Solar System with corrupt cops, cultists and terrorists on your tail: and don't be late!

name: Astro Bot: Stellar Speedway
summary:
Free DLC that brings new speedrun levels and bots to rescue. It has weekly release schedule:

- Oct 17: Building Speed
- Oct 24: Let it Slide
- Oct 31: Spring-loaded Run
- Nov 7: Helium Heights
- Nov 14: Rising Heat

Each new level offers two brand-new Special Bots for you to rescue.

name: Ashfield Hollow
summary: Ten years after the outbreak, you’re found unconscious and taken in by a camp of survivors. Learn to fight, scavenge, farm, and craft as you rebuild your life, form bonds, and maybe even find love in this post-apocalyptic life sim RPG.

name: Aspectus: Rinascimento Chronicles
summary: Netherlands, 1520. The Destroyers of the Art come out of paintings and materialize from statues, they come to infect the Art and wreck the city. To trap them, help Mr. Bruesen create the Aspectus, the Perfect Painting, before the time runs out. Find the sect of the amorphous creatures and destroy it.

name: Astral Court DX
summary: WUH OH! You're in BIG trouble with the Astral Courthouse, Heaven's one and only courthouse, for a millionth time! If you want to avoid execution, you're in luck! The court has granted you a special challenge, with the reward being you can get off free. You must platform atop of the scales of justice whilst the court throws whatever they can at you during each trial (aka level). In order to pass a trial, you must collect "shinies" - little stars that spawn randomly across the area, you need to meet a certain quota of them to win. Get through all of the court's trials and you're good to go!

name: Astrox: Hostile Space Excavation
summary: Exiled to a deep space mining sector, you are left with a crappy ship, a laser, and a small mining beam. It is up to you to survive by working your way through the galaxy. Mine asteroids, refine and trade the ore, buy upgrades for your ship, hunt pirates... you get it.

name: Assassin's Creed Chronicles: Trilogy Pack
summary:
Expand your Assassin’s Creed experience and discover the forgotten stories of three remarkable Assassins in brand-new settings with fresh 2.5D stealth gameplay:

• Play the adventures of three cult Assassins:
Each chapter comes with a unique hero and a new setting all interconnected through a common plot that will only be revealed at the very end.
• Stealth in a new dimension:
Experience the thrill of being a master Assassin in 2.5D. Sneak and hide to avoid detection and fool enemies using whistles and disguises.
• Experience a fast & fluid "assault course":
Whether you’re running from danger, negotiating obstacles or stealthily climbing you will truly feel the freedom of moving as an Assassin.
• Master three different combat styles:
Each chronicle comes with a different assassin equipped with a distinct range of weapons and gadgets.
• Navigate multiple planes :
Switch between environmental layers and choose the right path according to your needs.

name: Astrumis: Survive Together
summary: A two-player, sci-fi horror co‑op game set aboard an abandoned spaceship, where one player controls a lone survivor hunting for safety and the other operates the ship itself—manipulating cameras, controls, and systems to guide their partner. Together, you'll navigate eerie corridors, solve cooperative puzzles and minigames, and evade an unseen monster stalking the ship's depths in an atmosphere of mounting tension.

name: A Sexy Tour With Stella
summary: Embark on a titillating journey through Canada with Stella, your alluring tour guide. This adults-only "spot the differences" game challenges your keen eye while rewarding your success with seductive reveals.

name: A Simple Love Story
summary: This is a decision making game but with a different atmosphere and style. Created a strong story and unique illustration style for best experience.

name: Asteroid Forward
summary: Asteroid Forward is a spin-off video game from the Asteroid series for PC and mobile devices. Battle your way through space in this side-scrolling action RPG!

name: Astroclone
summary: Astroclone was published in 1984 by Hewson Consultants. Its working title was Seiclone, but was changed to avoid confusion with Vortex Software's similar-sounding Cyclone. The game combines shoot 'em up sections with arcade adventure elements that Turner had developed with Avalon (1984) and Dragontorc (1985).

name: Astronimo
summary:
Astronimo is an Early Access construction platform puzzler that aims to be the most fun you can have in outer space.

While mining for minerals in the vast reaches of the galaxy, four Hypergiant Inc employees crash-land on a small moon and become hopelessly stranded.

In the hopes of reuniting with their fleet, you must help them to cover every inch of the planetary surface, gather all manner of resources to solve puzzles in unique and creative ways, then build a shuttle and fuel it to launch back into space.

name: Astro Fantasia
summary: This is a "Galaga" style vertical shoot'em up with a few unique twists that make it interesting. You pilot a single fighter ship against an armada of enemies (sound familiar?). There are 2 different play screens that alternate.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows
summary: Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny. Master complementary playstyles, create your shinobi league, customize your hideout, and usher in a new era for Japan.

name: A Space for the Unbound
summary: A coming-of-age adventure where you follow two high school sweethearts on a journey of self-discovery at the end of their high school years while facing the end of the world. Explore 90s Indonesian town, uncover its secrets, use supernatural powers to dive into people's hearts, and pet cats.

name: Astro Delivery
summary: Uncover hidden routes to deliver the package in perfect time in this 2D precision platformer.

name: A Silent Desolation
summary: Stranded on Earth centuries after humanity's departure, A Silent Desolation, created by a single developer, immerses you in the mystery of an abandoned world. Craft, explore, and unravel the secrets of a forgotten Earth as you embark on a quest to repair a space shuttle launch base.

name: Ashes of Arcanum
summary: This is a simple engine created based on the TTRPG Ashes of Arcanum.

name: Assault Mayhem
summary: Choose a character and battle through waves of enemies while leveling up and purchasing new weapons and equipment from a mysterious vending machine of unknown origins that spawns at the end of each wave.

name: A Song of Steel and Spirits
summary: Lead a squad of hungover heroes on a quest to find their way back to the surface, traversing deadly dungeons, entrancing enemies, and tavern tabs that far exceed their pockets. Level up your champions, master the grid, outwit foes, and outdrink allies to escape in this brutal tactical pixel-art RPG.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Title Update 1.5.1
summary: This update comes with bug fixes and patches, as well as the Mastery Challenge Pack 2, the annual Ostara Festival, and more.

name: A Spooky Teaparty
summary: Take the role of Rover, Summer, Britton and Marina in this fun, exploration-based Halloween adventure that takes place just after the events of Aplestia! Find treats, solve puzzles, battle with spooky monsters, enter secret rooms and meet with undead, funny characters! Welcome to Duruduru Castle!

name: Ash Asylum
summary: In Ash Asylum you play an amnesiac thrust into a morbid, really creepy universe. After an accident you wake up to find that instead of lying in a hospital, you’re in an asylum with your head wrapped in bandages. Who the hell am I? What am I doing here? How do I escape?

name: A Small Car
summary: Stay on the road and get the small car (that is hard to control) to the end of the level. Can you drive fast enough and get three stars on every track to unlock the special bonus stage?

name: Asuncia: Matsue no Jubaku
summary:
Asuncia: Matsue no Jubaku is a RPG/Tactical RPG game published by Xing Entertainment released on November 27, 1997 for the Sony PlayStation.

Asuncia is a classic 2D Rpg game in which the player control a group of adventures that will travel through a medieval world solving missions. During those journeys they will have to face different kind of enemies.

The most important feature of the game is that with every new game the game make a new map so there won’t be the same game twice. The gameplay is in third person perspective in the dungeons and fights (that are turn based) and in first person perspectives in shops and towns.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Gauntlet
summary: The war for control continues in Gauntlet! Featuring a new single-player scenario and some new maps for multiplayer, Gauntlet will have you beating your foes into submission in one exciting battle after the next.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Core Worlds
summary: New worlds are ripe for the conquering in Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation! In Core Worlds, you will face down your enemies on a series of new maps based on real-world geographic locations.

name: Asphalt 8: Airborne
summary: With more than 120 million downloads, the best mobile arcade racing game series reaches a new turning point! Perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts with more than 90 licensed dream cars in an intense driving experience powered by a brand-new physics engine.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The year is 1775. The American colonies are about to revolt. You are Connor, an assassin who has sworn to secure liberty for his people and his nation. To do so, you will hunt your enemies across a staggeringly large, open, and realistic world. You will unleash your lethal skills in a violent quest that will take you from chaotic city streets to blood-soaked battlefields in the hostile American wilderness and beyond. You will meet legendary heroes of American history, and together you will conspire to annihilate those who threaten Liberty itself.

Whether you use your predatory instincts to kill silently, or your fearsome arsenal to kill openly, one thing is clear: the world that the Assassins live in has become far more deadly. And so have you.

name: Assassin's Creed: The Americas Collection
summary: Assassin's Creed: The Americas Collection is a compilation consisting of three games in the Assassin's Creed series. The Americas Collection includes Assassin's Creed III, Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD and Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag.

name: Astro Boy: The Video Game
summary:
Become the iconic hero, Astro Boy, and take to the streets and skies on an epic adventure to save Metro City from the clutches of the evil President Stone and his robot army. Utilizing Astro's entire arsenal of iconic weapons and abilities -- Finger Lasers, Arm Cannon, Butt Machine Guns and Drill Attacks, players will battle hordes of robot enemies and colossal bosses including some never-before-seen enemies across Metro City and the mysterious Surface.
Using an intuitive combat system that adds depth to gameplay, players will experience classic platform action and exhilarating flight combat levels as they use Astro's unique rocket boosters to hover, avoid enemies and zip out of the way of danger. Astro Boy offers numerous unlockable and collectible elements that include exclusive art work, different versions of Astro Boy and more, as players live the story solo or side by side with a friend in 2 player co-op mode on PlayStation 2.

name: A Sexy Tour With: Akiko
summary: Embark on a titillating journey through Japan with Akiko, your alluring tour guide. This adults-only "spot the differences" game challenges your keen eye while rewarding your success with seductive reveals.

name: Ashes of the Union
summary: A vehicular shooter with roguelike elements, offering a wild take on an alternate future of the Soviet Union. Build your combat vehicle and show nature who's boss!

name: A Study in Blue
summary: Play as Kenneth, a private detective, and Blue, a runaway searching for answers. Explore the megacity of Republica in a semi-open world, solve criminal cases, make decisive moral choices, and uncover the truth behind Blue’s past.

name: Asantria
summary: An intriguing top-down game with a cartoonish pixel art style! Move around the map in all directions while viewing your character from above! Use various types of magic to shoot and fight monsters! Also use different outfits that will give you additional advantages in the game world!

name: Astral Guardians
summary:
[Astral Guardians] is a magical MMORPG with a wide world view and cool content featuring various dungeons and classic PVP experiences. As an MMORPG game, this game has incredible scene images with cool effects that give players a complete gaming experience.

This title was released multiple times under different names:
- Astral Guardians [Indonesian]
- Gaia Odyssey
- Gema do Destino [BR]
- Gem-X
- Cazador de gemas [ES]
- Chrono Travelers
- Dreamland [Arabic]

name: As Long As You're Here
summary: A first-person emotional family drama seen through the eyes of a woman with Alzheimer's disease. When Annie is forced to move from her long-time home, her children try to cope with reversed caretaking roles. As they clash over how to care for her, Annie's life slowly unravels, and memories of her long-dead brother start bleeding into the present.

name: A Strange Hotel
summary:
A Strange Hotel is a retro style atmospheric 2D puzzle platformer, with a few precision platformer levels in between.

Find clever solutions to the physics based puzzles of A Strange Hotel. In this short but sweet puzzle platformer you have to find solutions to simple and complex puzzles while using your vacuum to grab physics objects.

name: Astrafall
summary: An on-rails space arcade shooter that features local asymmetric co-op gameplay. One player pilots the ship while the other controls the guns. You must work together to survive.

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Guild of Rogues
summary: The chaos ensues as three new fearless adventurers ready themselves for the challenge. Test your skill and wisdom against: The Stowaway, the mischievous, talkative spy The Shaman, the crafty houngan asogwe (high priest) The Mermaid, a Templar navigational expert who gave her heart to the sea. This pack also comes with new customization options, and new moves.

name: A Simple Mistake
summary:
It is a cold wintery night. You are driving on the deserted road towards the familiar hills of Westlake Creek and it isn’t far until you will be home.
But then…BANG and a sound of grinding metal! A sudden jolt and you notice smoke is pouring from the hood of your car. You need to call for help.
You look around and notice a large mansion house down a gated path. Lights are on so someone must be home. You are thankfully not alone out here.
You decide to see if whoever lives there can help. But have you just made a simple mistake?

name: Asghan: The Dragon Slayer
summary:
Asghan: The Dragon Slayer is a fantasy-themed hack-and-slash action role-playing Game.
Players take on the persona of Asghan, a warrior prince who swears to avenge the death of his father by dragons. The game is praised for smooth integration of action and role-playing elements as well as a wide array of enemies and weapons. It suffers, however, from lacking character development and awkward controls.

name: Astra's Garden
summary: Astra's Garden is an idle game where you control the witch Astragalus. Grow plants, sell medicine and interact with customers to learn about both their and Astragalus' life.

name: Asphalt Xtreme: Offroad Racing
summary:
NO ROAD. NO RULES! 
 
Break free from the ordinary and enter uncharted territory with Asphalt Xtreme: Rally Racing! 
 
So forget everything you know about racing, because all you need here is your instincts, real skill and a fearless desire for speed. You'll race around sand hills, charge through canyons, drift across the dirt and climb past your opponents to reach the finish line as part of an absolutely extreme racing experience!

name: Ash Pines: The Motel
summary: Something is watching you, can you escape?

name: A Story In Space
summary: Take on the persona of an intergalactic bounty hunter to try to save yourself and the people of the mysterious warring planets of Hakarr and Pahnbuk!

name: A Sketchbook About Her Sun
summary: Through a narrative based on Red Ribbon’s new album “Planet X”, experience a broken-heart girl’s journey through thoughts, daydreams and music.

name: Astral Tale
summary: "ASTRAL TALE"- Myth of the Stars," a classic Japanese MMORPG, is now officially operating worldwide. A brand-new profession has been introduced, allowing players to embark on a unique journey across the stars together!

name: A Small Encounter
summary: A short, m/m visual novel about a butterfly meeting a spider

name: Ashbane
summary: Ashbane is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a mercenary guild in a world that rewards power and punishes mistakes. Recruit and customize your warband, take on dangerous jobs or strike at rival guilds, and lead expeditions where every encounter has lasting consequences.

name: Assassin's Creed Black Flag
summary:
The upcoming Remake of the highly praised video game Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag using an updated version of the Anvil Engine. The remake is rumored to use technology and assets of the video game Skull and Bones and is rumored to be released Late 2025 to early 2026.

Some reports claim that the Black Flag remake will “be more than just a visual upgrade” and will feature “new systems, with combat and ecosystems around wildlife specifically mentioned”.

name: Assassin's Creed II: The Master Assassin's Edition
summary:
A limited edition of the game sold by GameStop in the United States.

It included:
• Ezio Auditore da Firenze figurine.
• Artbook: The Art of Assassin's Creed.
• Premium collectible metal case.
• 2 in-game bonus missions: Palazzo Medici & Santa Maria dei Frari
• Additional content DVD with the Behind the Scenes of Assassin's Creed
• Assassin's Creed II soundtrack.

name: Assassin's Creed: Unity - Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition of Assassin’s Creed: Unity comes in a Notre Dame Cathedral collector’s showcase box and includes the following content:

- 16″ Arno Figurine
- Art Book
- Music Box
- Soundtrack
- Single Player missions DLC
- The Science Mission
- The Chemical Revolution

name: Assassin's Creed II: White Edition
summary:
A limited edition available in parts of Europe and Australia.

It included:
• Ezio Auditore da Firenze figurine.
• Collectible white packaging.
• Bonus in-game playable content: Santa Maria dei Frari.

name: Astro Combat
summary: Astro Combat is a Pixel Space Shooter, with Action-RPG elements.

name: Assassin's Creed: Limited Edition
summary:
Assassin's Creed is a non-linear action-adventure video game, during which the player controls a 12th-century Levantine Assassin named Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad during the Third Crusade, whose life is experienced through the Animus by his 21st century descendant, Desmond Miles.

The North American edition contains a collectible three inch Altaïr figurine, a Penny Arcade comic, a mini strategy guide and a bonus disc. The bonus disc includes behind the scenes videos, developer diaries, trailers, production team interviews, and the winners of the Assassin's Creed short film contest. The European limited edition of the game includes a twelve inch Altaïr figurine, art book, and bonus disc. The bonus disc contains several short films and content similar to the North American version.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage Master Assassin Upgrade Bundle 2
summary: This upgrade bundle is great if you own the Deluxe Edition of Assassin’s Creed Mirage. It contains five packs: Lightning Pack, Jinn Pack, Fire Demon Pack, Master Assassin Pack, and Guardian Pack. Also includes a digital art book and selected game soundtrack.

name: Assault Armored Girls War Vasileia
summary: This is a 3D action game in which you take weapons from your enemies to strengthen yourself. The game offers a variety of combat styles, including shooting, fighting, guarding, and invincibility, depending on the situation. In addition, the use of aerial dash enables three-dimensional combat.

name: A Story Beside
summary: Step into the shoes of Lyric, the humble innkeeper in a quiet mountain village, as she reflects upon a lifetime of poignant memories, heartwarming friendships, and bittersweet choices — proving along the way that you don't have to slay dragons to be the hero of your own story.

name: Astana Iyagi: Nuga Dakimakura Mandeuleosseo!
summary: One peaceful day, Queen Quinshua heard that her illegal dakimakura was being made and decided to take action to stop it

name: A Siren's Call
summary: A nightmarish thriller defiantly challenging you to find your way through to the waking world and what lies beyond. Sarah finds herself in a dream, driving down a mysterious road that she just can't escape. Will you find your way out of this hellish place?

name: Ascribe Imya
summary:
“Imagine a quill that can write anything it desires. Now imagine that this quill desires only to erase a single line from the Book of Canon, but cannot. That is Grёza.” - The Chronicler of the Canon.

“Grёza? She is the embodiment of irony itself. A daughter of the Creator, who gives names and fates, has herself become a prisoner to a single name—that of her own sister. And now, she tries to correct one mistake by creating a hundred new ones. She battles the Plot, all while being its principal author.” - Alan. The Second.

“She blames herself for Dola's death and is obsessed with setting things right. Her pen gives birth to heroes and destinies, yet her own fantasies constantly shatter her meticulously laid plans. She creates idealistic saviors, pouring all her soul and pain into them, only to be surprised and wounded when they come to hate her for it. All she truly craves is to write, at the story's end, that one singular line: 'And Dola was saved.'” - The Cardinal. The Grey Cardinal.

name: Assassins of Darkness
summary: After the death of Emperor without an heir, the Eastern Empire disintegrated and fell into turbulent times. Sakura, an elite assassin who betrayed her clan. She sought the power of darkness with the desire to end the civil war and unite all the clans into a new empire under her rule.

name: A Super Mario Bros X. Level Collection
summary: Join Mario and explore 20+ imaginative levels! From boiling factories to celestial canyons, frozen peaks to haunted casinos, you'll discover something new in every level! Run, jump & collect Power Stars in this SMBX Level Collection, out now!

name: Asteroidiga
summary: A single mine detonation in this bullet hell game will send you flying around the screen. But never fear! Use your wits and your Teleportation module, fast Machine Gun, powerful Laser, Tracer Bullets, and the venerable shotgun.

name: Astronarch
summary: A fusion of roguelikes and auto-battlers like never before seen. Recruit a party of mysterious heroes, navigate deadly lands, collect an arsenal of magical items, and vanquish a new evil threatening the realm!

name: Asura Blade: Sword of Dynasty
summary:
Asura Blade: Sword of Dynasty is Fuuki's first of two attempts at making a one-on-one 2D fighting game; its sequel, Asura Buster, is the second. The story revolves around the search for the eponymous Sword of Dynasty in a war-torn world.

The game features eight playable characters, as well as two boss characters, only briefly usable in single-player mode using codes. It uses a simple three-button control scheme and sticks to more basic motion inputs for its roster's special moves, for greater accessibility. Its colorful visuals and detailed background art take inspiration from contemporary entries in the Darkstalkers and Street Fighter Alpha series.

name: Assassin's Creed II
summary:
Discover an intriguing and epic story of power, revenge and conspiracy set during a pivotal moment in history: the Italian Renaissance.
Experience the freedom and immersion of an all new open world and mission structure with settings such as the rooftops and canals of beautiful Venice. Your options in combat, assassination and escape are vast, with many new weapons, settings and gameplay elements.

name: Astérix: Mega Madness
summary: It's party time, and the Gauls are planning to celebrate in style by having one of the biggest parties they've ever seen. The biggest honour of all the Gauls is to sit besides the Chief. In order to determine exactly whom this honour will be bestowed to, The Chief has announced that he will be holding a special sports tournament, the likes of which have never been seen before. The Gauls all get ready to participate in a series of crazy sporting challenges, to win the ultimate privilege of sitting with the Chief at the party.

name: Asuka 120% Limited Burning Fest.
summary:
Every year, during the prestigious all-girls' school Ryouran Academy's culture festival, a fighting tournament is held, with representatives from each of the school's clubs duking it out to determine what the school's priorities for club funding will be for the next year. Naturally, the more athletically-inclined clubs tend to place higher than the culturally-inclined ones, with the Chemistry Club in particular suffering from a humiliating string of losses in the tournament prelims...

Enter one Asuka Honda, scouted in middle school by the current Chemistry Club president and subjected to a year's worth of Training from Hell in order to be the Chemistry Club's secret weapon. Making it past the prelims, Asuka enters into the final tournament, where she and a host of girls all vying to improve their club's standings will face off.

name: Asfalia: The Cranky Volcano
summary: In this moving and whimsical narrative adventure game, explore Asfalia, a magical world threatened by a raging volcano. Join Charlie as you meet amazing characters, solve fun puzzles, and collect beautiful stickers along the way! A captivating story-driven game suitable for all ages.

name: A Summer with the Shiba Inu
summary:
The demo of a free to play visual novel set in a world populated with dogs. You play as a Shiba Inu called Syd who comes back to her home Shiba Island after being gone for more than ten years. She meets old friends and new challenges.

Features:
- Included dog bark button in preference menu
- Random facts about dogs in menus
- Some other stuff where the game will notice how long you take to make a decision
- Dogs galore!

name: Astrid: Reverie
summary: In the near future, the 'Mindscape' allows you to enter the depths of your mind and relive your memories. Haunted by strange hallucinations, Astrid feels her life breaking down around her. Help Astrid face her fears in this horror-mystery adventure that combines 3D gameplay with FMV elements.

name: Astrogon
summary:
Jump and dash your way, between walls and obstacles to reach the teleport portal.
Get precise and strategic, or die.

Catch the right orb: Touch the red orb and become red, and you will touch red walls safely. Same thing for the blue. Touch the green orb to ‘extra jump’, you will jump to the next step. Touch the yellow orb to dash, and fly down, on the side or up to the sky.
Try to conquer level after level, dimension after dimension, with patience, dexterity, and intelligence. Earn rare Skins with amazing auras and special effects: blazes, ghosts, clones, laser turbine, etc!

Astrogon allows you to create your own levels in the Creative Mode. Become the God of Astrogon, be smart, innovative and clever, challenge all Astrogon players to succeed and beat time records and collect stars.
Players from all over the world will access your creations and play the levels you invented.

Beat other players in real time in the multiplayer mode.
Challenge your friend, or play against another player from all over the world.
Perfect for intense live streaming sessions.
Get ranked and be the best.

name: Astral Blaze
summary: Embark on a quest for a rumored treasure while exploring ruins of an old civilization. A half survivor and half roguelike type game with partly randomized dungeons and character development by choice of cards found in the dungeons. Featuring unique dash attack and simple controls.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione
summary: Assetto Corsa Competizione, the official GT World Challenge videogame. Thanks to the extraordinary quality of simulation, you will experience the atmosphere of the GT3 championship. Compete against official drivers, teams, cars and official circuits reproduced to the highest quality ever seen.

name: Asili Forest
summary: Asili Forest: Guide V12 on a heroic quest to save humanity in this visually stunning 2D platformer adventure, Embark on an epic journey with V12 in Asili Forest, where nature and technology collide in a captivating tale of bravery and discovery.

name: Astro Arena
summary: Astro Arena is a fast-paced, team-based space battleground where Rock, Paper, and Scissors clash. Choose your character, gather resources, and earn points to unlock powerful abilities like invisibility and speed. Outsmart your opponents and lead your team to victory!

name: Ash Echoes
summary: Ash Echoes is a Real-time Sci-Fi Tactical RPG. As the Chief Officer of S.E.E.D., you will encounter otherworld Visitors uniting to fend off unprecedented threats and uncover the origins of the turmoil.
developers: 上海烛龙信息科技有限公司

name: Astral Dusk
summary: Astral Dusk is a first-person, crafting horror survival game following a lone astronaut marooned on the edge of a deep, dark moon crater.
