The game takes place during the lead-up to the American Revolution, with Aveline navigating the complex social and political landscape of New Orleans. She uses three distinct personas (Assassin, Lady, and Slave) to pursue her missions, fighting against Spanish forces and colonial powers.

name: Ashina: The Red Witch
summary: Get ready for adventure not like any other! This story is about Ash. An ordinary girl who takes an unexpected journey through the mysterious spirit world filled with strange creatures.

name: Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles
summary: An all new dice-deck-building roguelike, Astrea, has you chart a path through the ruins of a lost civilization as one of six brave Oracles. Using an ever-changing deck of dice and enchanted Sentinels, Purify waves of Corrupted foes and a decayed goddess to save the Star System. Choose among hundreds of different dice that suit your penchant; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. Tactfully wield an innate risk vs reward system by pacifying enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales. Laden with bountiful boons to enhance your chances for success and encounters against waves of enemies that impede your progress, chart a course through the ruins of a lost civilization to the source of Corruption.

name: A Step Into Darkness
summary:
A Step Into Darkness is a indie horror game in which you play as a journalist desperate to redeem himself after he makes the biggest mistake of his life.

You are sent on a mission to the woodlands to find and document the most mysterious of creatures.

A Step Into Darkness Episode One is an introduction to the series of three and is free to play.

name: Asteroid 69
summary: Rogue asteroids have been detected heading toward earth. You are the pilot of experimental spacecrafts to destroy the impending danger. Fight solo or up to 4 players. Outerspace is full of lethal rocks and strange creatures out to stop you. Don't let your planet down!

name: A.S.H.
summary: A.S.H. – is a brutal slasher/platformer with RPG elements in an epic medieval fantasy.

name: Astrobattle
summary: Take control of disabled spacecrafts!

name: AstroRock
summary: A music focused take on the classic Asteroids

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag + Assassin's Creed Rogue Double Pack
Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation Gold
Asphalt 9: Legends - Turbo Summer Racing Pack
Astro Volleyball
summary: Astro Volleyball is simple game for iPhone/iPod touch. Let's play volleyball, and destroy astro robots!!!

name: Ascent
summary: Remember that weird dream...?

name: Astro Zone
summary: A New Dimension...

name: Asteroid
summary: An space shooter game and Asteroids clone which was renamed to Planetoids shortly after its release due to similarities. Later is was also published as Fasteroids.

name: Astroball
summary:
Astroball is a platform game for the ZX Spectrum and SAM Coupé, written by Balor Knight and published by Revelation.

A sequel, Turbulence, set on a rotating sphere, was released for the Spectrum in 1993.

name: Asterrunner
summary: Travel through dangerous asteroid field, avoid obstacles and collect loot.

name: Asymmetric Ops
summary: Join and experience the evolution of a 'hide & seek style PvP shooter' to a 'spiritual successor for the squad-based shooters of old', taken to the next level.

name: Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins
summary: Embark on an epic odyssey in Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins. Crafted by gods from their domains, floating realms await your exploration. Ascend in power, unveil secrets, and team up for dungeons, raids, and minigames. Unfold divine lore and become the most potent ascended god.

name: Asteroid Quest! (Classic)
summary: Mine asteroids, purchase upgrades, and be a space lad.

name: Astrology DS: The Stars in Your Hands
summary: This game offers a variety of different astrological readings, based on the date, time, and place of your birth. It also offers 3 different mini-games (memory, slide Puzzle, sudoku) - and the ability to learn how to read the stars yourself.

name: A Skyrocket Story
summary: Game for android and ios.

name: Astro Party
summary: Blast enemy ships and run over pilots in this competitive deathmatch party game, where ships can only turn right.

name: Ashita no Joe: Masshiro ni Moe Tsukiro!
summary: A boxing game based on the famous japanese anime/manga Ashita no Joe.

name: A Survivor Girl
summary: A girl who crashes on exoplanet begins to survive desperately.

name: Ascension: Delirium
summary: Long ago, the god Adayu lost his grips on reality, and in his madness, unraveled the realms of Vigil. Heroes from the four factions rose to save their shattered world, and from the ashes rose a new world, New Vigil.

name: Astral Abstraction
summary: Astral Abstraction is an atmospheric 5 episode total conversion that aims to advance the formula of Doom's gameplay, bringing it more in line with the modern entries in the series. The vertical aspect of gameplay is expanded and more fleshed out, and the pace of gameplay is faster. ﻿

name: Aspetra
summary: An indie RPG from 1997. Our hero arrives at the top of a mountain with no memory of himself. He believes he was sent by a wizard named Eldirood, but quickly finds that the people of this place hate and fear him. He discovers a nearby town that is oppressed by military rule, and eventually finds it is part of a global struggle for power and magic. Can he bring peace to this world?

name: Aster Force
summary: Aster Force is a 3D sci-fi spaceship shooter game set in the far reaches of space. Players may choose from multiple ships to pilot, as they patrol and protect Sector 7184 from the sinister space pirates known as Specter. Join the crew of SS Gallaway to bring peace and order to the stars.

name: Asteroids Fighter
summary: Asteroids Fighter is an Asteroids clone. The game is extremely similar to the Atari classic, with solid graphics instead vector graphics. In fixed screens, the player takes the control of a space ship with the mission to eliminate all the asteroids present in the screen to reach the next level. When an asteroid is reached by a shot, it is broken in multiple pieces. If the player's ship touches one of these pieces a life is lost. In advanced levels the player will must destroy armed enemy spaceships in addition to asteroids. The ten best scores are archived in the high scores table.

name: A Smattering of Songs
summary: Hear a handful of harmonies

name: A Slit of Joy
summary: Finn was sad, so he killed himself. But he was greeted by Aoi a mysterious girl who granted him one wish before he gets reincarnated. Finn's wish, he wanted to see if anyone cared at all that he had committed suicide. Even though he knows no one ever cared about him.

name: Ashes of Equestria
summary: Ashes of Equestria is a fan-made RPG based on Kkat's novel Fallout: Equestria.

name: Astra Hunter Zosma
summary: Astra Hunter Zosma aims to be a short treasure-hunting RPG with a focus on combat, exploration, and a blossoming friendship between a buddy duo!

name: AS: Angelic Serenade
summary: You are a teenage boy traveling to find the angel that stopped you from aging. You don't remember it very well since it was what, ten years, twenty years ago? Maybe even longer. Other than the clothes on your back, you carry a magical, musical instrument and the feather of the angel you are searching for. One day, you come across a girl. This girl is very different. She can't talk and has different colored eyes. Her left eye is dark blue and her right eye is fire red. This is how the game begins.

name: As Above So Below
summary: As Above So Below (AASB) is as a gravity-shifting 2d side-scrolling platformer enhanced by fantastical abilities and a unique cast of characters set within an expansive fictional world inspired by Greek mythos.

name: Astronot
summary: Fun Metroidvania style game made by Wade Mcgillis. Collect Squares and powerups!

name: Astro-g
summary: Astro-g is a gravity-based space puzzler, challenging players with over 40 unique levels and environments to conquer! You’ve only got one shot to make it to the portal, and it’ll take all you’ve got to weave together a safe path to victory!

name: Asian Caprice
summary: You are going to enjoy an evening in a company of a hot Asian girl. How do you want it to go? Will you just enjoy her dances and teasing or go for the full course? It's up to you!

name: Astronium
summary: Astronium is an Metroidvania with Souls-Like aspects, with a focus on combat and on the grind for weapons. Defeat strong enemies, surpass ambushes, explore diferent biomes and meet interesting individuals on this hostile planet

name: Ascension: Transition and Silver
summary: A transgender visual novel, loosely based on Tarkovsky's STALKER.

name: Astralis
summary: Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekseï Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep to face a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship "Astralis" lost in an unkown part of the universe. Astralis is FPS horror sci-fi game with retro graphics and sounds.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2020 GT World Challenge Pack
summary: The 2020 GT WORLD CHALLENGE PACK DLC adds a new track, two new cars, more than 60 new liveries and all teams of the 2020 GT World Challenge season in ACC, alongside with the new Pirelli 2020 "DHE" Tyre Model, new season BoP, improved AI algorithms and optimized overall performance.

name: Astronave
summary: Astronave is a minimalist tube shooter.

name: Aswin's Dream
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Ask Angela
summary: A Fortune Teller Game for XBLIG

name: A Stranded Spark
summary: Explore the Forgotten Island in this small open-world cozy adventure game! Follow the story of Guina walking around the island, meeting new characters, helping them and trying to find a way back home through a wholesome and cute story.

name: A Subtle Kind of Murder: A Murder Simulator
summary: It's time to get away with murder!

name: Astria
summary: In Astria you are playing a young hero who travels the world to avenge his loved ones. But he will soon realise that he is destined for much more.

name: A Shadow of Time
summary: Embark on an immersive journey in A Shadow of Time, a stunning 3rd-person exploration game. Traverse breathtaking landscapes, solve puzzles, and follow a mysterious voice that shares personal stories as you uncover hidden secrets and restore time to the world in this captivating adventure.

name: Asgard
summary: Live and adventure in a world of swords and sorcery in the MMORPG Asgard. Travel the world with many comrades online, learning skills in the far reaches of the world to aid you in your quest.

name: Astro Wars
summary:
Italian license from Data East's "Astro Fighter".

Player steers fighter craft and fires missiles and endeavors to eliminate attacking forces. Each stage of the game becomes more difficult, with each fighter craft moving closer into the battle.

name: Astro Command Scramble Retro!
summary: This is an accurate conversion from that retro vintage classic from the early 1980's brought forward to the 21st Century. Scramble by Grandstand and Astro Command by Epoch, Radio Shack and many other companies in the 80's are all the same game but in a different shell with a different name.

name: Asteroids Minesweeper
summary: Be careful of explosive mines! Asteroids Minesweeper is an abstract casual minesweeper variant in three dimensions with some slight rules differences. Trim that asteroid, and don't get too dizzy while rotating in a full 3D environment.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Antique Pack
summary: The Antique Class, The Kitsune and Fluffle Species!

name: Assembly
summary: Construct animals from pieces in new 3D puzzle game.

name: Aspen Lane VR
summary: Paranormal Investigation Experience

name: Asian Foxes
summary: Cute Asian Foxes wag their tails and pin their ears. They are alert and sniffing with their noses, one claps her hands and the other even bares her fangs in excitement. You go to meet them.

name: Astral Cube

name: Asterisk no Daibouken
summary:
One of the only games successfully dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette. This was a student game project developed in the HAL College of Technology & Design (no relation to HAL Laboratory).

This game was dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette in 2005 by d4s. It was originally thought that the data was deteriorating but I am starting to believe it wasn't aside from a few bits.

The goal of the game is to take the coin at the end of the level, then go back and defeat the boss by hitting it 5 times with either the sword or the fireball, then the credits would appear.

Based on Photon Storm's excellent Quartet game, Assembloids is a frantic reflex-based puzzle game in which you must assemble faces from four different sets as quickly as possible against an increasingly tight time limit. 
 
Featuring open border design, high-score codes so you can keep a record of your achievements and full (comparable speed) PAL/NTSC compatibility, Assembloids requires no keyboard input and is designed to work on the C64GS as well as regular commodore computers. name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Aveline

This is about skydiving from space. Following the jump of Red Bull Baumgartner©, people wanted to try for themselves. But they didn't have the cyborg brain of Red Bull Baumgartner©, and the speed and lack of oxygen turned them into shit. 
 
It's a game for 1 to 4 players. It's recommended to play with two keyboards to avoid key ghosting (spooky~).

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Time Saver - Resources Pack

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Day One Edition

name: Asdivine Collection
summary:
About Asdivine Hearts:

One year ago, the world of Asdivine was enveloped by a brilliant flash of light. Since that time, the influence of shadow has only continued to grow ever more powerful across the face of the land. Although the event itself was undoubtedly connected with the heavens, few people seem to have realized the far-reaching implications of what transpired. Now turning to the present, a surprising revelation awaits a young man by the name of Zack and his childhood friend, Stella, in the capital from a chubby cat claiming to be none other than the Light Deity and declaring the world to be on the verge of destruction...

Asdivine Hearts boasts of groundbreaking visual quality, plenty of subquests, a battle arena, treasure to dig for, and an enemy guide to complete. By taking puzzle piece-like jewels and setting them in a box known as a rubix, players are able to customize characters! How far can you level and how many millions of damage can you dish out? All these challenges await you and more!

About Asdivine Hearts II:

Picking up two years after the events of their first adventure, Zack and friends find themselves off on another quest, but this time to save the parallel world of Archelio, which is on the verge of being frozen in ice.

With a convenient summary of the previous title included, players can jump right into Asdivine Hearts II without having played the first!

Utilizing a brand new team system, lead up to six characters into battle, and destroy onslaughts of powerful foes! See the amalgamation of years of RPG-crafting expertise and plug in jewels to boost character parameters as the beloved rubix makes its triumphant return.
Upgrade rare weapons to make one's own personal slayer of evil! Dispatch buddies to earn Guild Coins while the party works on their quest! Or simply equip their jewels to learn their skills!

About Asdivine Dios:

Among the many worlds the deities have created, there is one world that abounds with life known as Asdivine. But when a spate of disturbances erupts across the globe and an ever spreading murk threatens to destroy it, Izayoi, the deity of Asdivine himself, takes up his cause to save the world he created with his own hands. Suffering from an unfortunate loss of his own divine powers, is there any hope he can succeed? Find out as the curtain raises on this adventure of divine proportions!

Boasting a voluminous story, an expansive world, treasure filled dungeons, exciting turn-based battles, weapon creation, and more, the all-inclusive RPG experience is here! Plus, limitless enemies and loot, a multitude of subquests, and even bosses that will blow your mind await!

About Asdivine Menace:

A century after the events of Asdivine Dios, peace has finally settled in. That is, until a visitor from another world suddenly shows up proclaiming the entire universe is about to be destroyed. Hearing this, Izayoi sets off in an attempt to reverse this seemingly pronounced fate with a trio of very idiosyncratic spirits as they criss-cross four worlds in search of an answer. But what is the answer they find...?

Experience immersive turn-based battles with cooperative attacks and new limit break skills! With all quests, collecting and crafting, the battle arena, and even post-game content, Asdivine Menace comes packed with enough elements to satisfy JRPG-hungry gamers. As Izayoi deepens his bonds of trust with his spirit companions, their fates together move in new and meaningful directions!

name: A Short Tale

This place keeps many dark secrets covered in ash. Learn the history of this mysterious place from its founding to the fire in which many people died. Hidden caches, secret passages and mysterious puzzles are waiting for you on the way. Look for information everywhere and you will find answers to your questions. Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: A Simple Door

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Hunter / Prey

name: Assassin's Creed: Unity - Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition release of Assassin's Creed: Unity includes the base game and a code to download the Chemical Revolution mission, which isn't available as standalone DLC.

Paris, 1789. The French Revolution turns a once-magnificent city into a place of terror and chaos. Its cobblestone streets run red with the blood of commoners who dared to rise up against the oppressive aristocracy. As the nation tears itself apart, a young man named Arno will embark on an extraordinary journey to expose the true powers behind the Revolution. His pursuit will throw him into the middle of a ruthless struggle for the fate of a nation, and transform him into a true Master Assassin.

Introducing Assassin’s Creed Unity, the next-gen evolution of the blockbuster franchise powered by an all-new game engine. From the storming of the Bastille to the execution of King Louis XVI, experience the French Revolution as never before, and help the people of France carve an entirely new destiny.

name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Steampunk Pack
summary: Give your arsenal a steam-powered twist with a new set of items concocted by the most innovative and unusual minds of the Industrial Revolution. This Animus hack contains a collection of high-level clockwork marvels: an outfit for Jacob, three weapons and two pieces of gear. Players need to be level 7 and above to equip these.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations: Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
summary:
The Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack extends the Assassin’s Creed Revelations multiplayer experience with the addition of six multiplayer maps, each introducing new gameplay opportunities through their varied terrain, perches, and hideouts.

Journey to the majestic holy city of Jerusalem, the opulent Imperial district of Constantinople, and the colorful mercantile district of Dyers. Revisit your favorite Italian Renaissance maps from Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood, starting with the historic city of Firenze (Florence), traveling to the mountainsides of San Donato, and to nighttime Siena with its carnival lights, talented performers, and deadly hiding spots.

This all-new downloadable content also comes with a new collection of Achievements and Trophies for those that want to try their hand at kills and escapes that are as impressive as they are effective.

Give all your multiplayer characters some personal style with bonus multiplayer customization items, also included in the pack.

name: Assassin’s Creed Rogue: Templar Legacy Pack
summary: Become the most feared Templar whether on land or at sea, geared up with any weapons, outfits and ship items anyone could dream of.

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Last Act
summary: Many revelations will be realized as Roxanne's year the the crew comes to an end in the finale of this episodic trilogy.

name: Asphalt: Injection

summary: Assassin's Vol. is a level puzzle game.

name: Ash of Gods: The Way - Deluxe Edition

name: A Step From Insanity

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: American Track Pack
summary: The American Tracks Pack DLC for Assetto Corsa Competizione features 3 of the most iconic circuits of the United States of America. Circuit of the Americas, Indianapolis Motor Speedway and Watkins Glen International come to Assetto Corsa Competizione for the best US sim racing ever experienced!

name: ASV Trident

name: AstroMole

Explore Black Holes filled with strange creatures, treacherous obstacles and valuable jewels hidden differently each time you play!

name: A Slower Speed of Light
summary: A Slower Speed of Light is a first-person game prototype in which players navigate a 3D space while picking up orbs that reduce the speed of light in increments. Custom-built, open-source relativistic graphics code allows the speed of light in the game to approach the player’s own maximum walking speed. Visual effects of special relativity gradually become apparent to the player, increasing the challenge of gameplay. These effects, rendered in realtime to vertex accuracy, include the Doppler effect (red- and blue-shifting of visible light, and the shifting of infrared and ultraviolet light into the visible spectrum); the searchlight effect (increased brightness in the direction of travel); time dilation (differences in the perceived passage of time from the player and the outside world); Lorentz transformation (warping of space at near-light speeds); and the runtime effect (the ability to see objects as they were in the past, due to the travel time of light). Players can choose to share their mastery and experience of the game through Twitter. A Slower Speed of Light combines accessible gameplay and a fantasy setting with theoretical and computational physics research to deliver an engaging and pedagogically rich experience.

name: Astrolight

name: Ascend

name: Astaroth: The Angel of Death
summary:
You must guide Ozymandias through the catacombs of Astaroth's domain. To aid you in your quest you can pick up nine different mind powers, which act as powerups. These powerups include levitation - allowing you to float, Pyrokinetics - ability to create fire with your mind, and shape shifting. 
 
The game is in the platform style and you must jump and duck the various obstacles you encounter. The monsters you will meet include giant scorpions, beholders and fire elementals. 
 
You will have to defeat Astaroth's 3 guardians of the soul along the way, firstly a sphinx, secondly a 3 headed hydra and finally a marlith demon. Once you have defeated the guardians you will have to face Astaroth herself in a battle of the minds using the powerups you have collected.

name: Astral Outcast
summary: You've become a spaceship captain who transports supplies to Earth's colony on Mars. On a return trip your ship gets lost on the way back to Earth. Can you find out how to survive in space and get back home?

name: Astro Sentai Jarbonder
summary: It's a bullet-hell spaceship shooter. Can you survive the battlefield? Let's prove your shooting skills!

name: As Aventuras de Zé Baldinho
summary: As Aventuras de Zé Baldinho is a challenging educational platformer that addresses environmental issues and the reuse of organic waste and is full of references to the History of Art.

name: Astro Golf
summary:
An ever-changing planetscape, some tricky gravity, and a golf ball. 
Astro Golf is a simple, relaxing interplanetary golf game.

name: Assault Suit Leynos 2
summary: The colonies are waging war over the remaining fossil fuels and minerals left on earth, and a team of rebellious warriors go into battle to settle the score once and for all.

name: A Skier's Journey
summary: A Skier's Journey is a small skiing simulator inspired by retros playstation games.

name: A Steak Temple Panic: Chapter 2 - Welcome to Sanglinours
summary: Second chapter of Bob and Jenn's adventures. The two secret agents arrive at the Sanglinours entertainment park. Will they find the Xiuhcoatl?

name: As Cold as the Grave
summary: No one said dealing with the Fae would be easy

name: A South Sea Tale
summary: A Short Story about Life and the Ocean

name: Ashbourne
summary: Ashbourne is a story-based non-fantasy open world action role-playing game. Take on the role of Alexander Marshal, a knight of the Endewyn empire, as you battle on behalf of your empire to protect Endewyn's honour, and it's people.

name: A Shadow Cast on Water
summary: Set in 1920s Arkham, you play as a private investigator trying to solve a mysterious case. Can you uncover the conspiracy that's befalling the city?

name: Astronots
summary: Evil A.I. Space Bots are attacking Earth, You and Your team of Good A.I. Bots must stop them !

name: Astarian Adventures
summary: Embark on a cosmic visual novel adventure on a male-absent planet. Navigate choices that shape your destiny, form bonds with alien females, and determine the future of the Astarian race. Will you be their savior or downfall? Dive into "Astarian Adventures" and forge your path.

name: A Storm Unsung
summary: An action roguelite with a multitude of unlockable characters. Challenge procedural dungeons generated by an AI Dungeon Master who controls the pace of combat and the frequency of random events.

name: Assetto Corsa: Tripl3 Pack
summary: KUNOS Simulazioni and 505 Games are proud to present the "TRIPL3 PACK", the DLC package for ASSETTO CORSA that celebrates the launch of Assetto Corsa on console! The “TRIPL3 PACK” includes the iconic FERRARI FXX K, FERRARI 488 GTB and PRAGA R1!The CARS: Ferrari FXX KFerrari 488 GTBPraga R1

name: Astral Alliance
summary: Astral Alliance is a space themed real-time strategy game that pits you against a hostile enemy invasion.

name: Ashes 2
summary: Ashes 2 is a post-apocalyptic game in the 'zombie survival' genre. This is result of the evolution of the game Ashes. This is author's project was created especially for fans of survival.

name: Ashzel & The Power Dagger
summary: Ashzel & The Power Dagger, is a Vampire Fantasy action-adventure RPG. Set in the Eerie, mysterious, dark, and sophisticated West Coast - a place where the Vampires of the West Coast are drawn into wonder, awe, and elegant drama.

name: Assoluto Racing
summary:
PRECISION COMPETITIVE RACING
Assoluto Racing is the next evolution of mobile racing simulations.

REAL CARS
Race with beautifully modeled, officially licensed cars from the top manufacturers in the world.

TRUE RACING PHYSICS
The most realistic physics engine on mobile will give you unmatched control on the road and under the hood.

MADE WITH LOVE
Our small indie team of racing enthusiasts has lovingly crafted the most realistic mobile racing game on the market for you.

name: ASU
summary: The beginning of an exciting MMORPG.

name: A Story of Paradise Lost
summary: A demon convinces an angel to help rid her of her enemies and create a perfect world.

name: Assetto Corsa: Dream Pack 2
summary: Welcome to DREAM PACK 2, the newest add-on content pack ASSETTO CORSA. This package adds to Assetto Corsa the circuit of Catalunya (Barcelona) and seven new awesome cars in nine total versions. The circuit has been reproduced for the first time in a PC racing simulation using the Laserscan Technology, that guarantees the maximum level of...

name: AstroPanic
summary: AstroPanic is a top-down rogue-like 2D space game. Upgrade your ship by battling aliens, progress to new levels with the points you earn, and get ready for an exciting space adventure!

name: Asteroid Blaster
summary: A difficult, fast-paced asteroids clone with some fancy graphics, nice sounds, and more intelligent enemies.

name: Astro Ike
summary: Astro Ike is a 3rd Person Top Down Zombie Wave shooter. You spawn in as Astro Ike and will have to defeat waves of zombies. There are 3 levels to select from to add a variety of game play.

name: A Slime's Test for Intelligence
summary: Can an amorphous slime solve puzzles? Scientists seek to answer this question with a series of 22 problem-solving chambers. Use your squishy body to uncover the clever insights in each level and prove the capabilities of the humble slime.

name: Astroneer: Xenobiology
summary: The Xenobiology Update features a new adventure where players embark on a narrative-focused mission across the solar system to discover the secrets behind the curious Galastropods.

name: A Shooty Bit
summary:
BULLET-BASED ROUGELITE ACTION: 
Refined arcade impulsiveness and modern sensibilities have come together in a visceral way. Clamber aboard the MODEL I and blast through hordes of enemies -- each dead-set on destruction.

name: Asteroids / Pong / Yars' Revenge
summary: A compilation of the classic arcade games Asteroids, Pong, and Yars' Revenge brought onto the Game Boy Advance.

name: Assault on the Necrospire
summary: Assault on the Necrospire is a roguelike with an emphasis on interesting loot and character building. Your mission is to destroy the Necromancer. Wipe the dust off your spellbook; you're going to need it.

name: Asteroid Jungle
summary: An arcade style ship vs ship stealth battle. Find them before they find you. Destroy their ship before they destroy yours. Only skill will determine the victor.

name: Astroneer: Jet Powered
summary: The Jet Powered Update contains new vehicles to speed up Astroneer’s traversal of land and air! Use the new Hoverboard to shred planet surfaces while your friends use the VTOL to scout from the lower atmosphere!

name: Astrum Vanguard
summary: In Astrum Vanguard, a captivating 2D arena shooter, you pilot a spaceship through space as countless enemy ships and alien creatures relentlessly attack you. Survive the endless onslaught in the cosmic battlefield!

name: Astroneer: Awakening
summary:
Hello. I wanted to be sure you saw this. We will talk soon. Please pay attention when we meet. The task I have for you is very important.

You must finish all other priority missions beforehand. I will find you when you are ready. Do not worry. You will know when it is time.

name: Astroneer: Rails
summary: EXO Dynamics is proud to introduce the brand new Rails System! The Rails System brings a new mode of transportation to Astroneer that excels at efficiency and convenience. Place rail posts to build out your rail lines, and then board the new railway vehicles for a hands-free transit experience. And unlike other vehicles, railway vehicles can travel autonomously, perfect for extending the reach of your automation network. But that’s not all: rail lines themselves carry both oxygen and power, making them an excellent way to connect together distant bases and excavation sites like never before!

name: Asteroid Core
summary: You are isolated on a small meteor and need to build a fire to escape before being destroyed by aliens. Use your limited space to create machines and obtain more and more resources. Enjoy this mix of puzzles, tower defense and incremental gameplay.

name: Asterelis
summary: Be nice.

name: Astral Guard
summary: Astral Guard is an interplanetary RPG adventure following a group of aliens trying to stop a vicious hivemind from taking over the solar system. Find friends, fight foes, and travel the stars!

name: Ashcrown
summary: Ashcrown is a turn-based PvP game that’ll test your strategic mettle. Combining the champion-based gameplay of MOBAs with the depth of strategy games like chess, every decision you make will determine if you’ll achieve glorious victory or crushing defeat.

name: Astrd
summary: ASTRD is an arcade roguelike shooter where you build & upgrade your ship that automatically attacks asteroids and enemies. Combine different blocks to unlock class bonuses and create endless unique configurations, to face endless waves of varied enemies in this 3D bullet-hell game.

name: A story of vaccines & zombie
summary: A level-based zombie ego shooter

name: Asteroid
summary: Asteroid was originally developed by Atari for Midway in fulfillment of a contract to supply one video game and one pinball machine. Atari had initially offered Pong during its development to fulfill the contract, but had been rejected. After finishing Asteroid Atari developed a near identical version of the game and released it themselves under the title "Space Race".

name: AsteroidsHD
summary: Engage in space-warfare with your friends and foes! Dodge and destroy asteroids while trying to stay alive in multiplayer! Replay value is endless with massive combinations of in-game ship upgrades, modifications, and customization. Destroy Asteroids and Aliens to gain the edge!

name: Astro Race
summary: Taito's second ever video game. It is based on Atari's Space Race and, like Elepong, uses imported PC Boards in a Taito-constructed cabinet.

name: Asahina Mikuru no Yoko Scroll Action
summary: Play as Mikuru Asahina with a machine gun. Shoot rabbit, cat, pig and avoiding any obstacles. Asahina Mikuru no Yoko Scroll is an action game based on popular anime series Haruhi Suzumiya no Yuutsu.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Shared History
summary: Shared History is a free update for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla. It follows Eivor Varinsdottir's meeting with Basim Ibn Ishaq's former mentor Roshan to combat common enemies who had joined forces against the two women.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: The Legend of Beowulf
summary:
The Legend of Beowulf is a single-player downloadable content addition for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla that was released on 10 November 2020 for Season Pass holders. The content consists of three missions in which Eivor discovers the secrets behind the legendary hero Beowulf.

The Legend of Beowulf memories can be accessed after founding Ravensthorpe, but a Power Level of 20 is recommended.

name: Ashita no Joe: Masseki ni Moe Agare!
summary: Ashita no Joe: Masseki ni Moe Agare! is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Astronaut Bundle
summary:
The bundle contains:

- Laser rifle: The V-23 Eraser
- Stasis pistol: The V-40 Suspender
- Machete: The V-27 Shifter
- Outfit: The V-9 Defender Suit
- Buggy skin: The V-39 Star Rover

name: Asteroid Turret Defender VR
summary: A player starts in a confined small base, chained, and an asteroid assault is coming.

name: AstroFire
summary: Asteroid-blasting arcade game featuring stunning raytraced graphics, awesome power-ups and 18 different types of enemy craft, spread over a massive 75 action-packed levels. With the release of version 3, AstroFire is now better than ever, featuring new weapons, improved graphics and re-designed levels.

name: Ascentroid
summary: Ascentroid is a free-flight, six-degree-of-freedom sci-fi first person shooter game built on Unreal Engine 4 with peer-to-peer (P2P) multiplayer support.

name: Asuka & Asuka
summary: A mysterious invasion force known as the Galaxy Highters invades the Earth in the year 1996. With their abilities in space time manipulation, they are able to invade several time lines in Earth’s history and occupy each one simultaneously. In order to stop the Galaxy Highters, Earth’s militaries design the 'Flying Bird', a jet fighter capable of time travel, enabling it to fly into occupied time lines.

name: Asura Cross
summary:
After serving in the army for two years, Jin returns home only to find himself in the middle of an ancient conspiracy. As he delves deeper into the secret world of Asura Cross, Jin meets a cast of strange men and women. He must fight them to save a friend and uncover the mysteries that surround him. Be the decision maker as you fight against enemies and alter Jin’s fate!

Featuring 8 different modes of gameplay and with an intriguing storyline full of twists and turns, Asura Cross offers deep rewards in addicting martial arts gameplay!

name: Astrowar
summary: Astrowar is an Action game, developed by Starsoft and published by Artic, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: Astervoid 2000
summary: Astervoid 2000 is a 1 to 4 player local-multiplayer​ space brawler, combining classic arcade action with modern gameplay. Explosive, indestructible, and icy asteroids will slam against your ship, or can be weaponized against your opponents. Perfect support for gamepads & keyboard and mouse.

name: Astro Bandits
summary: "Astro Bandits" is a classic 2D top-view arcade scrolling shooter. Earth has been attacked by aliens and you need to destroy enemy starships and to save the planet. Nice visuals and atmospheric music will immerse you in the Aerospace Forces.

name: As If Dreaming When You're Wide Awake
summary: As If is a first person narrative game portraying issues revolving around mental health. Experience the life of Matthew as he struggles to reach his dreams and wishes. Step into his shoes. Look from his eyes. Listen to the voices. Feel his frustrations. Packaged in artistic symbolisms and realistic grit.

name: Asheron's Call
summary:
Asheron's Call (AC) is a fantasy MMORPG (massively multiplayer online role-playing game) for Microsoft Windows-based PCs developed and published by Turbine Entertainment. Though it was developed by the Turbine team (with Microsoft's extensive assistance), it was published as a Microsoft title until 2004.

The game was set on the island continent of Dereth and several surrounding smaller islands and archipelagos on the fictional planet of Auberean. The game was played in a large, seamless 3D virtual world which could host thousands of players' characters at a time.

Released on November 2, 1999, it was the third major MMORPG to be released and was developed at the same time as Ultima Online and Everquest. After initial success, its subscription numbers dropped as newer MMORPGs moved into the market. Its host servers remained online for over 17 years after the game's original launch.

name: Astro Assembler
summary: Astro Assembler is the combat game that doesn't give you time to breathe. Feel the frenzied action, control your senses, and put your reflexes to the test. Experience unparalleled control accuracy, incredible graphics, and a spectacular sound track.

name: Assault Gunners HD Edition: Extra Pack
summary:
The Assault Gunners HD Edition: Extra Pack contains all three downloadable packs that were released previously onto the PlayStation Vita version in Japan, all of which have been remastered for this HD Edition release of the game.

Also contains an additional 15 campaign missions, three inferno maps, a wide array of new parts to customize your mech and additional voice actors for the in-game navigator.

name: Astero Inc.
summary: Astero Inc. is a space mining simulation game where players will travel to a dystopian future in a tense competition for asteroid mining rights throughout the universe. Take on the role of a small business owner in an all-out fight against the mighty Black Corp.

name: Assassin's Creed Triple Pack: Black Flag, Unity, Syndicate
summary:
Assassin's Creed 4 Black Flag
The Caribbean, 1715. Relive the truly explosive events that defined the Golden Age of Pirates.

Assassin's Creed Unity
Paris, 1789. Rise up against tyranny in the chaotic and brutal French Revolution.

Assassin's Creed Syndicate
London, 1868. The working classes struggle to survive the Industrial Revolution until a pair of Assassins emerge from the underworld.

name: Ascent: Crash Landing
summary: Ascent: Crash Landing is an open world 3D platforming beta, heavily inspired by classic platformers such as Crash Bandicoot, Rayman, Croc & Spyro.

name: Astlibra Mini Side Story: Cave of Genghiri
summary: Astlibra Mini Side Story: Cave of Genghiri is a side story of Astlibra: Living Proof, a side-scrolling 2D action RPG. It features a variety of enhancements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and a short storyline. Estimated playing time: 15+ hours

name: Assassin's Creed: Utopia
summary: This cancelled project for the iPhone and Android would take place in the 17th century. The player would build a colonial city for immigrants who traveled to the New World.

name: A.S.S.: Awesome Street Skaters
summary: Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.

name: Astro Ranch
summary: Space Farming hits the iPad. Think Animal Crossing meets Harvest Moon in a 1950s sci-fi setting.

name: Assault Course: Combat Academy
summary:
No one ever told you life in the army would be easy. The Assault Course Combat Academy is probably the most challenging and realistic combat training simulator. 
 
You'll experience real pain as you are forced up against a range of gruelling obstacles, water jumps, razor-wire, monkey bars, the log challenge, twelve foot walls and the rope swing. 
 
If you fail you'll be peeling spuds in the mess tent for the next three weeks, so polish your boots, put on your best fatigues and kick some mud.

name: AssaultTech 1: BattleTech
summary: A new game in the Mechwarrior/ Battletech franchise, adds RPG to classic Mech combat.

name: AstroSurfer
summary: Surf through space and chill, take care not to hit anything dangerous!

name: AssaultCube Reloaded
summary: AssaultCube Reloaded is a free-and-open-source first-person-shooter aimed at improving its predecessor, AssaultCube. This game combines the best of all worlds. Realism from Battlefield, anti-cheat from the Quake engine, perks from Call of Duty, and fast-paced gameplay with a low system footprint from AssaultCube.

name: A Super Effective Turnabout
summary: A Pokemon X Ace Attorney crossover fangame.

name: Astro Nut
summary:
Astro Nut is a short action adventure game for the Playdate console by Panic! You land on a desolate planet for unknown reasons, only to find an offbeat group of sentient southern rovers.

Your quest seems simple, but rest assured that all is not as it seems!

name: Asteroids Origin
summary: The arcade quality classic original Asteroids shooter.

name: Astro Invaders
summary: A Space Invaders clone where you control a craft at the bottom of the screen moving left or right, to destroy aliens in formation above dropping bombs on you.

name: Astroderps
summary: Astroderps is a fun puzzle game that you can play for all ages. Your goal is to guide your Astroderps from one portal to the next while avoiding dangerous obstacles.

name: Asteroids Maneuvers
summary: Maneuver through Asteroids and collect Juice!

name: Ascender
summary:
Ascend from the depths of the abyss in this original 8-BIT style arcade game.
Navigate through challenging terrain and defeat enemies while trying not to overheat your engine.
This simple arcade game will have your heart pumping as you approach the next checkpoint.

name: Asgard
summary: A turn based multiplayer strategy game for up to seven players taking up nordic mythology.

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Blackbeard's Wrath
summary: Ready for another sea-worthy challenge? This pack contains three new fearsome contenders who will keep you on your toes: The Jaguar, a good and mighty Aztec Templar Blackbeard, the most feared pirate of the seven seas The Orchid, the stone-hearted pirate queen. Test your abilities by engaging in countless battles against these cold-blooded champions.

name: Asta-Pool: Can Humans Beat Bots?
summary: Everybody loves playing pool, especially if it's in outer-space against robots! Asta-Pool is a casual game - perfect for humans who have never played and those whose friends call them 'shark'. Play old favorites, discover cool, futuristic games, and help J.J. prove that humans can still beat bots!

name: Astrotour VR
summary: Astrotour VR is an exploration, adventure game for Virtual Reality (HTC Vive, Oculus Touch & Quest). Experience full process to space, from astronaut registration to spaceship ride. Explore known but also unknown planets and receive as much information as possible!

name: A Small Journey
summary:
Explore a small world with Avis, a travelling ghost, as she helps the valley's guardian, Willow, find his keys to unlock the passage to a hidden world.

A SMALL JOURNEY is a visual novel/point and click adventure created in Ren'Py. Relax and explore the map locations as you help Avis and Willow find keys to unlock the doors to the Moonlight's Core.

name: A Siren's Call VR: Death Comes At Night
summary: Elliot has decided to return home after 4 years a mysterious email labeled from his brother to stay away and stop asking questions. Elliot rushes off to find out the truth and returns to his old family home .

name: Asterminer
summary: Asterminer is a short, slow paced, relaxing, and atmospheric game about performing tiny pleasant tasks. As the sole operator in charge of your station you must manage and maintain the UEMC mining operation.

name: Assault Wing
summary: Assault Wing is a free 2D side scrolling retro PvP shooter. You will choose your ship, special weapon and ship modification. The arenas are physics based with destructible terrain. See who of your friends is best with the global ranking system.

name: ASMR Journey: Animated Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: ASMR Journey is a jigsaw puzzle game that takes you on a relaxing visit to lively and magical environments.

name: Astronest VR
summary: Astronest VR is a VR online tactical shooting game. In combat with the Allied and Newcomers colonies, board the fighter and defeat the enemy.

name: A Slow Year
summary: A Slow Year is a videogame chapbook of four Atari game poems, one for each season, about the experience of observing things. These games are neither action nor strategy: each of them requires a different kind of sedate observation and methodical input.

name: AstroTrucks
summary: Fly cargo spaceships and deliver materials in a realistic 6-DOF multiplayer simulation. VR and motion platform supported.

name: Astroblaze
summary: Fight the alien threat in Astroblaze

name: Ashes of Creation Apocalypse
summary: The standalone prequel to the upcoming epic MMORPG Ashes of Creation - both a testing ground for new systems and content, as well as a unique last-man-standing action game where magic, steel, and chaos reign supreme in a high fantasy, free-to-play experience.

name: AstroMiner
summary: AstroMiner is a game about building a mining colony in an asteroid field, starting as a small space station and growing to a sprawling space port.

name: As Aventuras da TV Colosso
summary: Platform game featuring characters from the "TV Colosso", a famous children's TV show in Brazil that was produced in the 90s, starring anthropomorphic dogs.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: The Fate of Atlantis - Episode 1: Fields of Elysium
summary:
The Fate of Atlantis – Episode 1: Fields of Elysium is the first of three downloadable content packs in The Fate of Atlantis DLC for Assassin's Creed: Odyssey.
This episode focuses on the visit to Elysium to face Persephone and reveal some of the mystery surrounding the sunken city of Atlantis.

name: Astrosweeper Mini
summary: Infinite minesweeper for the playdate

name: Asura Valley
summary: In this game,You must do everything you can to defeat the king and become the new king . Then click on "new game +" to challenge your own kingdom.

name: Astronaut Training
summary:
Learn to use the Manned Maneuvering Unit in the Neutral Buoyancy Lab swimming pool.
Think Spacewalking and floating in Space is easy? Here you can find out if you have what it takes to master inertial flight.

name: Asteroids Millennium
summary: A modern spin on an old classic! Asteroids Millennium provides exciting new game play without departing from the feel of its predecessors. Collect power-ups, dodge threats, and blast away at asteroids and enemies alike in this survival game that is truly fun to play.

name: Astro Blaster
summary: The player controls a ship (bearing a resemblance to the Battlestar Galactica) which can fire and move left or right. The player must continuously monitor the onscreen temperature and fuel gauges; if the ship overheats, its weapon is disabled, and if it is depleted of fuel, the vessel itself explodes. The player must battle through waves of enemies, which attack with varied formations and flight patterns. When a wave is destroyed, a new one appears. At the end of each sector, the player flies through an asteroid belt and can obtain extra fuel by shooting fireballs. After this, the mother ship is met, where the player docks and refuels for the next sector. Also, the player is rewarded various bonuses for accomplishing certain feats, such as, shooting all enemies in a specific order or shooting all enemies without missing.

name: A Shawn Story
summary: A Shawn Story follows a morning in the life of Shawn, a 20-something office worker who is late for work, AGAIN! Enter the narrator, a sarcastic British man who tries to dictate Shawn's life!

name: Asura
summary: MMORPG 2D pixel game by a Thai development team that has been in service for over 15 years and is still developing continuously.

name: AstronjumpBaby
summary:
AstronjumpBaby is a simple platform、jump game, 
it's infinite, no endless, and you can't pause. 
Challenge your patience and reaction.

name: A Simple Shooter
summary: A fun-little topdown shooter game using Kenney's assets.

name: Asy przestworzy
summary: Aces Przestworzy is a Polish air simulator, bringing us back to the times of World War I to the north-east of France.

name: Assassins vs Pirates
summary: Sword fight and free run with and against your friends in this team based online+couch arena brawler.

name: Astro Mission: Moon
summary: Overcome all obstacles to cross the Moon. But watch your instincts.

name: AstroSlugs
summary: Astroslugs is a puzzle game that is extremely easy to pick up. It features interesting puzzles which require you to fit a number of different shapes upon a board. You fill all available spaces with all the available shapes to solve each one. We have focused on simplifying the role of placing pieces so there is no moving pieces into place and clicking buttons to rotate and flip. Instead, you use your mouse to draw them into place, while drawing over an already present shape will remove it. It's a very simple mechanic which anyone can easily understand. The story of the game revolves around the evil but slightly incompetent Astroslugs who strife to leave their home planet and conquer the universe. Their only problem: They have no source of energy to jumpstart their space craft. Now they turn to you to fix this problem and get them on their way to the stars.

name: Asterion
summary: ASTERION is a 3D action and adventure game with puzzle elements, very much in the vein of Zelda games with a dash of Souls-like. You are Asterion, last in a long line of minotaurs bred to brave the dangers of the Labyrinth of Crete: an ancient, enigmatic, massive structure.

name: Asian Riddles 2
summary: Solve the riddles of the great asian wise men again! Prove you are a truly master of griddlers!

name: A Story of the End: Revere
summary: A Story of the End: Revere is a story-rich RPG that tells the story of Troy, a once-proud Lumerian who realizes the consequences of his people's actions to others across the land.

name: Asteroids
summary: Asteroids (Software Farm) is a clone of the Arcade version which sees your craft in the middle of an asteroid field and you must destroy all the asteroids to survive. The asteroids start off large and when you shoot one then it splits into two, and shooting an asteroid this size splits it into two again before being destroyed with another shot. Occasionally an alien craft appears moving across the screen and this can be destroyed for extra points. If you are hit by an asteroid or the alien craft then you lose one of three lives. You are able to turn your ship 360 degrees as well as move forward. There are three skill levels (1-3) and four players can play with each player taking it in turn when the last player is killed.

name: Asterix & Obelix Take on Caesar
summary:
The Game Boy Color port of Asterix & Obelix take on Ceasar.

Asterix & Obelix take on Caesar is an action video game based on the film of the same name.

name: A Series of Interactive Stories Where No Matter What You Do You Are Immediately Killed by a Werewolf
summary: Can you escape the werewolf? (No.)

name: A shelter
summary: Wake up in a shelter and follow along as the little details reveal a bigger picture.

name: AstroMenace
summary: Immerse into a decisive battle against tons of cunning foes, face the terrifying bosses and protect your homeland throughout 15 diverse levels of the game. The hardcore gameplay of AstroMenace, packed with pure non-stop action, will become a full scale test for your basic instinct of survival.

name: As the Master Says
summary: This story stars a young heir to a vast fortune who has lived in a giant mansion his whole life. He's spent most of it with two butlers, Vincent and Kain, who are like brothers to him. He likes to play tricks and is always making trouble for the level-headed Vincent.

name: Astro Pirates
summary: Space pirate co-op hack-and-slash roguelike flight shooter game-description-salad!

name: Assetto Corsa: Dream Pack 1
summary: The DREAM PACK 1 is the first add-on content pack ASSETTO CORSA: it adds to Assetto Corsa the legendary circuit of Nürburgring-Nordschleife and ten new awesome cars. The circuit has been reproduced for the first time in a PC racing simulation using the Laserscan Technology, that guarantees the maximum level of precision in reproducing...

name: Asteroids... But Roguelite
summary: Start off as a weak ship with a simple attack and fight through waves of enemies, earning currency in order to purchase upgrades for your ship. The never ending waves of enemies grow in number, power, and variety as you progress. Purchase upgrades to keep pace with them.

name: A Street Story
summary: A Street Story is an interactive story in which you play a gangster in the suburbs from Paris, France. Discover a troubled world mixing gangsters, cops and terrorists. Choose your own path among those shady characters and try to survive!

name: AsteRoid Rage
summary: Destroy everything in this short casual physics game!

name: As Planned
summary: "As Planned" is a puzzle game in which players give a limited number of instructions to a slime that repeats the same movement to move boxes to specified positions.

name: Ashen Knights: One Passage
summary: Two heroes, two different genres: souls-like & hack’n’slash. They switch places and trigger a wild emotional storm making sure you never get bored of playing. Assay your strength and stamina as a defender of the Abyss-devoured world. Be merciless yet cautious in Ashen Knights: One Passage.

name: Aspect Heroes
summary: Turn-based tactical strategy game with a focus on huge hero and enemy selection. Fight infinite waves of greatly varying enemies while you earn rewards for each wave clear. Craft gear to succeed in the next round and make the hero specific leaderboards! Unlock more heroes and story perspectives!

name: Ascend
summary: A Reverse Roguelike. A victorious hero climbs out of a dungeon, losing his abilities as he does so.

name: ASMR Slicing: Complete Edition
summary: Slice multiple objects made of kinetic sand in the most satisfying ASMR cutting game!

name: Ashita no Joe 2: The Anime Super Remix
summary: A video game based on the Ashita no Joe anime.

name: A Simple Rage Kind of Game
summary: Try to collect all the points before the timer runs out!!!!

name: Ash
summary:
Ash is a classic turn-based RPG, featuring a massive, fully-realized world with lush visuals, and a wonderfully compelling story.

These are strange days for Aghaus. By order of the Magistrate, the Royal Guard is to assemble for deployment in two days' time. It has been years since I last left the capital, and further still that I can remember such a command being issued! But what need is there for a Royal Guard, when no King sits upon the throne? Though my oath binds me to his service, the Magistrate is not my liege. He rules in the absence of a rightful heir.

My men await their orders; they too are uneasy. It is for their sake that I stay my tongue, and place my faith in the Almighty that my fears are unfounded.

Tomorrow, we make for the East.

name: Assassin: Special Edition
summary: Storyline is fairly simple. The character is an assassin that has been hired to kill the antagonist of the game, "Midan". He is then dropped behind enemy lines and must first disable Midan's power source, and then assassinate him. Assassin: Special Edition is a re-release with some various gameplay elements altered. The assassin is armed with a laser gun.

name: Astra Etherium
summary: A vertical shoot-'em-up focusing on the adventures of a space bounty hunter.

name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Ultimate Edition
summary:
This Ultimate Edition contains:

- Assassin's Creed: Revelations
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - The Ancestors Character Pack
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - The Lost Archive

name: Astro Aqua Kitty: Pawsome Collection
summary: The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Pick your crew, then blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids.

name: Asteroid Impact Survival
summary: Are you ready for the apocalypse? Gather supplies, prepare your shelter and try to survive when the world you know is falling into pieces.

name: Asphalt
summary: A game that released for Amstrad CPC.

name: A Sensei's Story
summary: Find out if you have what it takes to teach English in a foreign land as you live, laugh, and love each day in Japan! Experience what it’s like to live and work in the Japanese city of Fukuoka. Make friends, enemies, or lovers out of your fellow co-workers. Teach with kindness and intelligence, or sarcasm and stupidity.

name: Asphalt Audi RS 3
summary: An Asphalt game that released for mobile platform.

name: Asphalt Nitro 2
summary: A sequel to Asphalt Nitro.

name: AshenForest
summary: AshenForest is a roguelite action RPG focused on boss-rush. To purify the ashen forest that is causing the plague, you must fight against all the monsters lurking in the forest.

name: Asphalt: Import Tuner Edition
summary: An Asphalt game that released for legacy mobile devices.

name: Ascension: Arenas of War
summary: Ascension mixes the fast paced play of an FPS with skill based classes, whilst encouraging a team dynamic in order to become victorious.

name: Astral Frontier
summary: Change your fate in a world to the brink of extinction! A space fantasy RPG!

name: Asteroid Belt
summary:
Classical Atari 2600 game! In Asteroid Belt you are flying - guess what - through an asteroid belt. Typical for Atari is the lack of and ending, so you´re shooting asteroids for points. You can fly and also shoot in four different directions and even control your speed. Sometimes there is a giant UFO trying to catch and kill you, so the fast speed is comming in handy, although you have to avoid the asteroids and flee from the giant UFO. 
 
This is one of the few non-popular Atari games amongst the universe of Atari Space-games that is really good.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Thrown to the Dogs
summary: Thrown to the Dogs is a downloadable content pre-order expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Shadows that is expected to release alongside the main game. It will involve helping a loyal dog avenge his late master.

name: Asteroid Hideout
summary: Similar to classic Asteroids you pilot a spaceship through an asteroid belt, but additionally fight waves of enemies. Every hit gives you some score and increases your score multiplier. Go for the highscore! Progress by unlocking more ships and applying upgrades and dive into higher difficulties!

name: Assassin's Belief
summary: This is an interesting balloon game where balloons appear randomly from the edge below the stage and disappear when they rise to the edge above the stage.

name: Assassin's Creed: Memories
summary: Assassin's Creed: Memories is a role-playing trading card game, developed exclusively for the iOS. The servers were closed on 13 March 2015.

name: Asteroidc
summary: You're in control of a spaceship and your mission is to destroy as many asteroids as you can. Compete for the highest place on the Leaderboard.

name: Astro Attack
summary: Astro Attack is a Shoot-'Em-Up game, developed and published by Amsoft, which was released in Europe in 1984.

name: Assetto Corsa: Ferrari 70th Anniversary Pack
summary: The Ferrari 70th Anniversary Celebration Pack introduces seven iconic cars, including the SF70H, the sixteenth car produced by Ferrari to compete in the F1 World Championshipone of which has been chosen by our community!

name: A Smooth Game Unlike Life
summary: Little Jessie's adventure to find a reason to stay alive. Playable with only one hand (WSAD). Continue eating those chips with the other hand(s).

name: Asphalt: Urban GT 2
summary: Asphalt: Urban GT 2 shifts into gear with six game modes, numerous tuning possibilities, 30 tracks and 36 licensed cars and motorcycles - taking handheld racing simulations to a new level. To keep the action hot, Asphalt: Urban GT 2 features music from Moby and music and appearances from the Pussycat Dolls.

name: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness
summary: Astro Adventures: And the Portals of Madness is a platform game with puzzles where you control Astro, an Astronaut who is on a lunar base whose mission is to research teleportation. After a big accident millions of portals start to appear. Now he has to find a way to escape.

name: A Snowman's Chance
summary: Survive Hell as a snowman until you can freeze it over! in this casual action roguelike, you can "snowball" your way through the demons of Hell by collecting power ups and avoiding lava. but you might just have a snowman's chance...

name: Ascent
summary:
Easy to learn, impossible to master; Ascent is a game where the sole task is to roll a snowball up a massive mountain.

The release date of this game is estimated to be somewhere around late November.

name: Ash of Gods: Arena
summary: Ash of Gods: Arena is an online game which combines turn-based tactical combat and elements of a card collectibles game. Based on multiplayer mode from the original award-winning game, Ash of Gods: Redemption.

name: Astronation
summary: An endless space sandbox VR multiplayer RPG world

name: Astérix & Obélix
summary: Astérix & Obelix is a platform game where one player can choose to control either Asterix or Obelix or two players can play simultaneously. The mission of the two Gauls is to acquire artifacts from all across Europe. The game, like the comics, is set around 50 BC. It includes some bonus levels like a rugby match and the Olympic Games in Greece. Codes are used to save the player's progress.

name: Astérix: Operation Getafix
summary: Getafix has been hit on the head by an enchanted stone and can't remember the formula to super human strength potion. It's up to you to find as many ingredients as you can and try as many combinations as possible until you find the right one.

name: A Sun of Salt
summary: Experience love, mystery, and horror, as captain of a small crew on a life-long mission where you're just as likely to find a cold end as you are love.

name: Astro-Dodge
summary: In this Asteroids clone, you get points by shooting enemy ships, and asteroids which gradually break down into smaller and smaller pieces. Your controls are rotating clockwise or counter-clockwise, thrusting, firing, and hyperspace. As you progress, the levels will get more and more difficult as you move into areas with more and more asteroids.

name: Asteroids
summary: Atari 5200 and Atari 8-bit ports of Asteroids. It was previously unreleased for the 5200.

name: As The Gears Turn Slow
summary: A 1024 restriction map made by Obsidian in a day.

name: Asyle
summary: Lose yourself in Asyle's open world environment to catalogue and tame wondrous creatures called Zoa. Explore the world and with the help of a team of Zoa you've befriended along the way, document the wildlife and uncover the nature of the mysterious catastrophic storms.

name: A Smoker's Story
summary: A short immersive VR experience.

name: A Silly Goofy Dream 2
summary: This game is funny, it is not meant to be taken seriously. ASGD2 is a funny exploration style game in which you go around finding funny NPC's and interacting with them, trying to find them all in a vast world.

name: ASMR Slicing: Joyful Cutting DLC
summary: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny blades to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: Astral Quester
summary: Astral Quester is an Team RPG where you will play the role of an interstellar explorer to recruit, train, and fight. Embark on adventures with the Astrals — young girls. With multiple unique characters to recruit, animations, and a talented voice acting cast bringing them to life.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: Challengers Pack
summary: Challengers Pack adds 5 brand new cars to the main game. The Audi R8 LMS GT3 EVO II, BMW M2 CS Racing, Ferrari 488 GT3 Challenge Evo, Lamborghini Huracan Super Trofeo EVO 2, Porsche 911 GT3 Cup (Type 992)

name: Ask Madame Clairvoya
summary: Ask Madame Clairvoya was an activity that was part of the Lab Flash game on the Luigi's Mansion microsite on Nintendo's North American website. The game featured the fortune-teller ghost, Madame Clairvoya in the Fortune-teller's Room.

name: Asteroids VR
summary: Play the timeless classic in a 21st century finish. Asteroids VR brings the feel of arcades back, only this time compete against players from all around the world.

name: Astro: The Beginning
summary: Astro: The Beginning is a dynamic side scrolling shoot 'em up about a close-knit space team caught in a clusterf*ck of epic proportions.Unravel the evil plans of your foes and secrets of world order while taking down various types of enemies and engaging in crazy boss battles.

name: Ascending Pinball
summary: A minimalistic casual pinball. A classic genre revamp with an endless table. The objective is to overcome the largest amount of levels you can, flipper over flipper. During the journey we’ll run into moving barriers, targets, bonus multipliers, ball savers, jackpots... a lot of the classical elements of pinball with a new twist in the game mechanic.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Collector's Edition
summary:
Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia
- Collector's Box
- Obelix figurine 18cm tall
- Two sticker sheets
- 3 lithographs

name: Ashi
summary: "Ashi," a naughty boy who accidentally entered the "border space" leading to the Divine world. He need to collect pieces of beads to get back home. Let's overcome the difficulties with the help of creatures who are awakened by the power of beads.

name: Astragali
summary: astragali is a short 3d computer program in which you throw objects called "dice", each with their own unique upgrades. The numbers on these dice are combined with a revolutionary new gameplay mechanic called "addition" which is used to determine the winner each match.

name: Ash of War
summary: The story about an uneasy journey of one man. You will experience certain situations, those, that could have happened with our parents, children or even a neighbours on just any other war. Through the eyes of our hero you will see his struggle in a modern war, struggle with oneself.

name: Astronest: The Beginning
summary: AstroNest--the Beginning is a space combat simulator for mobile platforms.

name: Astral Traveler
summary: Blaze your way through 47 challenging tracks as you dodge obstacles at breakneck speeds, shooting down the enemy raiders blocking your path and phasing through pulsars for an extra burst of speed. Your astral core is fading, but the warp gate to the next track is just up ahead, if your skills are tight enough to reach it.

name: Asteroid Hunter
summary: Inspired by arcade classics, asteroid hunter is a top down space shoot em up where your main goal is to try and survive as long as possible. Attempt to avoid death while you destroy everything in your path and unlock new weapons, equipment, and ships.

name: Asimov Laws
summary: Asimov Laws is a brutal rouge lite survival game, set in the depressing Robopocalypse world. Survive the harsh condition in the 12 cities, Crush the robotic butlers, scavenge and survive, plan your days and route, grow stronger through genetic transition and head for the Ark.

name: Assault City
summary: Robots Go Berserk! Dateline: Assault City, 2092. It's a robot mutiny! Central Computer Control is in chaos. Armed KillerBots are running amok, blasting loyal Bots into metal junk and piles of whining servomotors!

name: Assassin's Creed Rogue: Deluxe Edition
summary: Completion of the Siege of Fort de Sable is required in order to generate and unlock the chest that contains all items in the explorer pack.

name: Assault Commander Ultimate
summary:
This is a great Assault Commander collection pack, it includes maps from the following editions:
Assault Commander (original) 8+1 maps
Assault Commander Advance 8+1 maps
Assault Commander Bravo 8+1 maps

name: Asphalt HD
summary: An Asphalt game that released for mobile platform.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Oblivion
Astercys
summary: Step into an alternate realm where you traverse through different dimensions, survive spinning battles, and indulge in plenty of pineapple!

name: Astral Towers
summary: A turn-based card game mixing strategy and puzzle elements: find approach for each of 78 missions.

name: Askisi Gamma
summary: Medium to large terracotta-themed map. The map source is included.

name: Astrohazard Solutions Ltd.
summary: Astrohazard Solutions Ltd. is an interstellar and interspecies corporation dealing mainly in removing and redirecting asteroids and other cosmic junk that threatens their clients.

name: Asylamba : Influence
summary: Making your culture shine is often more effective than taking out weapons!

name: Assassins Guild
summary: In this action-adventure game you will take a role of the former assassins who decided to change his life and leave the assassins' guild to become an ordinary peaceful man. Will his dreams come true?

name: A storm is approaching
summary: Multiple choices, multiple endings.

name: Asteroid Fire
summary: Asteroid Fire is a space-shooter for the Atari 2600 that was released in Europe.

name: Asterix and the Magic Carpet
summary: Asterix, Obelix and Cacofonix are flying to India on a Magic Carpet. Cacofonix has a song that can make it rain for the Indian villagers but during the travel he loses his voice. Asterix and Obelix have to find the cure for Cacofonix' voice and rescue Princess Orinjade.

name: Asphalt: Nitro
summary: Asphalt Nitro is a spin-off of the Asphalt series, based on the 2013 mainline rendition Asphalt 8: Airborne.

name: Astro Blox Revisited
summary: Astro Blox Revisited is an adaptation of Soko-Ban. The aim for the player is to place boxes in the designated places. There are lots of new ideas that change the Soko-Ban aspect. Some fields create inversions which either help or make the task much more difficult.

name: Assembly RTS
summary: Assembly RTS is a real-time strategy game with deep customization mechanics. Discover seemingly endless possibilities. Assemble your perfect army and conquer the enemy! Build a base, gather resources and persist in a hostile, arctic new ice age.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations: Special Edition
summary:
A Europe and Japan-exclusive edition of Assassin's Creed Revelations that included:
The Game soundtrack CD
Two multiplayer characters (The Crusader and Ottoman Doctor)
The Singleplayer Turkish Assassin Armour
The short film Assassin's Creed Ember (Japan-version only)

name: A Sunny Day in Lockdown
summary: A sketch of a spring day in self-isolation.

name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Gold Edition
summary:
The Gold Edition contains the main game and also the three available DLC's. So the games within this compilation are:

- Assassin's Creed: Revelations
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - The Ancestors Character Pack
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations - The Lost Archive

name: Assimilation X
summary: Embody the simulation of a dead mysterious man as he is revived as part of Project Engram. Descend down the various levels of the increasingly mind-bending twisted simulation in order to destroy this electronic universe and end the suffering of millions. The Ultimate Platformer!

name: Asmodeus
summary: Asmodeus is a management adventure game set in a 2.5D side-scrolling world. Collect resources and fight monsters, upgrade your village and defend it against outside threats. Thrive your village with a great commander mind and show your fighting skills during boss fights.

name: Asphalt 3: Street Rules
summary: Asphalt 3: Street Rules is a racing video game by Gameloft Shanghai that was released in 2006 on Java-based mobile phones, in 2007 on non-Java based mobile phones and was also released in 2008 for Nokia's N-Gage 2.0 gaming platform. It is the first mobile game to be played at the World Cyber Games competition. It was the first in the series not to be released for the Nintendo DS.

name: As Above AtumRa So Below
summary: A challenging, first/third person adventure and puzzle game set across multiple plains of existence. You play many characters, mixing their souls to overcome complex challenges and solve deep mysteries to save reality. Built in unreal engine, enjoy a graphically impressive game with a deep story

name: Asteroid Wars
summary: Asteroid Wars is a strategy game at its core. No intro, no story, minimal settings and just pure gameplay. You have your carrier, a bunch of fighters and a whole asteroid field to conquer. But you are not alone.

name: Astral Wield
summary: Embark on Felix's journey to stop an evil King from starting a great war between kingdoms.

name: Ash.
summary: A fantasy adventure game developed by Himeya Soft for the PC-98.

name: Astria
summary: Enter the doomed world of Astria, a land destroyed by Cataclysm where all living things are dying. Play as Gwen, an Astrian willing to make his last move before everything ends.

name: A Step Forward
summary: Help balloon Pong to go back to home where his friend is. You have only one way to revive is find and pass all portals. There are various puzzles and obstacles in front of you. Solve and overcome the problem one by one to move forward.

name: Asou Youichi no Jikenbo: Dochiraka ga Kanojo wo Koroshita
summary:
The victim is Yasuha Shirai, a girlwho lives in a mansion.
She was shot dead in her bedroom.
The suspects were two men who claimed to be her boyfriend.
However, it is unclear which of the two killed her.
Who is the culprit?

name: Astonishing Baseball 2019
summary: It's baseball time! Lead your team to victory in Astonishing Baseball manager!

name: Asteroids: Outpost
summary:
Asteroids: Outpost is an open world, sandbox survival game.

Mankind has expanded its reach into the distant corners of the solar system. Near-space vessels, heavy industry on the moon and thriving colonies on Mars extend humanity's empire into the great blackness of space.

With the earth's mines nearly spent, industrialists rely on the wealth of the heavens. Our solar system's massive Asteroid Belt is a mother lode of resources, just waiting to be torn free and shipped home. "The Belt" is the humanity's newest frontier, as wild and untamed as any that man has faced.

Ambitious prospectors blast off with little more than an Outpost Module and a Mining Tool, to tear the hide off these asteroids and find their fortunes. This bonanza doesn't come without risks. Mere survival is a daily struggle. Asteroid storms bombard the surface, destroying Outposts, and hostile claim jumpers can appear at any moment.

For the brave, there is a fortune to be made. For the foolish - there is only death. Welcome to the new Gold Rush.

name: Assault: Retribution
summary: Assault: Retribution is a 3D platform shooting game that takes place across seven futuristic levels, includes two playable characters with alternate routes, analog control, and memory card support. You can't spell action, adrenaline or assault with out an "A," so go out and kick a few.

name: Assembly Line
summary: A puzzle game centered around controlling an assembly line, released on the Xbox Live Marketplace.

name: Astroe
summary: Multiplayer player 2D space battle. Collect gold, team up and take over the other team's satellites.

name: Asakura! P
summary: Asakura! P is a side-scrolling 2D hardcore action platformer developed by Somiso and released at Comiket 80.

name: Assasseed's Crin
summary: Help Altzio kill as many targets as possible in this small Assassin's Creed demake made for the Mini Ludum Dare #50.

name: Assassin's Creed: Naval Edition
summary:
This bundle contains:

- Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag
- Assassin’s Creed: Rogue

name: Ask her out
summary: A perfectly healthy and adequately normal conversation amongst friends turns into something else entirely.

name: Ascended Survivor
summary: Ascend to the Earth's surface in this vertical shmup! Punch, shoot, and grab enemies both mechanical and natural in your unique ship in this brutally hard vertical shooter.

name: Asteris-K
summary: Venture into the mysteries of outer space, dodging and destroying unique flavors of asteroids, debris, and enemy spacecraft. A twin-stick shooter inspired by various Asteroids remakes, Asteris-K delivers modern visuals and fresh mechanics to a classic genre. (pronounced a-ster-ris-KAY)

name: Astronomia
summary: Astronomia is a spatial 3D puzzle game with a minimalist classic arcade art style. Guide the ball around each level to clear every fragment block and unlock the goal. A fun brain-teaser for casual and hardcore puzzlers alike!

name: Astrela Starlight
summary: Astrela Starlight is an adventure game where the player can explore, interact with various NPCs, complete quests, mine and refine materials, then build new spacecraft and space stations.

name: Assassin at Crimson Keep
summary: Assassin at Crimson Keep is a short visual novel set in a dark, quasi-fantasy world. After a botched assassination attempt, you pursue the King into his lair known as the Crimson Keep. Your small choices can have great consequences, either for good or for evil.

name: Assembly Line
