summary: Assembly Line is a facility map created in UDMF format with a warm color scheme and clean visual style. The map makes use of arena based encounters, modern scripting capabilities and a dynamic, purpose written soundtrack scoring your playthrough.

name: As Above So Below
summary: As Above So Below is a Survival Horror Open World Action/RPG. You play as a recent college graduate offered a job in a small town, but upon arrival things are not what they seem. Face a series of unexplained events that unravel history, and ultimately change the future. Explore, Fight, Survive.

name: A Story Told By The Stars
summary:
Set in a near, highly militarized future, two guys look at the stars wondering about their past. Even though they started with the wrong foot, their lives seems to be intertwined by fate.

Watch how the story of Mark and Ansel develop creating new memories with them through the stars.

name: Ashes: 2063 - Enriched Edition
summary: Bundle of Ashes 2063 and its expansion Ashes 2063: Dead Man Walking. The Enriched Edition brings the original game's graphics, audio and game mechanics up to parity with its sequel Ashes Afterglow.

name: Astro Warrior/Pit Pot
summary: A collection of the games Astro Warrior and Pit Pot, included in one "combo cartridge"

name: Astrozombies
summary: Astrozombies is a modern take on the classic action & platforming games we grew up with, presented with a unique 2D aesthetic. Jump right into the action with simple controls, and make your way through challenging levels with some kick-ass music. Always remember: run right, kill everything!

name: Assault Trooper
summary: Assault Trooper is an isometric stealth shooter that sends you to perform fifty missions in many exotic locations, such as Libya, North Korea, Afghanistan, and so on. At the beginning of the game you get to choose from only a few different missions in each location, but completing them will open new ones. The objectives vary from, for example, assassinating enemy officers to stealing important documents or rescuing hostages.

name: Astortion
summary: Astortion is a minimalistic, atmospheric puzzle-platformer that revolves around gravity. Explore the ruins of the most pivotal research facility on earth, unlock new abilities that mess with spacetime itself, and get to the bottom of what is going on.

name: Asian Riddles 4
summary: Dive into an enchanting Eastern atmosphere and solve the mysteries of the wise ones in Asian Riddles 4! 180 new Griddlers!

name: Astro Wars
summary: Astro Wars is a Free Multiplayer Space Strategy Game. You start at the edge of the galaxy where you can build up, colonize and take over planets in competition with players from all over the world!

name: A Story of Merchant
summary: A Story of Merchant is a 2D side-scrolling, Action-RPG, Set in an The old Town of Ayotha.

name: Assetto Corsa: Red Pack
summary: The Assetto Corsa: Red Pack includes 7 new legendary Italian cars!

name: Asian Mahjong
summary: Join a Asian Mahjong. Complete over 100 unique levels to gain experience and points. Improve your rank and progress.

name: A Sirius Game
summary: A Sirius Game is 3D, action-adventure game with RPG elements. It requires the player’s ship to escort other merchant ships to different ports unharmed by the pirates and also trade different items for money.

name: ASA: A Space Adventure
summary: ASA: A Space Adventure is a first-person node-based adventure game made in tribute to Riven and 2001: A Space Odyssey.

name: Asphalt Retro
summary: An Asphalt game that released for web browsers.

name: Asobu Rakugaki
summary: Asobu Rakugaki is a 2D platform puzzle game that was developed on Net Yaroze.

name: Astlibra: Living proof
summary: ASTLIBRA -Living proof- is a side scrolling 2D action RPG. It contains various reinforcement elements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and long story. Estimated playtime: 40+ hours

name: Assembly Required
summary: Create a perilous furniture maze, deviously designed to confuse and constrain your customers. With the aid of your loyal employees and truly devilish products, you will build the furniture empire of your dreams… and their nightmares!

name: Assessment
summary: Now that the study period is over, please download your personalized assessment to complete your program. Please be advised the Stillman Personal Assessment System may have some incomplete cognitive features at the time of download. Please refrain from reporting any errors you may encounter.

name: A Shard of Mine
summary: Who is Luna? Where is she? Why is this all your fault? Venture into a cursed land and find more about this mystery!

name: Ashimeyama
summary: Discover Ashimeyama.

name: Astroblaster
summary: An arcade-style 2D top-down space shooter. Blow up space rocks and space pirates for as long as you can. You'll also need to maximize a delicately-balanced economy of resources. Keep trying to out-do yourself! Five boss ships will break in at various points to make life difficult.

name: Asterix and Caesar's Challenge
summary:
You accompany Astérix and Obélix in their adventures. The game is set up like the old school Batman Returns, or King of Dragons. You have an energy bar. Use your energy to perform two different attacks and beat the Roman army.

Often mistaken for the P-CD-i release "Asterix: Caesar's Challenge", this game was released for PC and is thought to be a fan-made 2d scroller beat-em-up developed by Belavi Team and taken from the original Arcade game "Asterix".

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Redemption
summary: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Redemption is the third of three downloadable content packs in The Tyranny of King Washington.

name: As simple as it could get
summary: Survive this harsh world in a survival game where you make friends and also complete the story of the game we will see you in game soon.

name: Astral Divide
summary: You wakeup alone in a damaged spaceship. With no memories and only radio communications with HQ, you will have to investigate what is going on here. But survival comes first: gather resources, build a spaceship out of gear and steam and explore hand-crafted planets with unique biomes and resources.

name: A Strange City
summary: Run and shoot to escape from the mechanical fish.

name: As Per My Last Email
summary: Unleash your office rage—one swing at a time!

name: Astlan
summary: A gravity game for PC. The gameplay is all about controlling a ship versus the inertia and gravity

name: Astrorun
summary: Play as an interstellar astronaut who needs to be an expert jumper by jumping across the ground of several different planets in near-zero gravity.

name: Ash Arms
summary: Simulator RPG featuring anthropomorphic World War weapons

name: A Second Face: The Eye of Geltz is watching Us
summary: A Second Face is a free underground Adventure game with philosophical touch that was developed by Jospin Le Woltaire in 2008.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: The Chemical Revolution
summary: In this extra mission, help Lavoisier, considered to be the "Father of Modern Chemistry", to escape from his kidnappers and recover his poison bomb formula.

name: Astral Equilibrium
summary: Two decades have passed since Kjan and Elendel fought to preserve the integrity of the universe in Kien, on Game Boy Advance, and now their mentor wakes them up again, as the dark clouds of chaos are casting terrifying shadows on the Astral Equilibrium, the evil Khaalbak arises once again.

name: As Long As We're Together: Magical Girls Sweet & Pure
summary: As Long As We're Together is a very small visual novel about friendship between two girls who also happen to be magical girls. Made for the friendship jam! A single play through is about five minutes, but with lots of variation so you can play the game multiple times.

name: Asteroids, Inc.
summary: Asteroids, Inc. is an idle narrative game where you'll take control of an asteroid mining company. Harvest the element Glorium from asteroids in order to make money, grow your business, and eventually change the world! All is not what it seems, however, and it's up to you to make the right decisions, especially since the asteroids are a finite resource ...

name: Astrå
summary:
A game inspired by Greek mythology. Astrå is the adventure of Hemera, the goddess of daylight.

Hemera upholds the balance between day and night, between light and darkness. Creatures of the night steal the light in their quest for eternal darkness, and Hemera embarks on an adventure to restore the balance, this is the starting point of Astrå.

Astrå is a one touch arcade platformer, the use of gravity mechanics gives the player a freedom of movement that hasn’t been seen on one touch games before. As you advance, you will solve puzzles and unlock secrets.

The atmospheric music and quirky art will immerse you in a unique universe.

Help Hemera fight darkness, and discover the wonders and secrets of the unique Astrå universe!

name: Asterism: Apex of War
summary: First and third person single player sci fi action shooter. Destroy the Neurobonded menace and prevent humanities extinction.

name: A Slime and a Civil War
summary: Go through a world where every living being is a slime and take down the slime dictator in this 2D side-scrolling action game. Discover the secrets of a world no more on your journey.

name: A Sky Full of Stars Fine Days
summary: A fandisc sequel of the original A Sky Full of Stars / Miazora. Adds routes for Honoka, Miharu, and Hinami, in addition to sequel routes for the original 4 heroines.

name: Astro Wars II: Battle in Galaxy
summary: Astro Wars II: Battle in Galaxy is the follow-up to Super Cassette Vision's previous space shooter.

name: AstroCleaners
summary: Fight Giant Aliens, buy crazy guns, hire a killer robot buddy!

name: Astro Miner: Moons
summary: Explore 12 moons and collect all the treasures using your new vehicles!

name: Ashi: Lake of Light
summary: Find the true path through the night and into the sunrise in Ashi: Lake of Light. Use floating candles to guide the path of a solitary firefly through a twilight world in this gentle and meditative puzzle game.

name: Astro Wars: Invader From Space
summary: Astro Wars (subtitled Invader From Space on the title screen) is a space shooter for the Super Cassette Vision.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Secret Missions
summary: Exciting new scenarios, new units, and huge maps await you in Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation’s largest DLC yet! Take on the role of a PHC leader and conquer dangerous missions where the odds are stacked against you, or join with the Substrate to repel your PHC oppressors.

name: Asylum K
summary: Just blast'em all... You'll think later... Maybe.

name: Astro Heist
summary: Launch into the exhilarating world of Astro Heist, an asymmetric PVP Screen vs. VR game of cunning and infiltration set within bustling space outposts. Blend into the environment and sneak through challenging missions, but beware, the VR watcher is vigilant and one false move could give you away!

name: Assault Bandit
summary: Hop into your hotrod and blast up the streets. Fast moving upgrade system keeps you challenged so you can push the limits of speed and unleash some wicked firepower.

name: A Short Tale of Solitude
summary: A Short Tale of Solitude is an adventure horror game, combining exploration, puzzles and survival where the gameplay is focused on fear mechanics.

name: Ashes
summary: This horror game inspired by Chinese folklore offers an enthralling journey through the depths of the Underworld. As you delve deeper, you'll unravel hidden secrets veiled in the darkness.

name: Asura Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Astronaut Spacewalk
summary: Astronaut Spacewalk is a highly realistic astronaut jetpack simulator. Fly the Manned Manouvering Unit from the Space Shuttle cargo bay to several satellites, align into position to make repairs and dock back into the Shuttle. Fly the jetpack in 20 daring missions where you have to rendezvous with different satellites from the smaller TDRS and Solar Maximum, medium sized like the Magellan and Galileo probes, to the big Skylab, Hubble telescope and Russian MIR station.

name: Assassin's Creed II: Deluxe Edition
summary: An epic story of family, vengeance and conspiracy set in the pristine, yet brutal, backdrop of a Renaissance Italy.

name: A Space for the Unbound: Collector's Edition
Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
summary:
A remaster of Assassin's Creed Brotherhood included with Assassin's Creed: The Ezio Collection.

All the single-player add-on content (Copernicus Conspiracy, The Da Vinci Disappearance) is included and multiplayer is removed.

name: Astra Defender
summary: Blast through enemies, build defenses, launch fighters, and upgrade your way to victory in this fast-paced space shooter/action RTS hybrid.

name: Astra Nova
summary: Astra Nova is a RPG set in a universe on the brink of destruction, offering players a blend of immersive storytelling, strategic gameplay, and next-gen rewards.

name: Askold: Path of the Shadow
summary: Askold: Path of the Shadow is a stealth game with exciting story. Investigate extensive levels from a cosy small village to the shadowy hostile swamp. Beat your enemies and complete the mission in the most unexpected ways. Inquire the complicated storyline and determine the fate of the Kingdom.

name: Astra Intra
summary: A short space-horror game where you desperately try to keep the crew members of a defective spaceship alive, as you are all the last hope for humanity's survival.

name: Astral
summary: The future came. You'd think that means the apex of the progress and science, but no. After the epidemic spread all over the world in 2022, 95% of the whole population mutated into horrible creatures without any moral values or humanity and started hunting everything that moves. The planet became empty.

name: Astro Link
summary: Astro Link is a Portal-like puzzle game that takes place withing the mysterious Astro Link facility. What is happening to this place? Will test subject #602 be able to find out?

name: Astra Superstars
summary:
A one-on-one 2D fighting game, Astra Superstars pits all the champions of the magical kingdom against each other in a series of 3-round fights to earn the right to challenge the evil Satan Volte and try to put an end to his reign of terror.

Seeing as how all the fighters have magical abilities, the fights take place in mid-air, allowing you and your opponent to fly all over the arena while you try to defeat each other using your basic attacks, special moves (triggered by specific controller motions) and super attacks.

name: Asteroid Miner
summary:
Travel with your spaceship.

Start mining on the asteroid.

Gather resources and develop your equipment.

name: Astroneer: Evolution Edition
summary: The Astroneer: Evolution Edition bundles the base game and dozens of free updates (Creative Mode, The Xenobiology, Rails, Awakening content updates & more!!!) with the Evolution Pack that includes the exclusive Evolution Suit as well as a bundle of QBITS that you can use to make sure your Astroneer has a unique look as soon as you land on Sylva.

name: A Stroke of Fate: Operation Bunker
summary: Detective adventure game in WWII historical surroundings

name: Astroneer: Glitchwalkers - Deluxe Edition
summary: This bundle includes the ASTRONEER base game, Glitchwalkers DLC and Glitchwalkers Deluxe Cosmetic Pack.

name: Ash of War: Operation Sundown
summary: The story of Joe is not yet over. See the changes of Joe, see the fate of the ASH squad, what happens next. Do you believe in luck?

name: Asciicker
summary: ASCIICKER (read as Ass-kicker) is all ASCII, meaning the graphics are made up entirely from colored letters, numbers, and symbols. The only exception is that the game creates the illusion of three-dimensional space.

name: Ascape
summary: An exploration game with ASCII art

name: Asteroids Hyper 64
summary: Asteroids Hyper 64 is an updated version of the classic arcade blast 'em up and features full 3D environments, all new weapons and defense systems and a 2 player split-screen mode. The gameplay, however, is exactly the same. Pilot a spacecraft and destroy the on-coming asteroids, each of different sizes. Alien ships and black holes are also out there, along with ship upgrades that update your ships weapons and defense systems.

name: Ashura Blaster
summary: An upward-scrolling helicopter game. Shoot everything in your path.

name: Asha Empire: Exodus
summary: Asha Empire: Exodus is an exhilarating action shooter set in the expansive Asha Galaxy. Experience the intense final hours before the fall of Sirina, a critical imperial industrial military base, as Commander Rexis or Commander Kyra. Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy-occupied base, retrieve vital information, and escape before the Empire commences bombardment from space.

name: Assassination Box
summary: ASSASSINATION BOX is a first person shooter. Fight endless waves of enemies in Survival mode or start stealth night mission. Fight for a better score and higher rank.

name: Assault Squad 2: Men of War Origins
summary: 1C Company and Digitalmindsoft present Assault Squad 2: Men of War Origins, the modern remake of the original bestselling Men of War RTS

name: A Slug's Dream
summary: Single-player puzzle game about a slug searching for food in a dream-like world of portals, flowers and perils.

name: Astro Aqua Kitty: Limited Edition
summary:
The cats from Aqua Kitty are back!
The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Pick your crew, then blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids. Battle bizarre enemies, mine magnificent gems, grab new weapons, install enhancing devices, and unlock your crews' unique skills as you level up XP. Just watch out for marauding pirate rabbits, always trying to be first to the loot!

Box contents
- Astro Aqua Kitty Collector’s Box
- Astro Aqua Kitty (region free)
- Astro Aqua Kitty Manual
- Astro Aqua Kitty Original Soundtrack
- Astro Aqua Kitty Numbered Certificate
- Astro Aqua Kitty Stickers

name: Asteroid Arena
summary: A player vs player, last man standing, space ship arena battle.

name: Astro Fury
summary: You are alone against the whole hip of spaceships attacking the planet! Their furious attacks don't let you move freely, their space supremacy is strong, their force is obvious as never before. Lots of alien enemies ruled by the monster-boss are here and there is no escape from them in the galaxy. Unless you learn the tactics and start to fight with them! Pull yourself together, don't be scared by the mission and the rival's strength - go ahead and prove you are the one to save the planet from the invaders! Astro Fury is an excellent experience for those who adore fighting, changing weapons and defeating evil opponents. Alone against the huge army! What bravery must you have to stop them - still nothing is impossible! You've got the equipment, the ship, and the talent of an unsurpassed pilot! Astro Fury will be a great campaign with furious onslaught, aggressive attacks and you must be ready for swift moves and exact shooting! Astro Fury contains three skill levels, numerous stages that will end with a final battle against the boss. You are free to get upgrades - if you fight well enough and destroy many aircrafts. Every time you are attacked you need to dodge the bullet, the rocket or whatever you are shot with. Otherwise the number of lives will be decreased. There are 10 big levels with stages inside. Each is full of a wide variety of aircrafts that differ in size, level of danger and speed. You need to adjust to the new types of enemies quickly or you will be the one defeated today!

name: Asphalt 4: Elite Racing
summary: Face the world's richest drivers in high-speed races through traffic. Choose among 10 dream cars and bikes from the world's most prestigious manufacturers, such as Ferrari and Bugatti, and zoom through the streets of Monte Carlo, New York, Shanghai, Paris, Dubai, and Beverly Hills to impose your style. Check your rides in your own garage and spend millions to tune them. The police await you in each city with roadblocks and helicopters to try and confiscate your expensive toy, so you'll need to drive to the limit to avoid them. Can you become the ultimate VIP of urban racing?

name: Ascension VR: War of Shadows
summary: A new darkness seeps into New Vigil from the Void, intent on restoring despair and desolation to a world that has forgotten it. The four factions recall their veteran heroes and reawaken the great war machines of the past, as they plan their first in the chaotic ebb and flow of light and dark. The War of Shadows has begun!

name: Astro Zip VR
summary: Zip past polygon asteroids and escape evil chasing robots while keeping your ship fueled with glowing gems! Watch out for space mines and collect power ups to keep going as far as you can go!

name: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D
summary: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D is a remake of the original Asphalt 3: Street Rules with new polygonal graphics for both car models and scenery. Aside from the visuals there are no big differences in terms of gameplay and content. It's a street racing game featuring licensed cars and motorbikes with racing in cities all over the world. There are seven locations with four races in each.

name: Asbak
summary: Asbak is a hack n' slash action roguelike platformer. Exorcise the demons lurking in urban Indonesia. BE FEARLESS!

name: Ascender
summary: Ascender is a 2D explorative puzzle platformer. The game is set in the open world of GOA's districts, and the player will face many unique puzzles to solve.

name: Astraea
summary: Astraea is a 2D Shoot 'em up game. You will fight through enemies of increasing strength and frequency. As you defeat enemies you gain access to upgrades to make your ship stronger. Attempt to max out your ship and try to beat others high scores.

name: Assignment 42
summary: You’re the new CONTROLLER.The AI know that, and they’ll probably tease you, the machine derps. Don’t be concerned, though. The instant there’s an assignment on the projector, they are ready to follow their program. Every literal command you set.

name: Asphalt: Urban GT
summary:
Asphalt Urban GT is a racing video game for the Nintendo DS and the Nokia N-Gage handheld video game consoles. It was developed by Gameloft and published by Ubisoft, and released on November 21, 2004, making it one of the DS launch titles. It has support for wireless multiplayer with up to four opponents, and takes advantage of the DS's support for 3D graphics (while showing unaccelerated N-Gage's power to match DS's graphics), showing the action from three camera angles. Replays are also available. The bottom screen of the DS is utilized to provide strategic tips and player information.

The game sports nine tracks modelled after real-world locations such as Paris and New York City. The game's 23 cars are licensed from real manufacturers such as Lamborghini, Hummer, Volkswagen, and others, and can be enhanced with over 30 addons

name: ASCII Attack
summary:
A Cold War super computer has gone rogue and is printing launch codes for a first strike. There is only one way to prevent nuclear Armageddon; enter the dot matrix, collect the codes, and defeat the ASCII army.

ASCII Attack is a retro style indie action title inspired by arcade games of yesteryear. It is a skill based game with a unique set of controls and a new take on classic arcade action.

name: Assault Suits Valken Declassified
summary: The definitive retro mecha game! Assault Suits Valken is a mecha shoot-em-up released by Masaya in 1992. Pilot your Valken mecha across 7 stages.

name: A Shiver in Time
summary: Run & jump in this short puzzle-platformer!

name: Asatsugutori
summary: Asatsugutori is an investigative adventure game that combines a visual novel with real-time 2D isometric exploration. It features a time loop feature that triggers when another character gets killed within the day. The player has an objective to gather as much information as possible by examining the rooms and talking with other characters.

name: Assembly
summary:
Today has been an extraordinarily long day. You picked up the keys to your new apartment in the morning, you went shopping for furniture in the afternoon, and you've spent the evening putting it together.

And you're almost finished -- there's one box left.

ASSEMBLY is a story of magic and adventure. Can you assemble a small table? Can you save the world from the vengeance of ancient gods?

name: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest.
summary: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest. is an "unofficial" update to the series' earlier "Limited" entry on Sega Saturn. It was originally released in 1998 as a series of patch files to be used on a legitimate copy of the game. This version of the game is stripped down purely to its "Versus" mode, and features a heavily rebalanced cast, along with a few mechanical tweaks.

name: Ashkeep
summary: Ashkeep is a character-based 3v3 stealth first-person shooter. Sneak your way to steal the objective using epic spy gadgets!

name: Ashen Will
summary: Trapped, and with enemies closing in, your only chance of survival is to rely on the simple camera you hold. Ashen Will is an atmospheric maze-based horror game, where your options are preciously low. No one is coming to help. No one is coming to save you. Survive.

name: Astracraft
summary: Astracraft is the first sandbox rover craft & combat game on mobile. Navigate your creation into a great space adventure!

name: Asian Food Cart Tycoon
summary: Grow your satay business and become the most successful satay entrepreneur in the world!

name: A Stroke of Fate: Operation Valkyrie
summary: Operation Valkyrie is a famous plan of the German Resistance to overthrow  the tyrannical Nazi government. Standartenfuhrer Gerhard Mayer, a patriot who works in Reich Security Head Office learns that Gestapo has tracked down the conspirators. He does everything possible to make the investigation assigned to him and tries to mislead Gestapo in order to help the Resistance to overthrow the Nazi regime and stop the war.

name: Astro
summary: A journey going through impossible geometrical worlds. Experience this meditative and calming puzzle game by creating portals and modifing the environment.

name: A Secret Bitsy Game
summary: Discover an ancient city with ancient secrets.

name: Astro Error
summary: Our character, who fell to a planet as a result of our ship's malfunction, collects the parts of our ship and tries to get rid of the planet by restarting the ship. have the right to carry a maximum of one piece. With energy crystals, it can charge our radio and call reinforcements.

name: Astroneer: Athlesiure Bundle
summary: The Athleisure Suit is a brand new Astroneer Suit exclusively available in this bundle, alongside some of our favorite cosmetic pairings. In addition to the Suit we are bringing back the much requested “Vintage” palette and visor from our archives!

name: ASCII Wars
summary: Protect the servers. Locate the vulnerabilities. Exterminate the viruses. This fast paced strategy game lets you enter terminal commands from a VR interface to defeat the viruses before you become overrun.

name: A Silent Statue
summary: Play as world's most relatable MC: "Tired guy" as you uncover the mysteries of an old abandoned mansion full of suspiciously hot statues.

name: Astrobatics
summary: Astrobatics is a fast-paced game that will delight fans of the space-shooter genre, and indeed adrenalin-seekers in general, and the sheer speed of the action is something that's impossible to get across in words.

name: Asteroids & Super Breakout
summary: Mini-CD double pack

name: Astraverse
summary: Create your own character, choose your own story and explore 5 different planets in a sci-fi "phantasy" beat 'em up RPG for up to 4-players!

name: Astro Ninja Man DX
summary: This is an expanded version of Astro Ninja Man, that includes a new game mode ("Quick Game") where players have three minutes in a special stage (with new music by Nobuyuki Shioda) to earn the highest score.

name: Astonishing Baseball 20
summary: Build your dream lineup, manage a baseball team, sign contracts and live the exciting life of a baseball manager!

name: Assassin's Creed Mobile
summary: Assassin's Creed is a mobile game made by Gameloft, a sister company of Ubisoft, that was released in 2007, alongside the main game. The game featured Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad in the Third Crusade as he tried to redeem his honor.

name: Ashgard: Tone Break
summary: Play as the Norse goddess Idunn and explore a Midgard that has been entirely destroyed by the Ragnarök. Find and use your magical musical instrument "Himinnhorn" to reawaken the wondrous and magical melody trees that have been silenced and distorted by darkness.

name: A Silent Wood
summary: Text-adventure horror game for smartphones.

name: Asgard Run
summary: Game for android and ios.

name: Ashunnor's Game
summary: A short, fully hand-drawn visual novel about the magical fantasy kingdom of Thrungia.

name: AstroHawk
summary: Astrohawk is a SNES homebrew developed by Paul Lay from Playsoft, the game was originally developed in the 90's but it was until 2014 that was published in cartridge.

name: Askara
summary: Askara is a rogue-like turn-based tactics game, you choose how long each run takes, from a half an hour, to a few days if you want to! Multiple layers of mechanics mesh together to ensure that every run will be unique. It is easy to pick up, but will take years to master.

name: Asguaard
summary: Ready for a huge adventure? Welcome to the magical world of Asguaard, and delve into an RPG that can span over 100 hours! Dwarves in the cold region of Roya believe that only a human with a soul can overcome the dreaded Thanatos and its Pandora Box... are you this one?

name: Astrocat: Skylar's Memories
summary: Discover all the moments Skylar lived until she became an astrocat and broke through space in this beautiful relaxing puzzle.

name: Asunder II
summary: More than a decade in the making this groundbreaking humorous fantasy ARPG is actually fun to play. But be forewarned it's a difficult game.

name: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk
summary: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk is the sequel to A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude to the Stupid. Also developed by Talkhaus through the Super Mario Bros. X engine. Much like the first game, players can pick between 5 playable characters: Demo, Iris, Kood, Sheath and Raocow himself.

name: Astro-Not
summary: Join the community of Astro-Nots and explore the galaxy, compete for the fastest time or share your creations with other players. Take on the challenge and become the ultimate Astro-not!

name: Asteroides
summary: it's simple, fast, rocking, without pauses, without life, without time will you save the earth? Asteroides is a 70/80s shooter with realistic physics and a completely three-dimensional environment. Moving, destroying and surviving is complicated in an infinitely finite space.

name: Astro Fighters 2178
summary: Take to your ship to ensure the survival of humanity against an alien force determined to see you fail. Customize your ship with upgrades to raise your chance of success. Take a friend into battle to immediately become a stronger force and watch each others tail

name: Asuka 120% Final Burning Fest.
summary: Part of the Asuka 120% franchise of fighting games, "Final" adds minor changes to the original game, adding a "down" gauge and a new cast of voice actors.

name: Ascii Sector
summary:
Ascii Sector is a free space combat/exploration/trading game for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. You start with a simple spaceship and can then accept missions or trade goods to earn enough money to upgrade your ship or buy a new one.

You can engage in deadly fights both in space, on the ground and on board spaceships, and using the Ascii Sector scripting language, you can create your own quests for the game or have fun with other players' quests.

name: Ascendance Fighters
summary: Ascendance Fighters is a bloody indie platform fighter about a distant future in which the government has implanted cybernetic chips into a select few in the military, granting superhuman powers.

name: Astral Druids
summary: Be ready to protect the astral plane and survive the relentless monsters lust! Using the druids powers you'll be able to defeat every oponent, or make them kneel for you. Do you have what it takes to conquer them?

name: Asobu Tights
summary: The web animation "Miru Tights" by the popular illustrator "Yomu". The fresh and fetishistic tights anime is now available on Nintendo Switch as a puzzle game! You can meet Ren, Yua, Homi and Yuiko again at! ・It's a 3-match puzzle game with easy controls. ・There are 15 stage levels, and special effects for clearing all stages! ・You can use the points you accumulate to redeem your collection! ・All you can see is the animation and illustrations, including new illustrations by the original author! ・The game is available in English and Chinese (simplified and traditional) as well as Japanese!

name: A Shiba Story
summary: A Shiba Story is a game about everyday life with a Shiba Inu. Play as a rookie dogsitter who’s asked to care for Sunday, a Shiba Inu so proud he refuses to be pet. Can you win his friendship?

name: Aston Villa Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Asteroid Next
summary:
The classic "Asteroid" with updated graphics and gameplay.
- pixelated design
- shadows and dynamics lights
- power-ups !
- 3 controls modes
- world leaderboard
- more to come !

name: Ashes to Ashes
summary: Shoot your way to vengeance as the infamous undead gunslinger Quinn Del Ramo. In this weird wild west, experience a story-driven action-packed adventure with bullets, magic, and betrayal.

name: Ascent Free-Roaming VR Experience
summary: A premium highly-immersive VR experience developed for haptic feedback via motion floors, body suits and climate control. Go it alone or play with up to four friends in LAN co-op to destroy the infestation at the FuriCorp Research facility.

name: A Short Day
summary:
A Short Day is a timed 5-minute mini-adventure about managing your time and enjoying the smaller things in life.

This game placed 2nd in the Game Boy Showdown Jam on itch.io

name: Assemblio
summary: Assemblio is a factory automation game for the WASM-4 fantasy game console. It is written in Zig and obviously highly inspired by the great Factorio and shapez.io.

name: Astrolander
summary: Action-packed PS5 exclusive optional local co-op game featuring dramatic cinematics, intense action, and lush levels. Two players work together to control Haptic, an adventurous rocket powered robot, and a sidekick named Feedback, a curious robot on a roll that joins Haptic on a mission to save the MVP’s (Most Valuable Programs)!

name: Ashes Cricket 2009
summary:
Ashes Cricket 2009, is a cricket video game developed by Transmission Games and published by Codemasters in the UK and by Atari in Australia. It has been released for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows. A Wii version, developed by Gusto Games, has also been released. The Wii version was released simply as Cricket in Australia. A sequel, International Cricket 2010 was released on 18 June 2010.

The game is licensed by the ECB (England and Wales Cricket Board), Cricket Australia and the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC), owners of the Ashes Urn. It includes all the official players of the Australian cricket team and the England cricket team, however the other teams are not licensed.

name: Assassin's Creed: Liberation HD - Bonus Pack
summary:
Assassin’s Creed Liberation HD is the remastering of the stunning pre-American Revolution chapter of the Assassin’s Creed saga. Discover the Bonus pack, and employ brand new weapon improvements for Aveline to enhance her fighting skills.

This pack contains two new weapons: the Pirate Scimitar and the Voodoo Dagger; and two new weapon upgrades: the Gun Powder Pouch and Poison Dart Pouch upgrades.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Co-Op Map Pack
summary: Grab a friend (or two or three!) for some epic battles on 9 brand new maps designed specifically for cooperative play.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Forgotten Saga
summary: This free game mode is inspired by the rogue-lite genre and presents players with a new challenge as enemies are relentless and every choice counts.

name: Astérix & Obelix Take on Caesar
summary: Astérix & Obelix Take on Caesar is an action video game based on the film of the same name.

name: Aster
summary: Aster is a classic arcade style shooter, with fast action, aliens, (and sex). Earth is fighting a losing battle against aliens from another galaxy, and things are looking bleak. In a desperate gambit, Earth's military calls upon a hired gun to turn the tide.

name: Astra's Moon
summary: Astra's ship has crashed. Help her get back to the moon!

name: A Super Mario Adventure
summary: A Super Mario Adventure is a choconilla romhack: a romhack that takes the fundamentals of Super Mario World and expands its features. The difficulty level is comparable to the original game.

name: Ascent Quest
summary: Enter the world of Aelys in this incredible online RPG made for virtual reality ! Meet hundreds of players, form your party of adventurers (or go solo) and fulfill your destiny in this high-fantasy story-driven universe … or hang out laughing in the local tavern with your friends!

name: Assassin's Creed III: Washington Edition
summary: The Washington Edition comes with the Hidden Secrets, Battle Hardened and Tyranny of George Washington packs. Hidden Secrets has three extra missions, two costumes for solo play and two characters for multiplayer, while Battle Hardened has three new maps and three fresh multiplayer characters. The Tyranny of George Washington pack comes in three single-player instalments, and explores an alternate reality where Washington is a power-hungry dictator. The final part, The Redemption, can not be played until April 23rd 2013

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag - Skull Edition
summary:
This edition contains:

- Jumbo steel case
- Artbook
- Two lithographs
- Official soundtrack
- Single player missions: Hidden Mystery and Sacrificed Secrets
- In-game content: Captain Kenway's Legacy

name: AssaultCube
summary: AssaultCube is a FREE, multiplayer, first-person shooter game, based on the CUBE engine. Taking place in realistic environments, with fast, arcade gameplay, it's addictive and fun!

name: Asset Flip Simulator
summary: Asset Flip Simulator is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Bunch O D00dz and published by Arcane Raise, which was released in 2018.

name: Ascendance
summary:
Enter the enigmatic world of Ascendance and experience an enchanting and peaceful journey to the sky and beyond.

Ascendance is a calming, relaxing and minimalist first person 3D Platformer.
Shape your way with mysterious abilities and rise with the enchanted wind platforms beyond the skies within a world which evolves and transforms around you.

A journey which leads through different ages of our world awaits you.

name: A Simple Life
summary: Start living a more Simple Life in these rushed times! In this casual experience you can plant crops, harvest, and discover more garden varieties as the Seasons pass on. There are no time restrictions. See how much you can harvest in the years to come!

name: Assault Ops
summary: A military themed twin-stick shooter.

name: AstroShift
summary: AstroShift is a unique free-roam 2D space shooter, where your ship's destruction isn't game over - you get flung into space, and you have to find and board a new ship before your air runs out, and YOU explode - you know, because science...

name: Assassin's Creed: Codename Hexe
summary:
Official details are thin on Hexe, but it appears to have a horror slant, and Cote said it would provide “a different experience” in terms of game and game structure. It is heavily rumored to be set somewhere in the Holy Roman Empire during the infamous Witch Trials that were prominent in the 17th century. "Hexe" is German for "Witch" and in itself hints towards this setting.

Project Hexe is being led by Clint Hocking, who previously worked on Far Cry 2 and Watch Dogs: Legion. It will launch into the Assassin's Creed: Infinity Hub.

name: Asteroid Evader
summary: Evade asteroids and survive as long as possible

name: Ashes of Immortality II
summary: A whole new side to the Ashes of Immortality saga! Defeat your enemies and complete sidequests in this compelling 16-bit saga inspired by Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

name: Asonde Igo ga Tsuyoku naru!! Ginsei Igo DS
Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe
summary: This Xbox Live Arcade release combines both Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe into one release, and also offers an "evolved" mode with altered graphics and gameplay.

name: AstroBlast
summary: An adaptation of Astrosmash for the Atari 2600 platorm

name: AstroBrawl
summary: AstroBrawl is a fast-paced interplanetary shooter in which gravity is your best ally and your worst enemy. Be an alien warrior through couch/online deathmatch and survival modes.

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag - Jackdaw Edition
summary:
The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace. Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway. His fight for glory has earned him the respect of legends like Blackbeard, but also drawn him into the ancient war between Assassins and Templars, a war that may destroy everything the pirates have built.

Experience the lives of ruthless and merciless pirates in History’s Golden Age of Piracy! Impersonate great adventurers of the Caribbean and unleash lethal new skills and weapons. Explore mysterious islands and with the colors of your sails, strike fear into the hearts of any sailor daring to cross your path!

Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag - Jackdaw Edition includes:

Death Vessel Pack - Show your enemies that you are ready to bring death upon them with the Death Vessel sails, figurehead and wheel.

Kraken Ship Pack- This pack includes a sail, wheel, and figurehead inspired by the legendary sea monster known for swallowing ships, men and whales.

Crusader & Florentine Pack - With these new cosmetic sets, sail with Altaïr or Ezio’s colors with 4 customization items for your ship and 2 new weapons for Edward.

Illustrious Pirates Pack – This pack adds 3 new islands to explore with its hidden treasure chests, new outfits, weapons, ship items and more; ready to be discovered.

Multiplayer #1 – Blackbeard’s Wrath - Blackbeard’s Wrath Pack extends the multiplayer experience with three new fearsome playable characters including the Orchid, Blackbeard himself and the Jaguar!

Multiplayer #2 – Guild of Rogues - The Guild of Rogues Pack extends the multiplayer experience with three additional playable characters including the Powder Monkey, the Shaman and the Mermaid! This pack also comes with new customization options, and new moves!

Freedom Cry: Born a slave, Adewale found freedom as a pirate aboard the Jackdaw where he became Edward Kenway’s second-in-command. Now, 15 years later, Adewale has become a trained Assassin who finds himself shipwrecked in Saint-Domingue without weapons or crew. He starts to meet locals in an effort to assemble a crew and steal a ship. The more he helps, however, the more he is drawn into the Maroon slave community. Forced to face his past, Adewale sets out to free the slaves and bring death to their captors. Over 3 hours of new single-player gameplay!

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag - Buccaneer Edition
summary:
Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy. The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace. Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway. His fight for glory has earned him the respect of legends like Blackbeard, but also drawn him into the ancient war between Assassins and Templars, a war that may destroy everything the pirates have built.

A Brash Rebel Assassin: Become Edward Kenway, a charismatic yet brutal pirate captain, trained by Assassins. Edward can effortlessly switch between the Hidden Blade of the Assassin’s Order and all new weaponry including four flintlock pistols and dual cutlass swords.

The Assassin’s Creed IV Black Flag Buccaneer Edition includes:

A 45cm figurine of Captain Edward Kenway.

Collector’s box.

A high quality artbook including artworks that inspired the game.

The Official Game Soundtrack.

2 lithographs in a protective envelope.

Unlockable bonus content: 3 additional solo missions for an extra 45 minutes of gameplay:

Black Island: Captain Morgan’s favourite ship has sunken off the coast with a full load of legendary sailing equipment. Explore the Black Island and retrieve these items Pirates have desperately been looking for.

Hidden Mystery: Follow Stede Bonnet’s path and find the secrets of his adventures on the beautiful island of St Lucia.

Sacrificed Secrets: Recover Captain Drake’s lost treasures, including golden flintlocks and cutlass when exploring the exotic island of Sacrifices.

Additional Single & Multiplayer items: Captain Kenway’s Legacy.

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag - Gold Edition
summary:
The immersive world of Assassins Creed Black Flag drops you into the heart of an explosive reimagining of maritime history. Play as young privateer Edward Kenway, fighting side by side with the most notorious Caribbean pirates of the 18th century. As captain of the Jackdaw, Master Assassin and ruthless pirate, seek adventure on both sea and land in the biggest world that Assassins Creed has yet conceived. Through raging waters, lush jungles and sunbaked cities, seek and destroy scheming Templars and oppressive colonial powers, while enriching yourself and your outlaw compatriots with ships and gold.

Download Black Flag Gold Edition, and enrich the gameplay experience with exclusive island treasure hunts. Unlock multiplayer options, weapons, ships and valuable relics in these bonus packs, making yourself a richer, stronger and more formidable foe. Follow paths set by great pirates who came before, and discover the wealth they left behind. Captain Morgan's ship and silver pistols are yours for the taking in the Black Island pack, while the shallows of Sacrifice Island yield treasures left by Captain Drake in the Sacrificed Secrets Pack. Find the ship and other items left behind by Blackbeard's friend Stede Bonnet on St. Lucia in the Hidden Mystery Pack. Other exclusive packs include Captain Kenway's Legacy Pack, the Pirate's Bounty Pack and the Trove of Mystery Pack.

name: As the Light Goes Out
summary: As The Light Goes Out is a simulation game utilizing Emergency and Rescue services from across the globe as its background. Become the Emergency Services Commander and take charge of the Fire, Police, and Paramedic departments! Instruct your teams and ensure public safety！

name: Asterook
summary: You crash-landed on a giant asteroid, broke both your legs, but thankfully always have a trusty grappling hook, and a laser cannon with you. The asteroid you landed on, however, is not a safe place. Danger is just around the corner and the entire comet seems to be about to collapse.

name: Assembly Line 2
summary: In Assembly Line 2, you take charge of your factory, where strategic organization is key. Create intricate production lines, unlocking a plethora of blueprints to craft advanced resources. Fine-tune and upgrade machines for optimal efficiency and elevating your empire to new heights.

name: Astate: La Malédiction des Templiers
summary:
Astate is a French icon based point and click adventure game. 
You play as an archaeologist that has to to search the French countryside and its Templar ruins for all the pieces to a missing statue. Collecting a statue part will advance the game via cutscene.

name: A Sing-Along Surprise Party
summary: Shh-hh! It's Mother Goose's birthday and you're invited to help Saymour and his friends plan a surprise party! There'll be lots of music and entertainment to make the party especially fun! You actually get involved in the planning! And, you can learn party songs, too! Can you get the party ready without Mother Goose finding out what's going on? The personal phone calls from Saymour and his friends will help you figure out how!

name: A Social Platform
summary: Problems at home? Problems at school? No worries. Help out a highschool girl as she explores the wonders of social media for the first time, as well as the dangers.

name: Asterix & Friends
summary: Asterix & Friends is a free-to-play social game adventure based on the series of French comic books set in 50 B.C. about rebel warriors in Roman-occupied Gaul.

name: Ascendant's Roguelike
summary: A fantasy based roguelike. Ascend and slay endless hordes or monster while gaining the abilities of each creature you slay.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Guardian Pack
summary: The Guardian Pack is a downloadable content pack for Assassin's Creed Mirage. It contains a costume and a mount Skin.

name: Ashes: Afterglow
summary: Reprise your rule as a "scav" in this post-apocalyptic first-person shooter. A voice on the radio is calling for you. Find this mysterious "Athena" and you might finally get some answers. Be mindful of your choices along your journey or face unintended consequences.

name: Asia Empire 2027
summary: Lead your Asian empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Assault on Proxima
summary: Lock and load with Strike Force Delta in this action-packed sci-fi FPS! Play solo or team up to blast through hordes of Gacrux alien invaders, save humanity’s colonies, and dominate intense PvP showdowns. Gear up, soldier, and get ready to lead the Assault on Proxima!

name: Assassin's Creed: Bloodsail
summary:
Assassin's Creed: Bloodsail was a planned 3D action RPG for mobile platforms developed by Ubisoft China and VGame Studios, for the Chinese market. It was announced at the ChinaJoy 2016 expo, but with no further updates, the game entered vaporware status, having never been officially cancelled.

The protagonist would have been a pirate during the Golden Age of Piracy in the Caribbean, exploring its notable cities like Havana and Nassau while encountering side characters from Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. In addition to naval battles, the game would feature PvE and PvP modes. The protagonist would be the last surviving member of a Mayan family on a quest for revenge. Said protagonist would go on to find relatives in the Caribbean Sea and find out the truth behind their family's massacre.

An open beta was due to release exclusively in China in March 2017. During its time in development, a Western release of the game was being considered. In July of that year, it was revealed that the open beta was never released and instead was allegedly pushed to 2018. Since then, there have been no updates on the game's status.

name: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance
summary: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance is an online mobile game set in Italy's Renaissance, developed by Ubisoft's partner, Ourpalm, for the Chinese market. Announced at the ChinaJoy 2016 expo, the game is set to allow you to explore cities such as Florence and Rome as you work your way up and join the Assassins or Templars. The game is also set to include Player vs. Player (PvP) functionality, allowing players to assassinate other players.

name: Astro Invader
summary: Astro Invader is a fixed screen shoot 'em up. The player moves their laser base across the bottom of the screen and has to shoot down the aliens that appear above. What sets Astro Invader apart from other early shoot 'em ups is that the aliens, after being dropped from their mothership, position themselves in columns. Once a column is full the lowest alien drops down and suicide dives towards the player. As they hit the ground they explode and the player must make sure they are not within the blast radius. In addition to the standard aliens there are also UFOs that appear in the middle and to the sides of the screen. These must be shot down as they will kill the player when landing, no matter where the player is positioned. The game is over when all three lives are lost.

name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Last Maharaja
summary: The Last Maharaja is a single-player downloadable content addition for Assassin's Creed: Syndicate and was released on 1 March 2016. The content consists of ten missions in which Jacob and Evie Frye aid Duleep Singh, the youngest son of Ranjit Singh, in reclaiming his birthright as Maharaja.

name: Assimilate
summary: A roguelike where you take over the enemies' bodies and use their powers against them

name: Astro Traveler
summary: A retro style space sim where you mine, trade, bounty hunt, pillage, and explore. In this game you choose you own path as you navigate the galaxy while balancing faction alligence and legality of your actions.

name: ASMR Slicing: Nice Cuts DLC
summary: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny knifes to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: Ascent Spirit
summary: Equipped with two improvised ice axes in Ascent Spirit, your only chance of survival is to reach the top of this sacred mountain and get back to your hot air balloon before the winds free it.

name: Ascent of the Dragon
summary: In a world where dragons conquered the world and humanity's last hope is... Ah, who are we kidding. Are you pretending to work? Are you in need of an escape to continue the charade? Then this game is something you need! While your boss thinks you're busy clicking, your dragon does the flicking.

name: Asteroids Deluxe
summary: A port for Atari 7800 consoles.

name: Astalo
summary:
Ready, aim, slash! Astalo is a dungeon crawling action game designed for mobile.

+ One button hack and slash arcade game
+ Find secret treasures and collect powerups
+ Battle against evil monsters, skeletons, scary creatures and bosses
+ Travel thru multiple arenas
+ Unlock characters with different mechanics
+ Fight huge waves of enemies on the endless mode
+ Cool slow motion effects
+ Compete on leaderboards
+ Unlock achievements

name: Asteroids RX
summary: Two classic arcade games in one! Asteroids RX is a 'from scratch' fan conversion of two classic Atari games, Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe.

name: Astro Chase
summary: This Atari 5200 port of the game includes some graphical differences, and notably, makes the game easier.

name: Assassin War Sniper Shooting
summary: Embark on a realistic desert adventure with Assassin War Sniper Shooting, hunt your enemies with your sniper rifle, and achieve victory! Are you ready for an unforgettable FPS experience?

name: Astrozone
summary: Astrozone is a fast paced 2d platformer, shoot down ghosts, for infinite rounds, play up to 4 people together.

name: As You Wish
summary: A short Visual Novel made for O2A2Q with washitape! Time to ask a goddess for dating advice!!

name: Ascend Factory
summary: Welcome to Ascend Factory, a factory simulation game that challenges your ingenuity and resource management skills. Immerse yourself in a world of automation and strategic planning as you progress through levels of increasing complexity!

name: Asteroad
summary: It's the story of a girl in the world anyone can transform into a constellation. With meteor showere, the girl's favorite "star" has fallen apart. The girl collects pieces of star to return the star to the night sky.

name: Astro Bugz Revenge
summary:
Battle against bugz invasion in a sci-fi marble popper arcade.

Astro Bugz is an action-puzzle game with a retro vibe. Protect our solar system from astro-bugz and blast them by matching 3 or more bugz. Pick up valuable power-ups and activate them to annihilate the incoming invaders. Flip to the other side in Revenge mode and play the bugz. Test your skills against your friends by playing Co-Op or Versus mode. This action packed game mechanic will surely get you addicted.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations Mobile
summary: Assassin's Creed Revelations is a game for the mobile phone platform developed by Gameloft and released alongside of the main game in 2011. This mobile game features two protagonists, Ezio Auditore da Firenze during the Renaissance in Constantinople, and Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad during the Third Crusade in the Holy Land.

name: Ascribe
summary: Ascribe is a really fast-paced third person MOBA with a strong focus on the player's skill rather than his wallet. Combined with beautiful visuals brought by Unreal Engine 5 and it’s capabilities, Ascribe will deliver absorbing gameplay that we haven’t seen in years.

name: Ascend
summary: Get ready to play the insane Combat RPG game, Ascend! Created by Revamp Games, this is an immersive solo or local co-op game for up to four players! Fight off the Physco-Bots for as long as possible and battle epic bosses!

name: Ascendum
summary: Help 2 twin vessels on their journey through the afterlife! Overcome platforming and mind-bending puzzle challenges, and defeat scary enemies and bosses while controlling both characters at the same time or working together with another player in local Co-op.

name: Asonde Shogi ga Tsuyokunaru! Ginsei Shogi DX
Assassin's Creed I+II Welcome Pack
summary: When Altair and Ezio come together, they make you an irresistible deal. From Jerusalem to Renaissance Italy, the two assassins discover secrets hidden in the depths of history, and avenge the wrongs dealt to them. Although both games are now available as Best Priced Editions, this is a two games in one ultimate value pack.

name: Assassin's Creed II Mobile
summary: Assassin's Creed II is a game for the mobile platform developed by Gameloft and was released on October 20, 2009. It was released as mobile version of main game, which was also released in 2009.

name: Astraea
summary: Unleash bolts, set traps, and bash through relentless hordes of minions to protect a little girl from Hera’s wrath.

name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Collectors Edition
summary:
This Collector's Edition contains:

- A special Collector's box
- Assassin's Creed: Revelations (base game)
- An artbook
- The game's soundtrack
- Additional single-player mission: Vlad the Impaler's Prison, The Crusader and the Ottoman Jester multiplayer characters
- Altaïr's Robes in-game skin for Ezio
- A copy of the movie Assassin's Creed: Embers

name: Ash of Legends
summary: Story coming soon. You build towers, place traps, and use weapons, to defend objectives from hordes of the evil empire. Includes native Oculus and Steam VR support.

name: Astral Maze: Escape the Horror
summary: "Astral Maze: Escape the Horror" is a first-person horror game. Be attentive and careful, enemies may chase you. Look for the keys and find a way out of the maze.

name: AsiaKingdom
summary: AsiaKingdom is an exciting hidden object 3D puzzle game in an Asian setting. There are many objects on the location, there are numerous pavilions, fountains, bridges and other Asian decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Asura's Wrath Episode 15.5
summary: Defiance is the special lost 15.5th episode of Asura's Wrath from the DLC featuring unseen events after Episode 15: A New Cause.

name: Astral Tournament
summary: Astral Tournament is a turn-based strategy card game made in 2002. The game has been superseded by the heavily expanded but mechanically similar Spectromancer.

name: Asterball
summary: Enter the galactic gridiron field as a Sportsman to beat your opponents in the fast-paced sport of Asterball. Play in a PVP setting where two teams battle it out in the field to see who can win with the most touchdowns.

name: Assassin's Creed: Lost Legacy
summary: This cancelled project for the 3DS would have followed Ezio Auditore in his search for the lost castle at Masyaf, the ancient seat of the Assassins. Its story elements were allegedly largely adapted into AC: Revelations.

name: Ashen Empires
summary: Ashen Empires is a classic MMORPG set in the fantasy world of Dransik. Dransik has been besieged by the sinister forces of Talazar, preying on mortals. Play with your friends, battle your foes, complete quests, defeat powerful bosses, pursue tradeskills in a player-driven market. Play YOUR way!

name: As Dusk Falls: Special Edition
summary:
As Dusk Falls is an original interactive drama from INTERIOR/NIGHT that explores the entangled lives of two families across thirty years.
Special Edition includes: Game, Cinematic Poster, Collector's Box, Dante's Black Book, Postcards, Pins and Desert Dream Motel Replica Key.

name: Asphalt 7: Heat
summary:
The seventh series of Asphalt franchise.

Hit the speed of heat in the newest, fastest, most visually stunning edition of the famed Asphalt series. Drive 60 different cars from the world’s most prestigious manufacturers, like Ferrari, Lamborghini and Aston Martin, including the legendary DeLorean and gear up to race on 15 tracks set in real cities around the world, including brand new tracks in Hawaii, Paris, London, Miami and Rio.

name: Asteroids: Gunner
summary: A brand new Asteroids experience for the iPhone.

name: Astro Knight
summary: Astro Knight is a Single-player Synthwave Smash-inspired Space Adventure. Wield your sword through a stylized dream world as you battle swarms of monsters. But throughout your journey you'll have to deal with the loss of your favorite move each stage. Can you let go?

name: A Spider to A Fly
summary: 90's Horror inspired Point & Click — a Dark and Emotional journey of a man looking for his missing son while facing his hidden demons. Enjoy an Atmospheric & stylized world, haunting and memorable audio, and piece together a story that will stay with you long after it ends.

name: A Small Robot Story
summary:
A Small Robot Story is an adventure-platformer where you play as Rae, a small robot who activates and has no idea why. So you need to set out and find out what's up!

With a heavy emphasis on story, A Small Robot Story will take you through forests, factories, caves, laboratories, and more as you track down and find the source of your sudden activation.

name: Assault
summary: Assault is a top-down shooter from Namco, released in the arcades in 1988.

name: Assassination Station
summary: Assassination Station is a dastardly difficult stealth pixel shooter featuring procedurally generated levels, a sky-high skill ceiling, competitive scoring system, and frenetic, smoke-smooth gameplay.

name: A Series of Temporal Mishaps
summary: A Series of Temporal Mishaps is a platformer set in 4 distinct eras of earth's history. Travel through time, steal the secrets of the ages, and run, jump, and puzzle your way home. The only catch: you're not very good at time-traveling.

name: As Talk As Walk Wayfarer Team: One Percent Sleepy
summary: It's a boring hypnotic game in the Land of Music. All you have to do is count sheep, count sheep, count sheep,,, flock.

name: Asylum
summary: Asylum is a platform game for the Acorn Archimedes released in 1993.

name: Assassin's Creed Nexus VR
summary:
Play a pivotal role in history in this new story built only for VR. Thrust your blade in visceral combat as you climb and parkour anywhere throughout the open maps. Stealthily blend into a crowd, interact with civilians, and feel the rush of air assassinations.

Abstergo Industries has found a way to retrieve powerful lost artifacts that can be used to manipulate people's beliefs. To sabotage their plan, you’ll uncover all-new stories and accomplish new missions as legendary Assassins.

name: Asterix Brain Trainer
summary: A brain training game featuring characters from the Asterix comic book series for the Nintendo DS.

name: Ascending: Dojo
summary: In this VR-RPG you can bend the elements and use other mystical abilities to face every challenge.

name: Ashes of Sombtir
summary: Ashes of Sombtir, the rpg where you follow the rules.

name: Asonde Poker ga Tsuyoku Naru! Texas Hold 'Em
Astrality
summary: After a training simulation gone wrong, a bounty hunter embarks on a journey to find treasures and adventure.

name: Astero
summary: This game is about flying in space. You must destroy asteroids from the explosion of an object near the planet Jupiter. You will also encounter other extraterrestrial objects and even UFOs.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Join or Die Edition
summary:
The Join or Die Edition contains:

- Assassin's Creed III (base game)
- A special Collector's Box
- Connor's medallion
- George Washington's notebook
- Additional single-player mission: Ghost of War
- An additional multiplayer character: Sharpshooter

name: Assault Plus
summary: This game is an upgrade of "Assault". Your mission is to reclaim your homeland by destroying the enemy forces that have taken over. You have an Assault tank, the supreme mobile weapon. Your tank has artillery guns and grenades, can perform Rapid Rolls to dodge enemy shots, and uses Power Wheelies to launch grenades.

name: A Shopping Trip to Eklan Tor
summary: Explore a tiny monster town in VR and search for hidden objects.

name: AS+CEND
summary: AS+CEND is a space shooter where you pilot powerful ships in ferocious clashes against other players. Combat with AS+CEND ships is a deliberate battle of deadly intent that can quickly become a frantic fight for you life, or resolve into a satisfying kill when all goes according to plan.

name: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Gold Steelbook Edition
summary:
Assassin's Creed: Odyssey - Gold Edition includes:
Early Access.
Season Pass.

name: Assassin's Creed: Multiplayer Rearmed
summary: Assassin's Creed multiplayer top down perspective game for iOS devices.

name: Astro Ninja Man
summary: An exhilarating shooting game with easy controls. This is a game where you destroy enemies with a bang and enjoy cool music with a blast.

name: Ascension X
summary: Our Holy Emperor needs our aid to help rescue the innocent civilians on Earth from the evil Corporations that took over the World. The Templars will help achieve peace on an Apocalyptic Earth, help the development of Mars civilization and explore new planets in the Universe!

name: Astonishing Baseball 22
summary: Astonishing Baseball (or AB for friends) is not your usual baseball simulation game. It's not only about tables full of players and stats. It's about people! Well okay, you heard that line from your Economics 101 class already. But I promise, this game will be way more interesting! It's like a narrative roguelike sports game, Seriously!

name: Aspar GP Master
summary: Grand Prix Masters was a one-make motor racing series featuring retired Formula One drivers. The inaugural (and sole 2005) event, at the Kyalami Grand Prix Circuit in South Africa, took place on 11–13 November, but the series folded after a 2 race season in 2006.

name: Ash and Tor: Yuma's Quest
summary: Explore the dungeons and try to find and save the Queen Yuma... but wait: it's almost an impossible dungeon. And why? Because it's easy to say: you must move two knights at once!!! Are you ready to find and save tons of girls without dying?

name: Astérix
summary: Astérix was developed by Bit Managers and Infogrames for a number of different consoles. It was based after the comic book series Asterix, which maintained a high level of popularity in Europe, but never took off in North America. For this reason, the game was only released in PAL format, and was never released in North America.

name: Ashes of Immortality
summary:
Vampires vs Werewolves vs Hunters... Guess which group you're playing with?
Find out in this exciting 16-bit style RPG full of twists and colorful characters!

name: Ascendants Rising
summary: Ascendants Rising is a co-op Action RPG that lets you create your own unique playstyle and team to explore an ever-changing Multiverse teeming with deadly enemies, formidable Boss fights, and amazing loot.

name: Asteroids Space Shooter
summary: Asteroids is a retro inspired space survival adventure

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Mastery Challenge
summary: Mastery Challenge is a free update that adds replayable trials designed to assess player proficiency in melee, ranged, and stealth objectives. As players complete these challenges, they can unlock a variety of unique rewards, including weapons, tattoos, and decorations.

name: Asuka 120% Burning Fest.
summary: Fighting game series produced by Fill-in-Cafe. Eleven versions were released for various platforms between 1994 and 2002.

name: A Sloth For Both Seasons
summary: A Sloth for Both Seasons is a free 2D click-and-point adventure game. It has no inventory. The game can be controlled via mouse. It was a candidate for the March 2016 MAGS competition. The player is a female sloth in the Amazon rain forest during the dry seasons. It is mating season and the first task is to get the male sloth to mate with you. This humorous game features a day-and-night cycle and a voice-over from the developer.

name: Aske
summary: A first person shooter that sets you far away, near death.

name: Astro Planes
summary: Astro Planes is a sci- fi fantasy space shooter. Laser blast your way through space and use powerful missiles to neutralize the enemy with explosive chaos and use your dashing ability to evade enemy fire.

name: AstroViking
summary: AstroViking is a wave-based survival shoot em' up! Play as a superpowered female viking fending off endless hordes of aliens! Combine 60+ upgrades to construct your own ultimate warrior!

name: Asteroids
summary: A version of asteroids released for Atari 7800, plays similarly to the original arcade with vastly improved graphics to where the ship and the asteroids themselves are more defined in the color and asthetics they're presented in.

name: Asteroids: Far Away From Home
summary: The game is about surviving in space and trying to get to home planet all while destroying asteroids and other threats. You gain upgrade points, power ups, arcade points while playing and ship boosts when you reach home planets. You can upgrade your ship from the main menu.

name: AstroPuffs
summary: Crash landed on an alien planet with your crew, build an awesome base and advance it through Exploration, Science, Crafting and Salvaging. Face Rival Factions, Deadly Bosses, Alien Wildlife and other Planetside Mysteries in this Valheim inspired Colony Sim.

name: Astro & Luna vs. The Entire Solar System
summary: After being kicked out of his own solar system, Astro teams up with Luna and together they take revenge on the elitist planets that betrayed him. Use Luna to fight back in this gravity-based SHMUP and show those planets what it means to be “too small”!

name: Asphalt 4: Elite Racing
summary: It's a new iPod game, developed by Gameloft and published by Apple Inc.

name: Asphalt: Overdrive
summary: The first Asphalt's spinoff game of the series.

name: Ashita no Joe Touch: Typing Namida Hashi
summary: A typing training game based on the Ashita no Joe anime.

name: Astro Rush
summary:
Race through space and dodge the obstacles at breakneck speed.
Take control of two meteorites in this fast-paced high score game while you rush through a trippy galaxy. Rotate the meteorites through the obstacles. If you fail once, you will have one meteorite left and switch from rotating to dodging controls. You can play in normal mode or in three different wireframe modes.

name: Astral Fable
summary: Astral Fable, a 3D cute anime MMORPG that is themed around a self-created story of the war between the Heaven and Devildom. In the game,players can defeat monsters and unlock spectacular skills throughout the journey. The best part, you'll never be alone here! There will be pets fighting alongside you together with the support of your couple. You could also join a guild to save this world with your comrades! This is gonna be the one you don’t wanna miss!

name: Asdivine Hearts I & II
summary: Experience epic RPG adventures at once! This bundle includes Asdivine Hearts and Asdivine Hearts II.

name: AshGuine: Densetsu no Seisenshi
summary: The evil Banutracus had destroyed the great civilization of the planet Nepenthus and brought it down to a primitive state. War broke out between the planet's humble Eletrian people and Banutracus's barbarous Cooligan invaders. After a long struggle, the Eletrians got united under the powerful leadership of one they called the father and managed to obtain a momentary peace. Howerver, when Banutracus returned to his planet he killed the father and re-established his hold. One Cooligan Gea saw the evil nature of Banutracus and escaped with the father's only daughter Neshah to one of the great ruined Eletrian cities. There, they had a son. When the boy grew to be a strong young man, one of the Cooligan soldiers discovered their hideout and killed his escaped parents. From that day, the boy swore vengeance on Banutracus and to eventually restore peace to the planet.”

name: Asuka 120% Special Burning Fest.
summary: Special Burning Fest. marks the first time the Asuka 120% series appeared on the PlayStation.

name: AstralAir no Shiroki Towa: White Eternity
Asura's Wrath: Lost Episode 1
summary: One of the world's greatest warriors appears before Asura... His name is Ryu. He challenges Asura to a duel and they exchange punches in an intense battle. Ryu is then suddenly consumed by the Satsui no Hado...

name: AstroMania
summary:
Become the greatest alien-destroying robot the world has seen...

After Earth is overrun and invaded by an alien race, there’s only one robot who can fight back. Armed to the wires with an upgradable arsenal of guns and weapons, your job is to take back planet Earth, one bullet at a time.

name: A Super Mario Thing
summary: A Super Mario World collaboration hack with 94 exits, made by the Talkhaus community in the style of the VIP and Wall Mix series.

name: Astro Command
summary: Ninth game released for the Epoch Cassette Vision. A space game inspired by Scramble.

name: Asteroids Bangers
summary: Asteroid Bangers is a nostalgic game, that attempts to replicate the feeling of flying through space and destroying alien evil spaceships.

name: Astral Pursuit
summary: Tear through hordes of otherworldly creatures and defeat their ruler before the universe ends. Travel between planets, gather powerful relics, and shape the galaxy to your whim in this objective-based action rogue-lite.

name: Assault Fire
summary: Assault Fire is a free-to-play, first-person shooter MMO that features a combination of traditional MMOFPS games with a few sci-fi elements. Set in a futuristic war-torn world, players will assume the role of an elite soldier of the GSDU (Global Security Defense Unit). The game offers an exciting gaming experience with its solid character customization, lobby-based format, and loadout. It also has diversified game modes and maps, and the futuristic integration from cyborg to mech.

name: Assetto Corsa Mobile
summary: Assetto Corsa Mobile is the perfect match for all motor-racing fans, offering a challenging experience for sports car enthusiasts. Featuring 59 officially licensed sports cars – including, among others, iconic models from Abarth, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Maserati, Porsche and Toyota – Assetto Corsa Mobile brings you on track, offering multiple game modes, from the regular Free Practice to Classic Race and Time Attack, to new game mode exclusives, such as Overtake and Speed Camera modes. Pick your preferred driving option (tilt steering, touch-steering or via an external controller) and master real tracks such as Brands Hatch, Laguna Seca or Imola, from a selection of 9 meticulously recreated official circuits, and share your best results on the public leaderboards. Be ready for the most exciting driving simulation on mobile!

name: Astro Bouncer
summary: A simple sci-Fi arcade game about the adventures of an astronaut in space. Jump and collect stars, and try not to get caught in the tentacles of an ancient monster.

name: Asphalt Online
summary: An Asphalt game that released for legacy mobile devices.

name: Asterism Online
summary: Asterism Online is a Science Fiction Fantasy online multiplayer RPG set in the Groombridge 34 star system that uses a skill based advancement system with no player levels.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Those Who Are Treasured
summary: This is part 1 of the Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories that had Kassandra travel to the island of Korfu to explore the aftermath of obtaining the immortality-granting Staff of Hermes Trismegistus

name: Astro Boy: The Video Game
summary:
Astro Boy centers around a boy-robot named Astro that tries to bridge the relationship between humans and robots. This game is based on the computer-animated superhero film named "Astro Boy".
This Nintendo DS version offers a different artstyle and more classic 2D platforming experience compared to the PSP, PS2 and Wii versions that utilize more 3D-looking graphics while keeping the platforming to a more 2,5D experience

name: Ashen: Definitive Edition
summary:
Set in a sprawling open world, Ashen is a tight, 3rd person, skill-based action RPG about guiding your wanderer through a newly lit world. Fight alongside others, forge friendships and defeat the creatures of shadow determined to cast the world back into darkness.

Explore mysterious dungeons, fight epic bosses and explore diverse regions filled with gorgeous vistas and mythical creatures. Meet characters along the way who will join you on your journey and turn your home into a lively town. In this new era of light, you must protect the Ashen and destroy the hungering shadows once and for all.

Definitive Edition includes both the base game and its DLC, Nightstorm Isle.

name: A Single Fallen Feather
summary:
"The Shadow Over the Sky, Cielvide, had been utterly defeated. But the shadows have started to grow ever deeper of late..."

A Single Fallen Feather is a turn-based RPG where the player creates a party of four out of 12 selectable classes.

name: A Show of Kindness
summary: A Show of Kindness is a three-act VR experience through which the user navigates an unfolding story frozen in time, crafted with meticulous detail by concept artist Peter Chan using a custom build of Tilt Brush.

name: Assault of the Robots
summary: Assault of the Robots is an action game where you will fight across different countries like Germany and Great Britain with different robots.

name: Assassin's Creed: Syndicate - Rooks Edition
summary:
