London, 1868. The Industrial Revolution unleashes an incredible age of invention, transforming the lives of millions with technologies once thought impossible. Opportunities created during this period have people rushing to London to engage in this new world, a world no longer controlled by kings, emperors, politicians, or religion, but by a new common denominator: money.

Not everyone is able to enjoy the benefits of this boom, however. Despite fueling the engine of the British Empire, workers’ lives are little more than legalized slavery while the top few percent profit from their labor. Living poor and dying young, the lower class unite in protest as a new kind of family, gangs, who turn to a life in the underworld in their struggle to survive. A struggle, until watchful Assassins come to their side and re-ignite an age-old conflict involving London’s leaders that will echo throughout modern history, from the underground up.

Introducing Jacob Frye, who with the help of his twin sister Evie, will change the fate of millions in Assassin’s Creed Syndicate. Rise to rally and lead the underworld to break the corrupt stranglehold on London in a visceral adventure filled with action, intrigue, and brutal combat.

name: Astro Sailor
summary: Astro Sailor is a hand-drawn action-adventure game with rogue-like elements and a unique gravity-based movement system. On your journey to explore the galaxy, you’ll meet new friends and foes, discover hidden treasures and face dangerous obstacles.

name: Astera
summary: Step into Astera, a steampunk-infused fantasy world. Play your way in this fast-paced Action RPG featuring dual class specialization, rogue-like dungeons, a vast open world to explore and co-operative multiplayer. Crafted with passion by a dedicated team of action RPG enthusiasts.

name: Astronomical Club for Queers
summary:
You are a transgender civet named Louie. After the flood, at your friend's family home, you stayed at the family home of your friend, a gay fox named Oliver.

Listen carefully to the podcast with your buddies - pansexual alligator Miles and lesbian dog Kylie and learn more about the approaching Halley's comet. Admire the night sky with the help of a telescope together with asexual cat Darwin.

name: ASRECorp
summary: Your company has discovered a machine that can transport people to different worlds and nightmares, as the newly appointed scientist you must discover the reason a machine that can take you to such places even exists.

name: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington
summary: Tyranny of King Washington - a 3-part DLC series exploring an alternate reality in which George Washington goes mad with unlimited power, foregoing Presidency to rule as tyrannical King. In this alternate world, Connor is and remains Ratonhnhaké:ton. Having never become an Assassin, he must endure new trials, acquiring the skills he'll need to take down a possessed Washington and win freedom for his land once and for all.

name: Asgard's Wrath
summary: Unleash the wrath of the Gods in a mythical Norse adventure that can only unfold in VR. Forge your destiny as both a mortal hero and living god in an action role playing game of unworldly depth.

name: Ascend
summary: Ascend is a first-person VR Arena Shooter where you rise to greatness in a crucible of visceral and kinetic combat. Rise above your enemies by engaging in intense aerial warfare and leverage the power of VR with our unique lean motion flight system.

name: Asylum 626
summary:
A horror adventure game that can only be played at night and is the sequel to Hotel 626.

You adventure through a dark and terrifying asylum to figure out what happened and how you got there. Solve puzzles and try to escape your situation unharmed while eating Doritos.

name: Assault Heroes 2
summary: Assault Heroes 2 is the sequel to Assault Heroes, an arcade-style, top-down shooter video game developed by Chilean Wanako Studios. The game was released on May 14, 2008.[1]

name: A-Sock-Ellipse Now!
summary:
The third compilation/main disc in the Pac-Guy series, a follow up to ''Vengeance or Bust'', featuring three this time 3-D games made by other developers, 2 of which are in another genre. It includes:

-The Magic Land (A turn /Tile based Stragety RPG)
-The Secret of Coolness (A traditional pea-guy style game in 3D)
-Defeating Dr. Robotica (A first person shooter)

It also has a video/movie called ''The Search for Kodoe'', and some other extras.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: The Last Chapter
summary:
The Last Chapter is a free update for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla and is the final part of Eivor Varinsdottir's story.

While it was originally planned to release with Update 1.6.2 on 6 December 2022, an unforeseen scheduling error made it release a week early on 29 November instead.

name: Astral Vangard
summary: Pilot your Vangard and battling against various enemies and bosses. Astral Vangard is a casual game with rogue-like elements in a futuristic world filled with Mecha. You can choose their own Vangard with different start weapon and characteristics, improving their abilities as they advance.

name: Asphalt 3D
summary: Asphalt 3D brings all the excitement and speed of the Asphalt franchise to stereoscopic 3D, featuring more than 40 licensed vehicles, 17 exotic track locations and complete StreetPass functionality.

name: Asurya's Embers
summary: Asurya's Embers is a 1st-person, single-player, bow-and-arrow shooter set in an ancient Himalayan village plagued by an environmental disaster. Find safety in the shadows from the blazing heat waves as Dawa, a bow-wielding hero who protects her village from the vengeful sun god, Asurya.

name: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Limited Edition
summary:
Join Asterix & Obelix in a brand-new original story in… Hibernia! Explore this crazy action-adventure in a local coop mode up to 4 players!

Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia - Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram From Hibernia
- Two sticker sheets
- 3 lithographs

name: Ashland
summary: The Ashland as an asymmetric confrontational game（1v4）.In the game, one player plays the role of the powerful tomb keeper, driving out the adventurers played by four other players. They will fight in different tombs until the ruins collapse.

name: Astro Tripper
summary: Astro Tripper is a furious shoot-em-up experience inspired by the painful, knuckle busting video games of years gone by. An evolution of PomPom's 2001 award winning game, Space Tripper. Travel the surface of large horizontally-scrolling platforms, and pit your highly maneuverable craft against hoards of enemies eager to blow you to bits, eat you or worse.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Desecrator Pack
summary: The Desecrator class, The Eldrian and Defiled species~

name: Asmik-kun World 2
summary:
Asmik-kun World 2 (アスミッくん ワールド 2 Asumikkun Wārudo 2) is a Game Boy video game by Asmik, copyrighted in 1991.Unlike its predecessor, Boomer's Adventure in ASMIK World (Teke! Teke! Asmik-kun World), this game was never released outside Japan. Like its predecessor, the game is an excellent example of the trap-em-up genre, which also includes games like Heiankyo Alien and Space Panic.

In the game, Asmik-kun has to build a "road" from the entrance to the exit in each level. An enemy has come to kidnap the children on a certain world and the "roads" are intended for the children to be rescued and escorted safely back home.

name: ASCII Pacman
summary: ASCII Pacman is a homebrew Pac-Man game for the DS that is fully displayed in ASCII.

name: Astroneer: Suit Bundle
summary: In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set!

name: Astroneer: Essential Bundle
summary: Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters!

name: Assortment
summary: A role-playing game from yake-ishi ni mizukake-ron.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Cleric Pack
summary: The cleri clcass, The Angel species, and the Soul species.

name: Ashes of Arcanum: Aves Pack
summary: The Aves pack. which features all of the birds, and flying creatures of Elusia.

name: Ashley: The One-Spell Mage
summary: Union of skill with quick thinking. Group monsters, dodge their attacks, collect items, stun them, weaken them and finish them all off at once in this game that mixes action and strategy!

name: Asteroids: Multiplayer
summary: A modern version of the classic arcade game

name: A Sky Full of Stars
summary: The starry sky spreads far and wide overhead... This story full of love, comedy, and excitement follows our protagonist and his stargazing friends as they grow together. "A Sky Full of Stars" is a coming-of-age astronomy tale by the same team who brought you "If My Heart Had Wings".

name: Ashley Clark: The Secrets of the Ancient Temple
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: Ashita Deatta Shoujo
summary:
MOONSTONE's debut work follows Aisa Ryu who wakes up to find himself looking up at the sky in the rural village of Takachiho. He soon realizes he has no memory of his past. Confused, he is taken in by his cousin, Kittaka Sanae, and moves into the Tachibana family home, where he meets the four sisters. However, an incident in a neighboring town leads Aoi and the sisters into a series of ongoing murders in this suspense visual novel.

Viewing all endings unlocks short stories for each heroine.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 24H Nürburgring Pack
summary: The most anticipated moment for Assetto Corsa Competizione has finally come. Nürburgring 24 hours is in. The huge circuit including a combination of Nürburgring GP and Nordschleife has finally come, together with the worldwide known 24H format. Dive into the world's most beautiful rollercoaster.

name: Asylum
summary:
You have woken up in a room like a cell. In the room is a bed with a box on it. Inside the box is a credit card. Looking around the room you see the door open, knowing this is an asylum you plan to escape. Your task is to escape from the Asylum using the objects you find to solve the problems. Along the way though you will encounter the other inmates. 
 
The game is a graphical text adventure. The screen is split into two halves. The top half shows what you can see in front of you, in the bottom is the text describing your surroundings: here you can type commands. Using the arrow keys you move yourself about a 3D maze. You can draw a map. since it is easy to get lost.

name: A Story of the Usurpers
summary: Because of an accident, the war once again descended on this land where peace has been welcomed for less than 10 years. Rebels swarming up, weak religious orders, hostile neighbors in the north. Where will the fate of the country go?

name: Asteroids 44
summary: Remake of one of the oldest arcade classics. Challenge yourself and advance through the levels filled with asteroids, power-ups and virtual bitcoins, that you can spend in the shop to get ready for what's coming. Get your friends and share the adventure together in co-op mode!

name: Astro Boy
summary: An action sandbox game by Sonic Team with emphasis on aerial combat and vertical movement. Do not confuse with the 2009 sidescrolling game based on the movie.

name: Ashes Cricket 2013
summary:
The game was universally panned by critics, cricket fans and the media, and there were several videos on YouTube featuring these bugs.

Four days later after its release, it was removed from sale. It was finally announced on 28 November that all production of the game had been cancelled, along with plans to release console versions of the game, and that all people who purchased the game would receive a full refund.

The publisher 505 Games apologized to the game's users and turned its attention to "protecting the Ashes name and that of the ECB and Cricket Australia"

It quite widely featured as one of the worst games of 2013

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Crusader & Florentine Pack
summary: Sail with Altaïr and Ezio’s colors with 4 customisation items for your ship and 2 new weapons for Edward: Ezio’s Iconic Figurehead, Ezio’s Unique Sails, Ezio’s Swords, Altaïr’s Iconic Figurehead, Altaïr’s Unique Sails, Altaïr’s Sword.

name: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag: Illustrious Pirates Pack
summary: Explore new locations and discover the secrets of the Black island, Mystery Island and Sacrifice Island to find hidden treasure chest to get access to new outfits and weapons for Edward, and figureheads and sails for you ship, the Jackdaw. Stand out in multiplayer with new and exclusive costume sets, pictures, titles, relics and emblems!

name: A Short Odyssey
summary: An RPG where you, a shipwrecked sailor, explore a strange island, battle monsters and the undead, find weapons and equipment and take down an evil sorcerer

name: Astraia Land
summary: Astraia is an innovative game that combines equipment building, dungeon challenge, platform jumping and LAN team up online. The game requires a certain amount of maneuverability, players need to sprint, jump, and avoid enemy skills and barrage.

name: Assasin Top Down
summary: Assassin Top Down is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled assassin on a mission to eliminate guards without being detected.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Inception
summary: Choose your side in the first split-faction scenario for Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation. Includes a new story driven scenario and four additional maps.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Secrets of the Revolution
summary: The Revolution is not over, the people of Paris still need your help.

name: Asteroids Neon
summary: Asteroids Neon is more than a mere remake—it's a vibrant reimagining of a beloved classic, designed to evoke the neon-soaked dreams of the '80s with a modern twist. Are you ready to embrace the neon nightmares and conquer the celestial chaos? Bedlam awaits, the galaxy will never be the same.

name: Ashbakaha
summary: Combine thinking, structure and search for words.

name: A Surgery Beyond The Heart
summary: This is a pix word puzzle adventure game based on RPGMaker.With serval different choice,you will get total different endings. You need to play the Germany returned genius doctor Shen Yi to find the dark side of the hospital.

name: Ashes: Dead Man Walking
summary:
Ashes: DMW is an expansion campaign for Vostyoks Ashes 2063.

You reprise your role as the Scav, hunting the wasteland for those who tried to kill you.

name: Astral Rot
summary: Astral Rot is a fixed camera, survival horror sci-fi game by the co-creators of Tormented Souls. You play as Adler, a space mining engineer, that will have to face impossible choices in order to save his brother and anyone in the asteroid that hasn't been infected by the Stardust Disease.

name: Assembly Line 2: Mobile Version
summary: Build and optimize your assembly line to make the most money possible!

name: Asteroid King
summary: Fast pace shooter that mainly focuses on Fun Factor, game mechanics and AWESOME FACTOR! The game is a blast from the past with updated features. If you are looking for a game with great mechanics and cool factor, you have found it!

name: Assault on Tei Tenga
summary: Assault on Tei Tenga, also known as Tei Tenga, is a hub-based mapset for ZDoom created by Sam Ketner. It is widely considered as the first WAD to use the ZDoom hub system inherited from Hexen, combined with ACS-scripted cutscenes, which was not a simple proof of concept. Due to this, it is listed as one of the Top 100 WADs of All Time by Doomworld. Released on May 21, 1999, it originally received mixed responses, with some community members complaining that extensive scripting interfered with Doom's gameplay. Nevertheless, Tei Tenga has been described as "the wad that got ZDoom on its feet".

name: Ashita, Hajimete Kanojo to
summary: With your unique girlfriend, exciting first date ADV.

name: AstroMart Adventures
summary: Build a convenience store on an abandoned asteroid. Catch critters and other goods to sell or make them into a slushy.

name: Assetto Corsa: Porsche Pack II
summary: Porsche Pack Volume II is following the first DLC in being dedicated to the Porsche brand, introducing a different selection of models in a total of nine configurations. The pack devotes attention to some of the most iconic racing cars ever created by Porsche, including the 2015 Le Mans-winning 919 Hybrid, the iconic 911 GT1, and the legendary 962c, featured in both Long Tail and Short Tail configurations, coupled with some of the most recent models of the Porsche 2016 line-up, with the aim to offer a perfect mix between road cars, hypercars, as well as modern and historic GT and racing models.

name: Asterix: The Official Mobile Game of the Movie
summary: Join your favourite Gaulish duo Asterix and Obelix as they compete in Greece to win the hand of Princess Irina for Lovestorix. Play through their exploits in Adventure mode on the streets of Athens. Qualify for the final via exciting events such as menhir, disk, 1500m and long jump, before the thrilling chariot race to determine the winner of the events and Irina's heart. Experience the universe of the film on mobile with Asterix: The Official Mobile Game of the Movie!

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations: The Ancestors Character Pack
summary: The Ancestors Character Pack features four new multiplayer characters, including: the swashbuckling Privateer, the devious siren Corsair, the battle-tested Brigand, and the bloodthirsty Gladiator. Each character is unique, with personalized taunts, weapons, and stylized assassination techniques.

name: Asterlode
summary: Mine, build, trade and explore your way through the Solar System! Tunnel into the depths of asteroids and moons. Go on missions, fight, collect rare ships and weapons or uncover the mysteries of space. The choice is yours in this 2D sci-fi adventure!

name: Asteroids X
summary: More addictive version of 《Asteroids》

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Omega Edition
summary:
Write your own epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in Assassin's Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny and define your own path in a world on the brink of tearing itself apart. Influence how history unfolds as you experience a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.

The edition was exclusively available at Gamestop and contains full game + digital bonus + artbook + map

name: Asterix: The Mansions of the Gods
summary: By Toutatis! Play Asterix The Mansions of the Gods! Play as Asterix, Obelix and Dogmatix in their quest to save the forest. Prepare the magic potion so you can give the crazy Romans lots of smacks! Walk through the village, hunt wild boar, make the bard stop singing and prepare the final victory banquet!

name: Astro Invader
summary: The player controls a small spaceship is at the bottom of the screen. Like most Space Invaders-type games of the period, the ship can move left and right (but not up or down), and can fire one bullet at a time. The ship may not fire again until its previous shot has detonated.

name: Astro Aegis
summary: An asteroids-like game where the player traverses space around a planet. The game features a rock-paper-scissors set of weapons and targets, where the player must rotate between the appropriate weapon for the asteroids they're trying to clear.

name: Astral Throne
summary: Uncover the mystery of a Kingdom beset by a Falling Star's curse in this retro-inspired Roguelike SRPG. Build your party, recruit new allies, and synergize your team's skills for decisive victory.

name: Astroblitz
summary: In this space combat game, pilot a lone spaceship on a mission to eliminate various hostile enemies including flying saucers, seekers, satellite dishes, and spinners. Utilize the top-screen radar to track enemy movements and strategically position yourself for optimal firing range. Advance through increasingly challenging waves by destroying a set number of foes. Navigate carefully to avoid collisions with enemies and shrapnel, as these will cost you precious lives. The battle continues until you clear all waves or exhaust your lives, ending your interstellar defense mission. This game offers a blend of strategic positioning, quick reflexes, and spatial awareness for an engaging space shooter experience.

name: ASCII and the Argonauts
summary: In this wonderfully laconic spoof of the Scott Adams style of adventures, you play as Jason of the Argo, tasked by King Pelias to bring the Golden Fleece to him or die.

name: Ashes to Ashes
summary: Ashes to Ashes is a 2D bullet heaven game set in a dark post-apocalyptic fantasy world. You play as an emissary of an ancient AI tree that sends you out onto the banished land in hopes of fighting off the evil, returning the world to its peaceful state.

name: Asterix
summary: Asterix for the Atari 2600 was the first video game that starred the popular French cartoon character.

name: A Slightly Different Backrooms
summary: A slightly different Backrooms is a Coop or Singleplayer Horror Puzzle Game. Encounter different Monsters and Levels than in the other Backrooms, but brace yourself for the same bone-chilling atmosphere like the typical ones.

name: Ashfall
summary: Ashfall is a post-apocalyptic shooter MMORPG developed by Legendary Star Studio. In the future, AI rises up and launches a nuclear war against humanity. After that, nothing other than ruins are left in the world. You must leave the Vault to find the Core of Creation - the key to saving the world.

name: Assault Rigs
summary:
Do you have what it takes to be the next World Net Champion?

Grab the controls of the Zam Cam Assault Rig and enter the cyber combat zone of the future! Conquer arena after arena filled with skyways, trenches, pushblocks and a whole host of enemies waiting to blow you to smithereens.

To the victor goes the glory in this futuristic super-sport where there is no second place!

name: Astérix and the Secret Mission
summary: Getafix the Druid is out of magic potion! If Caesar finds out, it's invasion for sure. Asterix and Obelix set out to find the necessary herbs. A mission through all sorts of Roman-infested terrain - seas and rivers, forests and deserts, temples and ruins.

name: A Shadow Over Freddy's
summary:
A Shadow Over Freddy's is a short point & click exploration horror game created to showcase unique free-roam gameplay while keeping the spirit of Five Nights at Freddy's intact.

Playing as an individual trapped inside an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, you must traverse the location while avoiding the creeping darkness that infests every corner of the building. Complete different objectives each night, uncover your lost memories and find a way out of the accursed restaurant.

Relive the horror of the first FNaF game, as you explore every nook and cranny of the dilapidated remains of the original location, but with a new twist on the formula that will scare even the veterans of the series.

With no doors, no cameras, or time on your side, will you survive one last time against the shadows of your past?

name: Asura's Wrath: Part IV Nirvana
summary:
It was not the end. The cries that echo across the planet have yet to cease. But why? Why does the world still suffer?

Asura and Yasha take on the one who has been manipulating even the demigods themselves in "Part IV: Nirvana," the epic four episode conclusion to Asura's Wrath!

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Season Pass
summary: Get access to epic content, explore new lands, and discover new gear with the Assassin's Creed Valhalla Season Pass.

name: A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude To The Stupid!
summary: A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude to the Stupid was the first major game developed by the Talkhaus through the Super Mario Bros. X engine, and is the second game in the A Super Mario Thing series. It follows Demo and Iris collecting leeks through "The Castle of No Significance". In addition to Demo and Iris, three other characters are playable; Kood (from Drama Mistery), Raocow, and Sheath (from ATXS).

name: A Second Before the War
summary: When people destroyed themselves in WWIII, new war was started by.. animals... Lead one of the five sides and save (or conquer - your choice) the world in this simple turn-based strategy. How about a small fight?

name: Ashes of Idunn: Tales of Fimbulwinter
summary: Ashes Of Idunn: Tales Of Fimbulwinter is a small sneak peek into the future of the Ashes Of Idunn Metaverse. In this experience, you will follow the Berserker into battle in search of his people. After the fight with the Troll, the Berserker seeks the Voelver to get answers.

name: Astronaut Adventure
summary: The Astronaut's Adventures in the Vast Universe

name: Ascent
summary: Ascent is an esoteric 2D platformer about a creature stuck in a 2D world

name: Aselia the Eternal: The Spirit of Eternity Sword
summary: With his sister Kaori held hostage, Yuuto must fight as an Etranger, a warrior of power, and take up the sword to fight alongside the beautiful female Spirits who protect the land from an evil that threatens to consume it.

name: Asonde Igo ga Tsuyoku Naru! Ginsei Igo DX
Astonia 3
summary: Astonia is a free online role-playing game (MMORPG). Join this vast fantasy world as either a Mage or Warrior and explore the game world with thousands of other players. Make friends, amass huge amounts of game gold, create a powerful character or simply have fun playing this

name: Asagao Academy: Normal Boots Club
summary: Asagao Academy: Normal Boots Club is an Adventure game, developed and published by Illus Seed Games, which was released in 2016.

name: Asha
summary: A 2D pixel art platform game where you have only one life. Traverse scenarios while becoming stronger by defeating elemental bosses.

name: Asda Story Chapter 3
summary: The Demon's Shadow is the third chapter in this fantasy-style anime massively multiplayer online role-playing game.

name: Ask Gear Re:Boost
summary: A new, straightforward RPG! Hot scenarios and battles that go right to the heart of JRPGs. For those of you who still feel your youth in the RPGs of the PS1 and PS2 generations, this is the game for you.

name: A song in the void
summary: Rescue a dead civilization from its dark fate and ensure its rebirth. Explore various islands and complete complex platform puzzles to discover your place in a world where everything is tied to music. You are the last hope of your people… A Song in the Void.

name: Ascend of Arlo
summary: Ascend of Arlo is a single-player action RPG. Deprived of your strength and memories, you must fight the evil that threatens the world. Crafting, blacksmithing, and magic are at your disposal. Do whatever it takes to reclaim everything.

name: Asian Actors Wanted
summary: Will you make it in Hollywood?

name: Astral Disorder
summary: As the lone maintenance worker on an unkempt space train station, navigate the chaos unleashed by a catastrophic crash and evade a relentless beast. Armed with scattered tools and state-of-the-art equipment, outsmart your pursuer and secure passage to safety aboard a distant escape pod.

name: Assemble!
summary: 3, 2, 1, Assemble! Dive into an exciting 3D puzzle game where you connect individual pieces to complete 3D models. Explore the challenge across three difficulty levels and assemble detailed 3D models piece by piece to reveal the complexity and beauty of each finished structure.

name: Asonde Mahjong ga Tsuyoku Naru! Ginsei Mahjong DX
summary:
Have fun and learn Mahjong!

You can learn the basic rules and how to play in the "Mahjong Classroom," and you can play against 20 unique opponents in the "Game" mode, which has plenty of support features for beginners. Have fun while you get stronger!

name: Astroroxx
summary: Astroroxx is for everyone at every age. Surrounding 360° space attacks with virtual asteroids and you have to fight them. Shoot all asteroids within 90 seconds to reach the next level, and defend your high score. Featuring different space environments and a music tracks for the right sci-fi mood.

name: Asterism: Time & Space
summary: Go to a museum with your grouchy boyfriend.

name: Asterism
summary: Kotachi Asterio wants to help people that can’t fight for themselves. But, he isn't some sort of superhero- he can just see things other people can't. During the day, he goes to high school- but at night, he fights off specters, monsters that lurk in shadows and can harm people.

name: Astral Coconut
summary: A skating based adventure in a vast alien world.

name: Astrosphere
summary: In Astrosphere, a sci-fi strategy game, you explore mysterious star systems and expand your space station. Master strategic challenges in space, collect resources, and navigate through uncharted galaxies as you survive on your interstellar adventure.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Limited Edition
summary: The Limited Edition of the game includes: copy of the Assassin’s Creed Valhalla game, the Berserker Settlement Pack, The Hati Wolf Mount & a set of Runes.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Tombs of the Fallen
summary: Tombs of the Fallen is a free content update introduced in version 1.4.0 of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla. It adds a series of puzzle-oriented tombs that invite players to explore vast underground caverns filled with traps, poison, and environmental challenges. Players must use observation, exploration, and parkour skills to navigate these ancient structures and uncover hidden treasures linked to the lore of a long-lost civilization. The content emphasizes non-combat exploration and environmental problem-solving over traditional missions. Additional tombs expanding this feature were released with title update 1.6.1

name: A.S.P.: Air Strike Patrol
summary:
Playing as a jet pilot of the "Coalition" force, players take control of either an F-15 Eagle, or an A-10 Tankbuster jet. The mission is to neutralise the offensive forces of the Zarak army, who have recently invaded a smaller neighbouring country. The Zarak army has many ground units, including tanks, stinger-missile launchers, SCUD missiles and armored vehicles.

To accomplish the ultimate goal of defeating the Zarak army, players venture out on numerous missions (called "sorties") that have varied and specific objectives. Typically, various installations such as radar sites, air bases or ground units are the target. Other missions include disabling an oil-pipeline and destroying SCUD launchers before they fire.

Pre-mission screens ask the player to select from the two planes. Then, the player can specify the armament to carry into the sortie. Air-to-ground and air-to-air missiles are available for each of the planes. Here, a strategic choice between countering either air units or ground units has to be made, as each area (of which there are eight) is patrolled by opposing enemy F-15 jets.

name: Astral Guardian
summary: Build various towers to resist the large number of monsters coming from the wormhole, by extending their walking routes.

name: Ascent: The Space Game
summary: Ascent - The Space Game is a space MMO set in a future where civilisation has almost completely collapsed. Players must work together to prevent total disaster, and rebuild a civilisation of their own choosing.

name: Astra: Era of Anguish
summary: Astra: Era of Anguish is an RPG prequel set in the GOR3 universe. Explore the valley of Laywind and unravel a grand mystery.

name: Astro Escape: Free
summary:
Tap to fire the grappling hook and help Captain George climb out of the canyon!

Story
----------
Captain George Morgan has been sent on a mission to the planet Zelta 4. Here his task will be to locate the valuable resource known as Quantinium...

...Suddenly an unknown force rendered the controls inoperable and pulled the captain and his ship hurtling towards the planets surface...

The captain crash landed at the base of a deep canyon. All that remains is his suit and his trusty grappling hook. How ever will he escape?

Instructions
----------
Tap the screen to fire the grappling hook to the side. With each tap, the grappling hook alternates the side it attaches to (it doesn't matter where you touch the screen).

Tap and hold the screen to reel in the grappling hook and get pulled closer to the canyon wall.

Make use of both quick taps and tap holds to progress higher within the canyon.

Features
----------

- 15 individually challenging floors
- Practice mode!
- No IAP!
- Beautiful visuals in an alien world
- Unique tap screen control system
- Dangerously addictive!
- Perfect game to play on the loo! pick up and play in seconds

name: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D HD
summary: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D HD is rocketing onto your mobile phone! Exclusive for the Symbian OS9 Devices. The third installment of the most famous mobile phone racing game throws you right into the heart of the underground racing world. Take the wheel of your dream car or bike and make a name for yourself at the 4 corners of the world in amazing 3D surroundings. Force your opponents off the road and avoid the police roadblocks to attract TV helicopters filming your exploits live!

name: Asphodelus
summary: Asphodelus is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created by Chalk Flower for Dream Diary Jam 2. The protagonist is a girl named Tsuneko. Your goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Astronautilus
summary: Your ship has crash-landed on a stray rogue planet, and you're out of fuel... It's up to you to delve beneath the frozen surface and find a way to get your ship back into space while fighting strange sea creatures and uncovering the mysteries of the world beneath the ice!

name: Astronomics Rise of a New Empire
summary: Manage your economy, negotiate with factions and build a fleet to take control of the galaxy. In the latest real-time strategy game from the developer studio JayFiArts, you take control of a planet and steer the fortunes of your people...

name: Astronomicon
summary: In this atmospheric puzzle game with cute original art and music, you're playing as a navigator of a small caravel. Study the constellations and test your visual perception skills to find your way in the endless ocean.

name: Ascendrix
summary: The ascent nightmare

name: Ascension to the Throne: Valkyrie
summary:
Valkyrie: Ascension to the Throne is basically the same game as its predecessor Ascension to the Throne. The game tells the story of Eneya, who was among King Alexander's companions. She was raised by orks and now she needs to prove her worth as warrior by battling evil and a plague. 
 
The game is a mixture between RPG and turn-based strategy game. When exploring the environment the player sees Eneya from behind. He talks to people in multiple-choice conversations, takes quests, finds treasures, buys equipment with earned money and hires mercenaries.

name: Ashes: Hard Reset
summary: Ashes: Hard Reset is the prequel expansion for Ashes: Afterglow and is a linear campaign in the style of 2063. Take the role of the veteran scav Walker as he guides a team of elite soldiers into The City. As events spiral out of control Walker finds out that a long forgotten foe has caught up with him... and that not all injuries are of the flesh.

name: Astro Aqua Kitty
summary:
The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Pick your crew, blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids and watch out for marauding pirate rabbits!

Battle bizarre enemies, mine magnificent gems, grab new weapons, install enhancing devices, and unlock your crews' unique skills as you level up XP.

Just watch out for marauding pirate rabbits, always trying to be first to the loot!

name: Astrofrog
summary: Hop from planet to planet to help Frog find his lost spaceship.

name: Asteroids Star Fields
summary: It is an awesome space war game. It is a very simple game. Move the spaceship and shoot the asteroids. Try to make the highest score. It is an easy and time killing game. You can play to rest and relax between the big games you play.

name: Ascendance
summary: Ascendance is an upcoming space strategy game in which the player takes control of a civilisation taking its first steps into into space. It features a massive game world, a deep simulation of civilisations, and real-time strategy space battles.

name: A Solitaire Mystery
summary: A collection of 23 mysterious solitaires, with more potentially being added in the future. The solitaires included vary from fairly standard cardgames to funky reimplementations of other games in solitaire form.

name: Asteroids
summary: Asteroids for the Atari 2600 is a port of the arcade space shooter released in November 1979. The player controls a spaceship in an asteroid field which is periodically traversed by flying saucers. The objective of the game is to destroy both, asteroids and saucers. The triangular ship can rotate left and right, fire shots straight forward, and thrust forward. Once the ship begins moving in a direction, it will continue in that direction for a time without player intervention unless the player applies thrust in a different direction. The ship eventually comes to a stop when not thrusting. The player can also send the ship into hyperspace, causing it to disappear and reappear in a random location on the screen, at the risk of self-destructing or appearing on top of an asteroid.

name: A Shrimpful Adventure
summary:
A Shrimpful Adventure is a free short 2D puzzle-platformer developed in under four days for GMTK 2024 by a small team with minimal game development experience.

"Two shrimps, a father and a child, embark on an adventure in search of treasure."

name: Astro Race
summary:
Space Racing .io game

Race in space! Propel against the track to gain speed and accumulate boost fuel. Use your boost at the appropriate time and become the ultimate champion.

name: Asylum Nightmares
summary: Awaken in a forsaken asylum filled with zombies in 'Asylum Nightmares'. Scavenge weapons, solve puzzles, and brave the undead to find freedom. Every corner holds a dark secret and a fight for survival!

name: Astrosmash
summary:
In Astrosmash you control a laser canon at the bottom of the screen; your goal is to earn as many points as possible by destroying the various incoming meteors, bombs, and other objects. Points are earned for destroying objects, while points are lost for letting them get past you. Meteors are the most common item you need to defend yourself against. They come in various sizes and colors, and some even split into two smaller meteors when shot.

Mixed in with the meteors are white spinning bombs. While letting a meteor get past you will only lower your score, you have to shoot the spinners. If one gets past, you will lose a life. On the more difficult levels, ufo's and guided missiles will also appear occasionally and attempt to destroy your canon.

name: Ashes of the Singularity
summary:
Ashes of the Singularity is a real-time strategy game set in humanity’s not-so-distant future. What it means to be human has changed with the coming of the singularity.

In the post-human economy, sentience is now the most valuable commodity in the universe. The only way to acquire more of that is through the control of Turinium – programmable matter – which can extend consciousness to levels we can't even imagine. Worlds are being transformed into this substance and wars are now being fought across the galaxy for control of those worlds.

Each conflict takes place across an entire world. It isn't a skirmish. It's a war. Thousands of units are constantly constructed and sent across the planet with the player directing entire armies, in real time, to capture key resources in an effort to gain total control of the planet.

name: Ashen
summary:
Set in a sprawling open world, Ashen is a tight, 3rd person, skill-based action RPG about guiding your wanderer through a newly lit world. Fight alongside others, forge friendships and defeat the creatures of shadow determined to cast the world back into darkness.

Explore mysterious dungeons, fight epic bosses and explore diverse regions filled with gorgeous vistas and mythical creatures. Meet characters along the way who will join you on your journey and turn your home into a lively town. In this new era of light, you must protect the Ashen and destroy the hungering shadows once and for all.
